**Schwarzkopf Palette Intensive Color Creme 3-68 Dark Mahogany** delivers rich, long-lasting color with a nourishing keratin formula for shiny, healthy-looking hair. â­ Intense, long-lasting color. â­ 100% gray coverage. â­ Enriched with Keratin, Panthenol, and Nutri-Oil. â­ Easy to use with stunning results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Schwarzkopf Palette Intensive Color Creme 3-68 Dark Mahogany**:
â­ Do not wash your hair 24-48 hours before application.
â­ Wear the enclosed gloves.
â­ Mix ingredients well before use.
â­ Apply mixture to hair and leave for 30 minutes.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with warm water.
â­ Use the included care mask.

description_en:
**Schwarzkopf Palette Intensive Color Creme 6-80 Marsala Brown** delivers long-lasting, intense color with extra care for your hair. â­ Enriched with Keratin, Panthenol, and Nutri-Oils. â­ 100% grey coverage. â­ Smooth, shiny color that lasts for weeks. â­ Strengthens and smoothens hair. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Schwarzkopf Palette Intensive Color Creme 6-80 Marsala Brown**:

title_en: **Palette PNC 1-1 Blue Black Mea**
title_ar: **Ø¨Ø§Ù„ÙŠØª ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø¨ÙŠ Ø§Ù† Ø³ÙŠ 1-1 Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯ Ø£Ø²Ø±Ù‚**
description_en:
**Palette PNC 1-1 Blue Black Mea** is a premium hair dye that delivers rich, vibrant color with a natural, radiant finish. Enriched with nourishing ingredients, it provides excellent gray coverage while leaving your hair feeling soft and manageable. Easy to apply, this formula is perfect for achieving a warm, Black hue that enhances your natural beauty and ensures long-lasting results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Palette PNC 1-1 Blue Black Mea**
â­ Begin with dry, unwashed hair for optimal color absorption.
â­ Put on gloves to protect your hands, then mix the dye according to the package instructions.
â­ Apply the mixture evenly to your hair, starting from the roots and working your way to the ends.
â­ Ensure all strands are coated and use a comb for even distribution if necessary.
â­ Leave the color on for the recommended time, then rinse thoroughly until the water runs clear.
â­ Follow with a conditioner to lock in moisture and enhance shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Palette PNC 1-1 Blue Black Mea**
â­ Aqua (Water), Ethanolamine, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ammonium Hydroxide, P-Phenylenediamine, 4-Amino-2-Hydroxytoluene, Resorcinol, Sodium Sulfite, Fragrance (Parfum), Sodium Hydroxide, Hydrogen Peroxide, Citric Acid, 2-Methyl-2H-Isothiazol-3-One, 1-Methyl-2H-Isothiazol-3-One.

title_ar: **Ø¨Ø§Ù„ÙŠØª ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø¨ÙŠ Ø§Ù† Ø³ÙŠ 7-65 Ø£Ø´Ù‚Ø± Ø°Ù‡Ø¨ÙŠ Ù…ØªÙˆØ³Ø·**
description_en:
**Palette PNC 7-65 Medgoldbld Mea** is a premium hair dye that delivers rich, vibrant color with a natural, radiant finish. Enriched with nourishing ingredients, it provides excellent gray coverage while leaving your hair feeling soft and manageable. Easy to apply, this formula is perfect for achieving a warm, Medium Gold Blonde hue that enhances your natural beauty and ensures long-lasting results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Palette PNC 7-65 Medgoldbld Mea**:
â­ Begin with dry, unwashed hair for optimal color absorption.
â­ Put on gloves to protect your hands, then mix the dye according to the package instructions.
â­ Apply the mixture evenly to your hair, starting from the roots and working your way to the ends.
â­ Ensure all strands are coated and use a comb for even distribution if necessary.
â­ Leave the color on for the recommended time, then rinse thoroughly until the water runs clear.
â­ Follow with a conditioner to lock in moisture and enhance shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Palette PNC 7-65 Medgoldbld Mea**:
â­ Aqua (Water), Ethanolamine, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ammonium Hydroxide, P-Phenylenediamine, 4-Amino-2-Hydroxytoluene, Resorcinol, Sodium Sulfite, Fragrance (Parfum), Sodium Hydroxide, Hydrogen Peroxide, Citric Acid, 2-Methyl-2H-Isothiazol-3-One, 1-Methyl-2H-Isothiazol-3-One.

The powerful combination of paracetamol and caffeine enhances pain relief. â­ Relieves headaches, muscle aches, menstrual cramps, sore throats, and toothaches. â­ Easy to swallow and effective. â­ Suitable for adults and children over 12 years old. â­ Gentle on the stomach when used as directed.

**Panadol Night**, film-coated tablets for pain and fever relief, helping you sleep soundly. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Panadol Night**: 
â­ Adults and children over 12 years: Take 2 caplets about 20 minutes before bedtime.
â­ Do not take for more than 10 consecutive nights without consulting a doctor.
â­ Do not take more than 2 tablets in 24 hours.
â­ Not suitable for children under 12 years of age.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Panadol Night**: 
â­ Paracetamol 500mg
â­ Diphenhydramine Hydrochloride 25mg

**Panadol Night** relieves pain and helps you sleep. Use wisely, and follow instructions carefully. Do not exceed the recommended dose. If symptoms persist, consult your doctor. Keep out of reach of children.

It also relieves sore throat, fever, aches and pains of colds and flu, and is recommended for the relief of pain due to mild arthritis.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Panadol Advance 24 Tablets**:
â­ Adults (including the elderly) and children aged 16 years and over: Swallow 1-2 tablets every 4-6 hours as needed. Do not exceed 8 tablets in 24 hours.
â­ Children aged 10-15 years: Give 1 tablet every 4-6 hours as needed. Do not give more than 4 tablets in 24 hours. Do not give for more than 3 days unless your doctor tells you to.
â­ Do not take more frequently than every 4 hours.
â­ Do not take more than the recommended dose.
â­ Do not give to children under 10 years.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Panadol Advance 24 Tablets**:
â­ Paracetamol 500 mg.

description_en:
**Panadol Cold & Flu Day 24 Caplets** provides effective relief from cold and flu symptoms. â­ Contains Paracetamol for pain relief and fever reduction, Pseudoephedrine for nasal decongestion, and Chlorphenamine Maleate for allergy relief. â­ Helps relieve fever, muscle aches, nasal and sinus congestion, headache, sneezing, itching, and watery eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Panadol Cold & Flu Day 24 Caplets**: â­ Take orally. â­ For adults (including the elderly) and children aged 12 years and over: Take 1 or 2 caplets every 4 to 6 hours as needed, but do not take more than 8 caplets in 24 hours. â­ Do not use for longer than 7 days without consulting your physician. â­ Do not take more frequently than every 4 hours. â­ Do not use in children under 12 years unless on the advice of your physician. â­ Always use the lowest effective dose to relieve your symptoms.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Panadol Cold & Flu Day 24 Caplets**: â­ Active ingredients: Paracetamol 500 mg, Pseudoephedrine Hydrochloride 30 mg, Chlorphenamine Maleate 2 mg. â­ Other non-active ingredients: Silicon dioxide, stearic acid, sodium benzoate, povidone, pregelatinised starch, maize starch, talc.

description_en:
**Panadol Cold & Flu Vapor Release** provides effective relief from cold and flu symptoms. It contains Paracetamol, Phenylephrine Hydrochloride, and Vitamin C to relieve pain, nasal congestion, sore throat, and fever. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Panadol Cold & Flu Vapor Release**: 
â­ Take one sachet every 4-6 hours as needed. 
â­ For adults and children 12 years and older. 
â­ Not for children under 12 years unless advised by a doctor. 
â­ For oral use only. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Panadol Cold & Flu Vapor Release**: 
â­ Paracetamol 600mg 
â­ Phenylephrine Hydrochloride 10mg 
â­ Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid) 40mg 
â­ Other Non-Active Ingredients: Citric Acid Anhydrous, Maize Starch Dried, Honey Flavour, Caramel Colour, Aspartame, Sucrose, Lemon Flavour, Sodium Nitrate, Saccharin Sodium, Menthol Flavour. 

Do not exceed the recommended dose. Consult your doctor if symptoms persist. Keep out of reach of children.

description_en:
**Pantene Pro-V Curlastic Curl Revival Serum 145 ml** is your secret to bouncy, vibrant curls, even on non-wash days.  Use it to revitalize and rehydrate your curls without weighing them down. Shine with healthy, beautiful curls thanks to the **Pantene Curlastic** formula that brings your curls back to life, say goodbye to dry and frizzy hair! This serum is specially formulated for curly hair, with a moisturizing formula that will captivate you with every twist and turn. Complete your curly hair care routine with the full **Pantene Curlastic** collection: 1. Sulfate-Free Shampoo, 2. Moisturizing Conditioner, 3. Curl Definition Cream, 4. **Pantene Pro-V Curlastic Curl Revival Serum**. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pantene Pro-V Curlastic Curl Revival Serum**:
â­ Apply 1-2 pumps to dry hair ends.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pantene Pro-V Curlastic Curl Revival Serum**:
â­ Aqua, Dimethicone, Paraffinum Liquidum, Phenoxyethanol, Betaine, Benzyl Alcohol, Polyacrylamide, Parfum, C13-14 Alkane, Ethylhexylglycerin, Laureth-7, Panthenol, Panthenyl Ethyl Ether, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Citric Acid, Tocopherol.

**Pantene Pro-V Milky Damage Repair Shampoo** is your go-to solution for healthy, shiny hair. Tired of heat styling damage?  With **Pantene Pro-V Milky Damage Repair Shampoo**, you'll experience intensely moisturized and smooth hair. Its unique formula, enriched with pro-vitamins, nourishes hair from roots to ends, repairing damage caused by heat styling. This shampoo fights split ends, leaving your hair radiant and vibrant. Try other **Pantene Pro-V Milky Damage Repair** products for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pantene Pro-V Milky Damage Repair Shampoo**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of shampoo to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage your scalp until a rich lather forms.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat if needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pantene Pro-V Milky Damage Repair Shampoo**:
â­ Pro-Vitamins
â­ Milky Lotion enriched formula
â­ Effective ingredients that moisturize, nourish and protect hair from damage.

description_en:
**Pantene Magic Water Cream Smooth&Silky 270ml** is your solution for beautiful, healthy hair! Looking for the perfect leave-in cream that nourishes without weighing down? Discover the new **Pantene Magic Water Cream Smooth&Silky 270ml**, with its unique watery texture. This cream transforms into a light watery consistency in your hands, absorbing quickly into your hair and nourishing every strand without weighing it down.  Enjoy nourished, vibrant, and strong hair without any heaviness. Ideal for hair under a hijab, as it leaves no sticky residue. It can be used on both dry and damp hair. It revives oily hair between washes and helps reduce hair fall when used with other Pantene anti-hair fall products.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pantene Magic Water Cream Smooth&Silky 270ml**:
â­ Apply the appropriate amount to your palm.
â­ Distribute the cream on the ends of your hair first, then work your way towards the roots.

Also try Pantene Pro-V Oil Replacement for ultimate damage protection and styling assistance.

description_en:
**Pantene Pro-V Hair Super Food 3 Minute Miracle Conditioner 200ml** is a miracle conditioner specially formulated as a multi-nutrient for your hair. Enriched with a potent Pro-V blend, antioxidants, and lipids, it instantly melts into your hair, strengthens it from the roots, and leaves it looking visibly healthier, shinier, and feeling stronger. **Pantene Pro-V Hair Super Food 3 Minute Miracle Conditioner 200ml** protects your hair against free radicals that cause hair breakage, while helping to maintain its natural structure. For best results, use with other products from the Pantene Pro-V Hair Super Food collection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pantene Pro-V Hair Super Food 3 Minute Miracle Conditioner 200ml**
â­ Wash your hair with Pantene Hair Super Food Shampoo.
â­ Apply a palm-size amount of conditioner to wet hair, starting at the tips and working towards the roots.
â­ Leave in for 3 minutes, then rinse.
â­ Dry and style as usual.
â­ Use at every wash.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pantene Pro-V Hair Super Food 3 Minute Miracle Conditioner 200ml**
â­ Aqua
â­ Stearyl Alcohol
â­ Behentrimonium Methosulfate
â­ Bis-Aminopropyl Dimethicone
â­ Cetyl Alcohol
â­ Parfum
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol
â­ Benzyl Alcohol
â­ Disodium EDTA
â­ Panthenol

â­ Histidine

â­ Hexyl Cinnamal
â­ Hydroxycitronellal
â­ Magnesium Nitrate
â­ Methylchloroisothiazolinone

description_en:
**Pantene Conditioner Nature Fusion 360 ml**, experience nourishment inspired by nature with Pantene Pro-V Nature Fusion conditioner. Every bottle of this moisturizing conditioner contains active Cassia flower extracts, specially chosen for its ability to moisturize hair from root to tip. **Pantene Conditioner Nature Fusion 360 ml** helps defeat hair dryness, makes hair easier to detangle, and leaves it moisturized all day long. It also helps reduce the appearance of split ends. With regular use, it makes your hair more resistant to styling damage. For best results, use with Pantene Pro-V Nature Fusion shampoo.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pantene Conditioner Nature Fusion 360 ml**: 
â­ Massage into wet hair after shampooing.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Gentle enough for color-treated or permed hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pantene Conditioner Nature Fusion 360 ml**: 
â­ Cassia flower extracts.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients.

**Pantene Shampoo Goodbye Summer Frizz 400ml** is the perfect solution for frizzy hair in hot and humid weather. This amazing shampoo gives you up to 72 hours of frizz control, thanks to its rich formula of pro-vitamins and moisturizing ingredients that nourish hair from within and prevent it from absorbing excess moisture. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pantene Shampoo Goodbye Summer Frizz 400ml**: 
â­ Wet your hair.

â­ Gently massage your scalp. 
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water. 
â­ Repeat as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pantene Shampoo Goodbye Summer Frizz 400ml**: 
â­ Pro-vitamins.

â­ Unique frizz-control formula. 

Enjoy smooth, shiny, and frizz-free hair all day long! Also try Pantene Goodbye Frizz conditioner and oil replacement for best results. Discover Pantene's complete hair care range to meet all your hair needs.

**Pantene Shampoo Goodbye Summer Frizz 600ml** is the perfect solution for frizzy hair in hot and humid weather. This amazing shampoo gives you up to 72 hours* of frizz control, thanks to its rich formula of pro-vitamins and moisturizing ingredients that nourish hair from within and prevent frizz. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pantene Shampoo Goodbye Summer Frizz 600ml**: 
â­ Wet your hair thoroughly. 
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of **Pantene Shampoo Goodbye Summer Frizz 600ml** to your hair. 
â­ Gently massage your scalp. 
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water. 
â­ Repeat as needed. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pantene Shampoo Goodbye Summer Frizz 600ml**: 
â­ Pro-vitamins. 
â­ Moisturizing ingredients. 
â­ Active frizz-fighting ingredients. 

Enjoy smooth, shiny, and frizz-free hair all day long! Also try Pantene Goodbye Frizz Conditioner and Oil Replacement for best results.

description_en:
**Pantene Pro-V Nature Fusion Shampoo** provides gentle cleansing and deep nourishment inspired by nature. This shampoo contains active Cassia flower extracts known for their moisturizing properties, working from the roots to the tips.  **Pantene Pro-V Nature Fusion Shampoo** helps improve hair structure, preventing split ends and leaving hair stronger. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pantene Pro-V Nature Fusion Shampoo**: 
â­ Apply to wet hair and massage gently to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Repeat if necessary.
â­ For best results, use with other products from the Pantene Pro-V Nature Fusion range.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pantene Pro-V Nature Fusion Shampoo**: 
â­Water
â­Sodium Laureth Sulfate

â­Sodium Chloride
â­Glycol Distearate

â­Methylisothiazolinone

description_en:
**Pantene Pro-V Nature Fusion Leave-In Conditioner 275ml** is the perfect solution for modern hair problems. This leave-in oil replacement intensively regenerates damaged hair, combats the effects of everyday styling, boosts moisture from root to tip, and reduces the appearance of split ends.  **Pantene Pro-V Nature Fusion** boasts a creamy texture and easy application, penetrating deep into the hair to provide nourishment, shine, and exceptional softness. It offers protection against styling and blow-drying damage and is ideal for dry and lifeless hair. Use daily with **Pantene Pro-V Nature Fusion** shampoo for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pantene Pro-V Nature Fusion Leave-In Conditioner**
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to damp hair after shampooing.
â­ Distribute evenly throughout the hair, focusing on the ends.
â­ Do not rinse.
â­ Use daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pantene Pro-V Nature Fusion Leave-In Conditioner**
â­ Improved formula with vitamins B, C, and E
â­ Provitamin B5 (tested by the Swiss Vitamin Institute)

**Pantene Pro-V Super Food Leave-In Conditioner 275ml** is a nourishing leave-on cream that combines the goodness of oils with the power of a Pro-V blend to strengthen your hair 2x more than oil. **Pantene Pro-V Super Food Leave-In Conditioner** nourishes and repairs your hair, leaving it beautiful and healthy. Its special formula creates a protective layer that shields against styling damage, while its creamy texture leaves your hair smooth and shiny without weighing it down. For best results, use it with **Pantene Pro-V Super Food Leave-In Conditioner** shampoo and other hair care products.

â­ Apply an appropriate amount to damp or dry hair.

**Pantene Pro-V Goodbye Frizz Oil Replacement, 275 ml** is your solution for smooth, shiny, and frizz-free hair. This amazing product provides up to 72 hours of frizz control thanks to its rich formula with vitamins B, C, and E. **Pantene Pro-V Goodbye Frizz Oil Replacement, 275 ml** deeply penetrates hair to lock in moisture and deliver softness and shine. Try **Pantene Pro-V Goodbye Frizz Oil Replacement, 275 ml** shampoo and conditioner for optimal results.

**Pantene Pro-V 3MM Smooth and Silky Conditioner + Mask 200 ml** is a conditioner and hair mask in one, packed with Pro-V power. â­ Repairs up to 3 months of surface hair damage caused by daily styling in just 3 minutes. â­ Leaves hair bouncy, full of life and free-flowing. â­ Its concentrated formula strengthens the hair core and melts evenly along the hair fiber. â­ Contains more conditioning ingredients for superior smoothness and shine. â­ Helps prevent split ends and frizz. â­ Suitable for everyday use. â­ Nourishes dry and damaged hair. â­ Perfect for weak and damaged hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pantene Pro-V 3MM Smooth and Silky Conditioner + Mask 200 ml**: â­ Apply to wet hair. â­ Leave on for 3 minutes. â­ Rinse thoroughly.

Its intense formula provides strength at the hairâ€™s core, while melting evenly along the hair fiber. **Pantene Pro-V 3 Minute Miracle** also features more conditioning ingredients* to provide superior hair smoothness and shine, while helping prevent split ends and frizz. Suitable for everyday use, it also strengthens your hair against hair loss caused by styling damage, making fragile hair visibly healthier, shinier and stronger.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pantene Pro-V 3 Minute Miracle Anti-Hair Fall Conditioner + Mask 200 ml**: 
â­ Apply to wet hair.
â­ Work into a lather, then rinse.
â­ Gentle on color-treated and curly hair.

description_en:
**Pediasure Powder Milk Complete Vanilla 400 gm** is a nutritional supplement ideal for children aged 1-3 years who experience growth deficiencies, need increased calories and nutrients, or suffer from malnutrition or poor appetite. It contains 37 nutrients, including 28 vitamins and minerals, plus prebiotics, probiotics, MCT oil for rapid absorption, protein, calcium, and vitamin D. It's also gluten-free and lactose-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pediasure Powder Milk Complete Vanilla 400 gm**:
â­ To prepare one 225 ml serving: add 190 ml of room temperature or warm water (below 35Â°C) to a cup and gradually mix in 5 level scoops of **Pediasure** powder. 
â­ Store unopened tin under normal room conditions (not to exceed 25Â°C). 
â­ After opening, use within 3 weeks and store in a cool, dry place. 
â­ Never use a microwave to prepare or warm the formula.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pediasure Powder Milk Complete Vanilla 400 gm**:
â­ 37 nutrients, including 28 vitamins and minerals.
â­ Prebiotics and probiotics.
â­ MCT oil for rapid absorption.
â­ Protein, calcium, and vitamin D.
â­ Gluten-free and lactose-free.

#Pediasure #BabyMilk #NutritionalSupplement #ChildGrowth #ChildHealth #BabyNutrition #Vanilla #400gm #SaudiArabia #Infant

description_en:
**Pediasure 10+ Vanilla 850g** is the perfect complementary food for adolescents aged 10 and above, helping meet their nutritional needs during their rapid growth phase.  **Pediasure 10+** is a great option for children who are malnourished or at risk of malnutrition.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pediasure 10+ Vanilla 850g**:
â­ To prepare one 226 mL serving: Mix 50g (5 scoops) of **Pediasure 10+** powder with 190 mL of cold or room temperature water.
â­ After mixing, cover and refrigerate, using within 24 hours.
â­ Never microwave **PediaSure 10+**; serious burns can result.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pediasure 10+ Vanilla 850g**:
â­ Hydrolyzed corn starch
â­ Proteins (cow's milk protein concentrate, soy protein isolate)
â­ Oils (high oleic sunflower oil, soy oil, canola oil)
â­ Sugar
â­ Minerals and Vitamins
â­ Natural and artificial flavorings
â­ Contains: Milk and soy.

description_en:
**Pediasure 3+ Vanilla 1600 gm** is ideal for children aged 3-10 years who experience slow growth, need increased calories and nutrients, or suffer from malnutrition or poor appetite. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pediasure 3+ Vanilla 1600 gm**: 
â­ To prepare one 225 ml serving: Add 190 ml of room temperature or warm water (below 35Â°C) to a cup and gradually mix in 5 level scoops of **Pediasure 3+ Vanilla 1600 gm** powder. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pediasure 3+ Vanilla 1600 gm**:
â­ 37 nutrients, including 28 vitamins and minerals.
â­ Prebiotics and probiotics.
â­ MCT oil for rapid absorption.
â­ Protein, Calcium & Vitamin D.
â­ Gluten-free & lactose-free.

Cautions & Warnings: Store unopened tin under normal room conditions (not to exceed 25Â°C). Once opened, store in a cool, dry place (not in the refrigerator) and use within 3 weeks. Never use a microwave. Using water above 35Â°C may compromise the probiotics.

description_en:
Discover **PediaSure Complete 3+** in a delicious Chocolate flavor, the ideal solution to support your child's growth from 3 to 10 years old. Perfect for children needing extra calories and nutrients, those experiencing undernourishment, reduced food intake due to picky eating, or diminished appetite. **PediaSure Complete 3+** provides 37 essential nutrients, including 28 vitamins and minerals, for healthy growth and development.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **PediaSure Complete 3+**:
â­ To prepare a 225 ml serving: Pour 190 ml of room temperature or warm water (below 35Â°C) into a cup.
â­ Gradually mix in 5 leveled scoops of **PediaSure Complete 3+** powder.
â­ Storage for unopened tin: Store under normal room conditions (not exceeding 25Â°C).
â­ For opened tin: Cover tightly and store in a cool, dry place (not in the refrigerator) and use within 3 weeks.
â­ Caution: Never use a microwave oven to prepare or warm the formula.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **PediaSure Complete 3+**:
â­ 37 nutrients, including 28 minerals and vitamins for comprehensive growth support.
â­ Prebiotics and Probiotics to support gut health and boost immunity.
â­ MCT oil for rapid and easy nutrient absorption.
â­ Protein, Calcium & Vitamin D for strong bones and healthy muscles.
â­ Gluten-free & lactose-free.

Whether your child experiences slower growth patterns, has increased caloric and nutrient requirements, or is a picky eater, **PediaSure Complete 3+** offers a comprehensive nutritional solution.

â­ Contains MCT oil for rapid nutrient absorption.
â­ Rich source of protein, calcium, and Vitamin D for strong bones and overall development.
â­ Gluten-free and lactose-free, making it suitable for children with dietary sensitivities.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **PediaSure Complete 3+**:
To prepare one 225 ml serving: Pour 190 ml of room temperature or warm water (less than 35Â°C) into a cup and gradually mix in 5 leveled scoops of **PediaSure Complete 3+** powder.

description_en:
Discover the power of growth with **PediaSure 10+** in delicious chocolate flavor. This complementary food is specially formulated to support the nutritional needs of rapidly growing and developing adolescents aged 10 years and above, who may be at risk of malnutrition.

â­ Rich in essential nutrients to support physical and cognitive development.
â­ Beloved chocolate flavor makes nutrition enjoyable.
â­ Helps bridge nutritional gaps during the critical adolescent growth phase.
â­ Gluten-free and low lactose.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **PediaSure 10+**:
â­ To prepare one 226 mL serving: Pour 190 mL of room temperature or cold water into a cup and gradually mix in 5 leveled scoops or 50 g of **PediaSure 10+** powder.
â­ Once mixed, cover, refrigerate, and use within 24 hours.
â­ Store unopened can under normal room conditions (not to exceed 25 Â°C).
â­ After opening, cover tightly with the plastic lid and store in a cool, dry place (not in the refrigerator). Use within 3 weeks of opening.
â­ Never use a microwave to prepare or warm.
â­ Not for parenteral use.
â­ Use under medical supervision.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **PediaSure 10+**:
â­ Hydrolyzed corn starch.
â­ Proteins (cow's milk protein concentrate, soy protein isolate).
â­ High oleic oils (sunflower, soy, canola).
â­ Sucrose.
â­ A comprehensive blend of minerals and vitamins for overall health support.
â­ Contains milk and soy.

#PediaSure #Chocolate #TeenGrowth #HealthyNutrition #SaudiArabia #ChildHealth #Vitamins #Minerals #DietarySupplement #GrowthPower

title_en: Pediasure 10+ Vanilla Liquid - Complete Nutritional Support for Adolescents
title_ar: Ø¨Ø¯ÙŠØ§Ø´ÙˆØ± 10+ ÙØ§Ù†ÙŠÙ„Ø§ Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ - Ø¯Ø¹Ù… ØºØ°Ø§Ø¦ÙŠ Ù…ØªÙƒØ§Ù…Ù„ Ù„Ù„Ù…Ø±Ø§Ù‡Ù‚ÙŠÙ†
description_en:
PediaSure 10+ Vanilla Liquid is the ideal complementary food for active adolescents aged 10 and above, who require additional nutritional support to keep up with their rapid growth and development, or those at risk of malnutrition. Its balanced formula helps meet the increasing nutritional needs during this crucial stage of life.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pediasure 10+**:

â­ Never use a microwave to prepare or warm **Pediasure 10+**. Serious burns can result.
â­ Store the unopened can under normal room conditions (not to exceed 25Â°C).
â­ Once opened, keep the can tightly covered and store in a cool, dry place (not in the refrigerator).
â­ Use within 3 weeks of opening.
â­ GLUTEN FREE.
â­ NOT FOR PARENTERAL USE.
â­ LOW LACTOSE. Suitable for lactose intolerance. (NOT FOR CHILDREN WITH GALACTOSEMIA).
â­ NOT A SOLE SOURCE OF NUTRITION.
â­ USE UNDER MEDICAL SUPERVISION.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pediasure 10+**:

â­ Hydrolyzed corn starch
â­ PROTEINS (cow's milk protein concentrate, soy protein isolate)
â­ OILS (high oleic sunflower oil, soy oil, canola oil)
â­ sucrose
â­ MINERALS (calcium phosphate, potassium citrate, potassium chloride, magnesium phosphate, sodium citrate, calcium carbonate, potassium phosphate, ferrous sulfate, zinc sulfate, manganese sulfate, copper sulfate, potassium iodide, chromium chloride, sodium selenite, sodium molybdate)
â­ fructo-oligosaccharides
â­ EMULSIFIER (soy lecithin)
â­ natural and artificial vanilla flavorings
â­ choline chloride
â­ docosahexaenoic acid (DHA)
â­ L-arginine
â­ VITAMINS (ascorbic acid, dl-alpha tocopheryl acetate, niacinamide, d-calcium pantothenate, pyridoxine hydrochloride, thiamin hydrochloride, vitamin A palmitate, riboflavin, Folic acid, phylloquinone, vitamin D3, menaquinone-7, biotin, cyanocobalamin)
â­ ANTIOXIDANTS (ascorbyl palmitate, mixed tocopherols)
â­ taurine, m-inositol, L-carnitine.

**Contains:** Milk and soy.

#Pediasure #Vanilla #GrowthMilk #NutritionalSupplement #Adolescents #HealthyNutrition #SaudiArabia #ChildHealth #HealthyGrowth #BabyCare

Whether your child experiences slower growth patterns, increased caloric and nutrient needs, or is a picky eater, **Pediasure 3+ Strawberry 900gm** provides the comprehensive TripleSure system to support their well-being. Its nutrient-rich formula aids in building strong bones, boosting immunity, and improving digestion, giving your child a solid foundation for growth and development.

â­ Gluten-free and lactose-free.

description_en:
Discover **PediaSure Complete Chocolate 400gm**, the perfect solution for healthy growth and comprehensive development for your children aged 1 to 3 years. **PediaSure Complete Chocolate 400gm** is specially formulated for children who need extra growth support, have increased caloric and nutrient requirements, or experience diminished appetite or picky eating. **PediaSure Complete Chocolate 400gm** offers a rich formula with a delightful taste that kids love.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **PediaSure Complete Chocolate 400gm**:
â­ To prepare one 225 ml serving: Pour 190 ml of room temperature or warm water (less than 35Â°C) into a cup.
â­ Gradually mix in 5 leveled scoops of **PediaSure Complete Chocolate 400gm** powder.
â­ Store unopened tin under normal room conditions (not to exceed 25Â°C).
â­ After opening, use the contents within three weeks. Cover the opened tin and store in a cool, dry place (not in the refrigerator).
â­ Warning: Never use a microwave oven to prepare or warm the formula, as it can cause serious burns.
â­ Mixing the formula with water above 35Â°C may compromise the probiotics.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **PediaSure Complete Chocolate 400gm**:
â­ 37 nutrients, including 28 essential minerals and vitamins for growth.
â­ Prebiotics and Probiotics to support a healthy gut and boost immunity.
â­ MCT oil for rapid absorption of energy and nutrients.
â­ Protein, Calcium & Vitamin D for strong bones and teeth.
â­ Gluten-free and lactose-free formula.

description_en:
Introducing **PediaSure** Complete Chocolate, the perfect solution to support your child's growth and provide complete nutrition with a delicious chocolate flavor. This milk is specially designed for children aged 1-3 years who experience slower growth patterns, require increased caloric and nutrient intake, or suffer from undernutrition or diminished appetite. **PediaSure** gives them a powerful boost of essential vitamins and minerals.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **PediaSure**:
â­ To prepare one 225 ml serving:
â­ Pour 190 ml of room temperature or warm water (less than 35Â°C) into a cup.
â­ Gradually mix in 5 leveled scoops of **PediaSure** powder.
â­ Storage:
â­ Store unopened tin under normal room conditions (not to exceed 25Â°C).
â­ Store opened tin with cover on, in a cool dry place (not in refrigerator) and use within 3 weeks.
â­ Caution: Never use a microwave oven to prepare or warm formula, as serious burns can result.
â­ Mixing formula with water above 35Â°C may compromise the probiotics.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **PediaSure**:
â­ Contains 37 Nutrients, including 28 minerals and vitamins.
â­ Includes Prebiotics and Probiotics to support a healthy gut.
â­ Enriched with MCT oil for rapid absorption of nutrients.
â­ Provides Protein, Calcium & Vitamin D for strong bones and muscle growth.
â­ Gluten-free & lactose-free, making it suitable for children with lactose sensitivity.

description_en:
**Pediasure Complete 3+** is the perfect choice to support your child's growth and healthy nutrition, specifically designed for children aged 3 to 10 years who need an extra boost of nutrients. Whether your child has slow growth patterns, increased caloric and nutrient needs, or has a low appetite or is a picky eater, **Pediasure Complete 3+** provides a complete nutritional system.

**Pediasure Complete 3+** features the unique "TripleSure" system, which combines:
â­ 37 essential nutrients, including 28 vitamins and minerals.
â­ Prebiotics and Probiotics to support digestive health and boost immunity.
â­ Medium-Chain Triglyceride (MCT) oil for rapid energy and nutrient absorption.
â­ Protein, Calcium, and Vitamin D for building strong bones and healthy muscles.
â­ Gluten-free and lactose-free, making it suitable for children with sensitivities.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pediasure Complete 3+**:
â­ To prepare one 225 ml serving: Pour 190 ml of room temperature or warm water (less than 35Â°C) into a cup.
â­ Gradually mix in 5 leveled scoops of **Pediasure Complete 3+** powder until the powder is completely dissolved.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pediasure Complete 3+**:
â­ 37 Nutrients (including 28 vitamins and minerals).
â­ Prebiotics and Probiotics.
â­ MCT oil (Medium-Chain Triglycerides).
â­ Protein, Calcium, and Vitamin D.
â­ Gluten-free and Lactose-free.

description_en:
Say goodbye to unwanted facial hair with the **Braun FS 1000 Mini Facial Hair Remover**, the elegant and effective solution for silky-smooth skin. This compact device is specifically designed for women, delivering fast and gentle hair removal anytime, anywhere.

The **Braun FS 1000 Mini Facial Hair Remover** cuts hair close to skin level, leaving your face fuzz-free, smooth, and even, ready for effortless makeup application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun FS 1000 Mini Facial Hair Remover**:
â­ Hold the device at a suitable angle against your skin.
â­ Gently move the device in circular motions or against the direction of hair growth.
â­ Can be used on sensitive and tricky areas of the face.
â­ Use the included brush to clean the device after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun FS 1000 Mini Facial Hair Remover**:
â­ Sharp and precise stainless steel blades.
â­ Elegantly designed and lightweight external casing.
â­ Built-in LED light for precise hair spotting.
â­ AA battery for operation.
â­ Protective cap to maintain the blades.

#Braun #HairRemoval #FacialHairRemover #Skincare #Beauty #Makeup #SmoothSkin #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah

description_en:
Discover unparalleled precision with the **Braun FG1100 Bikini & Eyebrow Trimmer**. This specially designed trimmer delivers precise and comfortable shaping for sensitive areas, enhancing your beauty and boosting your confidence. Whether you need to define your bikini line with accuracy, style your eyebrows, or groom facial hair, the **Braun FG1100 Bikini & Eyebrow Trimmer** ensures professional results at home.

â­ Achieve precise trimming for sensitive areas with multiple length options (5mm & 8mm) using the included combs.
â­ The slim bikini shaping head allows you to easily create precise lines and shapes.
â­ The precision head is perfect for defining and styling eyebrows with pen-like accuracy.
â­ Rounded tips protect your delicate skin from irritation and nicks.
â­ Ergonomic, pen-like design for easy handling and control.
â­ Wet & dry usage for a flexible and comfortable experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun FG1100 Bikini & Eyebrow Trimmer**
â­ Ensure skin is clean and dry before use.
â­ Select the appropriate head and attachment for your needs (bikini shaping head, precision eyebrow head, trimming combs).
â­ Begin trimming slowly and carefully in sensitive areas, gently pulling skin taut for maximum precision.
â­ For eyebrows, use the precision head to create clean lines.
â­ Use the trimming combs for uniform hair length.
â­ Clean the trimmer after each use to maintain its efficiency.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun FG1100 Bikini & Eyebrow Trimmer**
â­ Slim bikini shaping head.
â­ Precision eyebrow defining head.
â­ 5mm trimming comb.
â­ 8mm trimming comb.
â­ Protective cap.
â­ One AAA battery.

#Braun #BikiniTrimmer #HairRemoval #WomensCare #LadyShave #HighPrecision #BeautyCare #HairStyling #Eyebrows #FaceMakeup

description_en:
Ensure maximum accuracy and hygiene with the **Braun Thermoscan Cover Caps 40 pcs**. These disposable lens filters are specifically designed for Braun Thermoscan ear thermometers, providing a hygienic barrier that prevents the buildup of earwax and other debris, guaranteeing accurate and reliable readings every time. They are easy to use and help maintain the cleanliness and accuracy of your thermometer.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun Thermoscan Cover Caps 40 pcs**:

â­ Remove the old cover: Before taking a temperature, remove the old cover from the thermometer's probe.
â­ Attach a new cover: Place a new cover over the probe, ensuring it is securely in place.
â­ Take the temperature: Insert the thermometer into the ear canal and follow the manufacturer's instructions.
â­ Discard the used cover: After taking the temperature, discard the used cover in a wastebasket.
â­ For single use only: Each cover is intended for one-time use.
â­ Compatible with **Braun Thermoscan** models.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun Thermoscan Cover Caps 40 pcs**:

â­ Made from high-quality plastic (typically polypropylene).
â­ Latex-free.
â­ BPA (Bisphenol-A) free.

#Braun #Thermometer #Health #MedicalSupplies #Temperature #Hygiene #Accuracy #SaudiArabia #Healthcare #Wellness

Experience ultimate convenience and smoothness with the **Braun Mini Body Hair Trimmer BS 1000**. Expertly designed to deliver fast, easy, and gentle results on all body areas, even the most sensitive ones.

The **Braun Mini Body Hair Trimmer BS 1000** cuts with precision, giving you close control over your hair length for quick and gentle body hair trimming, anytime and anywhere.

â­ Quick & easy: mini-sized for portability - efficient body hair removal.
â­ Gentle & compact: built for efficient and sensitive body hair trimming for everybody.
â­ Wet & Dry: 100% waterproof, for use as you prefer.
â­ Precise: German cutting technology for precise body hair trimming and shaping.
â­ Multipurpose: usable for hair removal trimming and shaping on different areas of your body.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun Mini Body Hair Trimmer BS 1000**
â­ For wet and dry use, you can use it in or out of the shower.
â­ Gently glide the trimmer over the skin to remove hair.
â­ Clean the trimmer blades after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun Mini Body Hair Trimmer BS 1000**

â­ 100% waterproof.
â­ Battery-operated for easy portability and use.

title_ar: Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÙˆÙ† BNA100 Ø´ÙØ§Ø· Ø§Ù„Ø£Ù†Ù Ù„Ù„Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ â€“ Ø§Ù„Ø­Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ù…Ø«Ù„ Ù„ØªÙ†ÙØ³ Ø³Ù‡Ù„ ÙˆØµØ­ÙŠ
description_en:
Say goodbye to your baby's nasal congestion discomfort with the **Braun BNA100 Nasal Aspirator**. This innovative device is designed to provide immediate relief for your infant or newborn, effectively alleviating sinus congestion and clearing blocked nasal passages quickly and easily.

The **Braun BNA100** Nasal Aspirator features two adjustable suction levels, allowing you to choose the ideal strength that suits your child's needs and condition. For maximum safety, the device automatically shuts off when either suction button is released, giving you peace of mind.

For a customized suction experience, the **Braun BNA100** Nasal Aspirator comes with two nasal tips of different sizes, ensuring optimal reach into the nasal cavity, whether for surface-level suction or slightly deeper clearing. Ease of cleaning is another key feature, as the aspirator's parts are easily washable and even dishwasher-safe, saving you valuable time.

â­ Clear stuffy noses quickly and gently.
â­ Electric Nasal Aspirator for All Ages 0+.
â­ 2 suction levels to suit your baby's needs.
â­ 2 nasal tip sizes for a perfect fit.
â­ Extremely easy to clean, and dishwasher safe.
â­ Great for infants and toddlers.
â­ Ergonomic design for easy use in any position.
â­ Ensures a fast and gentle suction process for your baby's nose.
â­ Battery operated for portability and convenience anywhere.

#Braun #NasalAspirator #BabyCare #InfantHealth #BabyEssentials #Newborn #SaudiArabia #Health #Riyadh #BabyProducts

description_en:
Experience a close shave with the **Braun Series 3 300s**, engineered for efficiency and skin comfort. Featuring a Triple Action Cutting System with SensoFoilâ„¢ blades that capture both long and short hairs effectively, while the 3-Flex head adapts to your facial contours for a precise shave. 100% waterproof for easy cleaning, it offers up to 30 minutes of cordless shaving after a 1-hour charge. A 5-minute quick charge is sufficient for one shave. Designed and engineered in Germany for superior performance and durability.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun Series 3 300s**
â­ Prepare your skin, ensuring it's clean and dry for optimal performance.
â­ Turn on the shaver and gently glide it over your skin against the direction of hair growth.
â­ Allow the flexible head to adapt to your facial contours for maximum contact.
â­ After shaving, rinse the shaver head under running water for easy cleaning.
â­ Ensure the shaver is completely dry before storing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun Series 3 300s**
â­ Shaving Foils and Cutter Block: Crafted from durable stainless steel.
â­ Body: High-quality plastic for a comfortable, lightweight design.
â­ Battery: Two rechargeable NiMH batteries for extended run time.
â­ SmartPlug: Automatic voltage adjustment (100â€“240V) for global compatibility.

title_en: Braun Thermometer BNT400B with Age Precision
title_ar: Ù…Ù‚ÙŠØ§Ø³ Ø­Ø±Ø§Ø±Ø© Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÙˆÙ† BNT400B Ø¨ØªÙ‚Ù†ÙŠØ© Age Precision
description_en:
Introducing the **Braun Thermometer BNT400B** with Age Precision, the latest innovation from Braun designed for effortless and accurate temperature monitoring. This advanced device features both No Touch and Touch modes, coupled with patented Age Precision technology. This ensures you always know precisely whether your child has a fever, with an age-dependent temperature display for clarity. The patented **Braun Thermometer BNT400B** utilizes groundbreaking technology for incredibly accurate, stress-free measurements in just two seconds.

â­ Age Precision technology with a color-coded display for age-specific fever detection.
â­ Illuminated display and silent mode for discreet use in the dark, preventing disturbance to your child.
â­ Ultra-fast measurement in just 2 seconds.
â­ Dedicated Food and Liquid mode for checking the temperature of meals, drinks, and bath water.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun Thermometer BNT400B**
â­ For Touch mode measurement: Place the thermometer between the eyebrows on the forehead.
â­ For No-Touch mode measurement: Hold the thermometer approximately 2 cm in front of your child's forehead, between the eyebrows.
â­ Utilize the silent mode for accurate and undisturbed measurements.
â­ Employ the Food and Liquids mode to accurately measure the temperature of food, beverages, and bath water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun Thermometer BNT400B**
â­ Main device: Braun BNT400B thermometer.
â­ Integrated Age Precision technology.
â­ Illuminated display screen.
â­ Silent mode functionality.
â­ Food and Liquids measurement mode.

title_en: Braun XT5 Face & Body Shaver and Trimmer with 5 Combs
title_ar: Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÙˆÙ† Ù…Ø§ÙƒÙŠÙ†Ø© Ø­Ù„Ø§Ù‚Ø© XT5 Ù„Ù„ÙˆØ¬Ù‡ ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø¬Ø³Ù… Ù…Ø¹ 5 Ø£Ù…Ø´Ø§Ø·
description_en:
Discover versatility and superior performance with the **Braun XT5 Face & Body Shaver and Trimmer**, the ultimate tool for all your men's grooming needs. Shave, trim, and edge with unparalleled precision and ease. Featuring innovative 4D-Blade technology, the **Braun XT5 Face & Body Shaver and Trimmer** delivers a close and comfortable shave in every stroke, while remaining gentle on your skin. Built for lasting durability, the blades stay sharp for up to 6 months.

â­ Features 4D-Blade technology with 4 cutting elements for a shave in every stroke.
â­ Stainless steel blades stay sharp for up to 6 months.
â­ Includes a SkinGuard comb for ultimate skin protection in sensitive areas.
â­ Designed for precision and comfort, with an anti-slip rubber grip.
â­ Fully waterproof for wet & dry use and easy cleaning.
â­ Comes with 5 combs: 1, 2, 3, 5mm for the face and 0, 3mm for the body.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun XT5 Face & Body Shaver and Trimmer**:
â­ Select the appropriate comb for your desired hair length (1, 2, 3, 5mm for face; 0, 3mm for body).
â­ Use the tool to shave, trim, or edge your face or body as needed.
â­ Utilize the SkinGuard comb for safely trimming sensitive areas.
â­ Can be used with foam or gel in the shower, or dry.
â­ Rinse the head under running water after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun XT5 Face & Body Shaver and Trimmer**:
â­ 100% stainless steel 4D-Blade.
â­ 4 cutting elements: 2 side trimmers and 2 central shaving zones.
â­ 5 click-on combs for various lengths.
â­ SkinGuard comb for protection.
â­ Anti-slip rubber grip.
â­ Pivoting Flex head that adapts to facial contours.

description_en:
Experience the ultimate shave with the **Braun Series 7 360 Flex**. This electric shaver adapts to your facial contours at a full 360Â°, ensuring a smooth and gentle shave even in tricky areas.

Featuring AutoSense technology, it reads and adapts to your beard density, automatically adjusting the shaver's power to capture and cut more hair with every shave. Enjoy up to 3 weeks of shaving with its powerful Li-Ion battery, plus a 5-minute quick charge for one full shave. Fully waterproof (100%), the **Braun Series 7 360 Flex** is perfect for both wet and dry use, and is compatible with the EasyClick system for added versatility.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun Series 7 360 Flex**
â­ Can be used on dry skin or with shaving foam/gel.
â­ For best results, glide the shaver gently over your skin.
â­ Clean the shaver regularly to ensure optimal performance.
â­ Quick charge for 5 minutes for a single shave if the battery is empty.
â­ Easy head replacement with the EasyClick system.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun Series 7 360 Flex**
â­ Precision cutting blades.
â­ 360Â° flexible shaver heads.
â­ Smart AutoSense technology.
â­ Lithium-ion battery.
â­ 100% waterproof body.

title_en: Braun Electric Shaver Series 6 (60-B1000s)
title_ar: Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÙˆÙ† Ù…Ø§ÙƒÙŠÙ†Ø© Ø­Ù„Ø§Ù‚Ø© Ø±Ø¬Ø§Ù„ÙŠ Ø§Ù„ÙØ¦Ø© 6 (60-B1000s)
description_en:
Experience superior closeness and exceptional comfort with the **Braun Electric Shaver Series 6 (60-B1000s)**. Featuring the innovative SensoFlex technology and a dermatologically tested pivoting head, it minimizes skin pressure for a comfortable shave, even on sensitive skin. The specially designed SensoFoil blades ensure a close shave while maintaining skin comfort.

The powerful Li-Ion battery offers up to 3 weeks of shaving (50 minutes) with the convenience of a 5-minute quick charge for a single shave. Enjoy the ultimate versatility with this 100% waterproof electric shaver, perfect for both dry and wet shaving.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun Electric Shaver Series 6 (60-B1000s)**:
â­ Cleanse your face and neck thoroughly before shaving.
â­ Apply shaving foam or gel for lubrication.
â­ Glide the shaver gently against the direction of hair growth.
â­ Rinse the shaver head after each use to maintain optimal performance.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun Electric Shaver Series 6 (60-B1000s)**:
â­ SensoFlex pivoting shaving head.
â­ SensoFoil blades for closeness and comfort.
â­ High-performance Li-Ion battery.
â­ 100% waterproof body.
â­ Quick charge function.

#Braun #ElectricShaver #MensGrooming #Shaving #Skincare #SensitiveSkin #CloseShave #PersonalCare #BestShaver #SaudiArabia

description_en:
**Braun Satin Hair 3 ST310 Hair Straightener**: Say goodbye to frizz with the **Braun Satin Hair 3 ST310 Hair Straightener**, featuring extra-wide 100% ceramic plates for ultra-fast and smooth styling. As part of Braun's smallest and lightest collection, this straightener delivers amazing results quickly and easily. The extra-wide plates ensure efficient styling with maximum hair protection thanks to temperature regulation and true ceramic.

â­ **Product Features:**
â­ 50% Wider Plates for faster and easier styling.
â­ Wide Range of 13 temperature settings for maximum styling flexibility.
â­ Cool Tip for safe handling and easy styling, great for waves and curls.
â­ Floating Plates for better protection and even results.
â­ 100% Ceramic Plates for a smooth glide and to prevent hair damage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun Satin Hair 3 ST310 Hair Straightener**:
â­ Begin with clean, dry hair.
â­ Apply a heat protectant to shield your strands.
â­ Choose the right temperature and section your hair.
â­ Glide the straightener down your hair from root to tip at a moderate pace.
â­ Comb through and add shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun Satin Hair 3 ST310 Hair Straightener**:
â­ 100% Ceramic Plates.
â­ Temperature regulation mechanism.
â­ Wide plates.
â­ Ergonomic design.
â­ Heat protection (sold separately).

description_en:
Experience long-lasting smoothness with the **Braun Silk-Ã©pil 3 170** epilator. Featuring Braun's Close-Grip technology, it captures and removes even the finest hairs (0.5mm) from the root for smoothness that lasts up to 4 weeks. The Smartlight technology ensures you don't miss any hairs, while massage rollers and a high-frequency massage system gently stimulate your skin for a more comfortable epilation experience. With 2 speed settings, you can customize your hair removal to suit your skin type and beauty routine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun Silk-Ã©pil 3 170**:
â­ Position the epilator at a 90-degree angle to your taut skin.
â­ Move the epilator slowly in the direction of hair growth.
â­ Start on a lower speed setting and gradually increase as tolerated.
â­ Moisturize your skin after use to reduce irritation.
â­ Clean the epilator thoroughly after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun Silk-Ã©pil 3 170**:
â­ 20 Micro-Grip tweezers for efficient hair removal.
â­ Smartlight technology to reveal fine hairs.
â­ Massage rollers and high-frequency massage system for enhanced comfort.
â­ Soft Lift TipsÂ® to lift flat-lying hairs.
â­ Corded operation for non-stop performance.

description_en:
Achieve a professional haircut at home with the **Braun Series 5 Cordless Hair Clipper**. This tool features ultra-sharp blades that effortlessly cut hair, regardless of length or thickness. It offers 17 different length settings with the Memory SafetyLock feature that saves your last used setting for an easy and comfortable styling experience.

The **Braun Series 5 Cordless Hair Clipper** is built to last with consistently sharp blades and a powerful Ni-MH battery providing up to 50 minutes of runtime. The ergonomic handle with a rubberised grip ensures comfortable use and easy cleaning under running water.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun Series 5 Cordless Hair Clipper**:
â­ Clean hair or light hair before use.
â­ Select the appropriate comb for your desired length.
â­ Turn on the device and start cutting from the bottom up.
â­ Use the Memory SafetyLock feature to save your preferred setting.
â­ After use, easily clean the device under running water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun Series 5 Cordless Hair Clipper**:
â­ Long-lasting sharp blades.
â­ Powerful Ni-MH battery.
â­ Ergonomic handle with rubberised grip.
â­ Small comb (3 â€“ 24 mm).
â­ Big comb (14 â€“ 35 mm).
â­ String pouch.

Experience long-lasting smoothness with the **Braun Silk-Ã©pil 3 3270** epilator. This perfect skincare tool removes even the finest hairs from the root, providing you with smooth skin for up to 4 weeks. It features a 20-tweezer system and Smartlight technology that reveals even the shortest hairs, ensuring thorough epilation. With dual speed settings and a high-frequency massage system, it offers a comfortable and effective hair removal experience. It comes with a shaver head, trimmer cap, and massage cap to meet all your beauty needs.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun Silk-Ã©pil 3 3270**:

description_en:
Experience grooming excellence with the **Braun** 10-in-1 Beard & Hair Styling Kit. This comprehensive set is engineered to deliver superior solutions for beard care, ear and nose trimming, hair clipping, and full body manscaping. The ultra-sharp metal blade ensures a fast and efficient shave every time, providing a comfortable and professional grooming experience. Discover precision and control with 40 length settings and a precision wheel, plus Autosense technology that adapts to any hair type, length, or thickness for incredible results with every use. Thanks to the powerful Li-Ion battery, enjoy 100 minutes of cordless runtime for ultimate convenience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun** 10-in-1 Beard & Hair Styling Kit:
â­ Use the included combs to precisely set your desired beard and hair length.
â­ Swap heads as needed for ear and nose trimming or detailing.
â­ Enjoy easy and comfortable body grooming.
â­ Ensure the device is fully charged before first use for optimal performance.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun** 10-in-1 Beard & Hair Styling Kit:
â­ Ultra-sharp metal blade.
â­ Precision Wheel with 40 length settings.
â­ Attachable beard and hair combs.
â­ Body groomer head & Sensitive comb.
â­ Ear & nose trimmer.
â­ Detail trimmer.
â­ Fixed combs with 1mm & 2mm.
â­ Gillette Pro Glide razor.
â­ Charging stand.

#Braun #Trimmer #Grooming #MensCare #BeardStyling #HairStyling #PersonalCare #Shaver #Gillette #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Achieve your style effortlessly with the **Braun Electrical Beard Trimmer Machine 3 - Bt3240**. It's sharper, faster, and more efficient compared to all previous generations of Braun beard trimmers. The precision dial offers 39 length settings in 0.5 mm step sizes for an effortless trimming experience. Featuring Lifetime Sharp Blades for even beard trimming and hair clipping, you can create accurate lines and edges on your neck and cheeks with the main beard trimmer head. Enjoy German technology and an ergonomic build, for up to 80 minutes of cordless trimming.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun Electrical Beard Trimmer Machine 3 - Bt3240**:
â­ Select your desired length using the precision dial.
â­ Trim your beard or hair to achieve your desired look.
â­ The trimmer head and comb are washable, but the device itself should not be submerged in water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun Electrical Beard Trimmer Machine 3 - Bt3240**:
â­ Lifetime Sharp Blades.
â­ Precision dial with 39 length settings.
â­ Main beard trimmer head.
â­ Comb attachment.
â­ Charger.

description_en:
Achieve effortless shaving, trimming, and edging with the **Braun XT3 & XT5** Trimmer Attachments. Designed for men's grooming needs, these attachments offer a smooth and comfortable experience for your face and body.

â­ **Product Features:**
    * Brand: Braun

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun XT3 & XT5**:
    * Shave, trim, and edge with ease using the included combs for facial hair (1, 2, 3, 5 mm) and body grooming (0, 3 mm).
    * Experience close shave yet gentle on skin thanks to the 4D-Blade technology.
    * Protect your skin in sensitive areas with the SkinGuard comb.
    * Enjoy precision and control with the pivoting Flex head and two-way comb.
    * Fully waterproof for wet or dry use, including in the shower.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun XT3 & XT5**:
    * 4D-Blade technology with 4 cutting elements for 450 movements per second.
    * Durable stainless steel blade, sharp for up to 6 months.
    * SkinGuard comb for enhanced skin protection.
    * Click-on combs for easy length selection (1, 2, 3, 5 mm for face; 3 mm and 0 mm for body).
    * Rubberized, anti-slip handle for secure grip.

#Braun #BeardTrimmer #Shaver #MensGrooming #BraunProducts #Shaving #MensEssentials #FacialHair #PersonalCare #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience the ultimate shave with the **Braun Series 7 71-S1000s**, an electric shaver engineered for a superior shaving experience, even on the toughest beards. Featuring innovative AutoSense technology, this shaver automatically adapts to your beard density, ensuring an efficient and comfortable shave with fewer strokes. Its 360Â° Flex Head precisely follows your facial contours, while its powerful motor and sharp blades deliver a close shave that minimizes irritation. Enjoy the flexibility of wet or dry use, and a long-lasting battery providing up to 50 minutes of cordless shaving for complete freedom.

â­ AutoSense Technology for intelligent beard density adaptation.
â­ 360Â° Flex Head for precise contouring in tricky areas.
â­ Efficient shaving that captures hairs effectively.
â­ Wet or dry use for a comfortable, personalized shave.
â­ Long-lasting battery offering 50 minutes of cordless shaving.
â­ Reduces skin irritation for a customized shaving experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun Series 7 71-S1000s**
â­ Fully charge the shaver before first use.
â­ Turn on the device and stretch your skin taut with one hand for easier shaving.
â­ Glide the shaver in short, circular motions over your skin.
â­ Clean the shaver regularly according to instructions to maintain performance.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun Series 7 71-S1000s**
â­ High-quality sharp blades.
â­ AutoSense beard density sensing technology.
â­ 360Â° flexible shaving head.
â­ Powerful lithium-ion battery.
â­ Ergonomic body for wet and dry use.

description_en:
Discover ultimate precision with the **Braun Electrical Trimmer Machine 5 - MGK5280 (9x1)**, the all-in-one styling kit designed to deliver 9 jobs with 1 device.

â­ Maintain your beard at any length, from stubble to long, with precise edge definition and a clean shave.
â­ Perfect for clipping hair, shaping your beard, grooming body hair, and trimming ear and nose hair.
â­ Enjoy unparalleled cutting performance compared to previous generations of Braun beard trimmers.
â­ Includes a free Gillette Fusion5 ProGlide razor for a smooth, clean shave.
â­ Lifetime Sharp Blades with 13 length settings for ultimate, infinite styling precision.
â­ AutoSensing motor adapts to your beard's density for an effortless trimming experience.
â­ Innovative German technology with a Li-ion+ battery providing 100 minutes of trimming after just 1 hour of charging.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun Electrical Trimmer Machine 5 - MGK5280 (9x1)**:
â­ Use the various attachments for beard trimming, hair clipping, body grooming, and ear/nose hair removal.
â­ Select your desired length from the 13 settings for the perfect look.
â­ Charge the device for a full hour to get 100 minutes of continuous use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun Electrical Trimmer Machine 5 - MGK5280 (9x1)**:
â­ Main trimmer body with various trimming attachments.
â­ High-quality, long-lasting sharp blades.
â­ Built-in, rechargeable Li-ion+ battery.
â­ Complimentary Gillette Fusion5 ProGlide razor.

#Braun #Trimmer #BeardTrimmer #BeardStyling #MensGrooming #MensCare #HairCare #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah

title_en: Braun BT3221 Electrical Beard Trimmer Machine - Professional Precision
title_ar: Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÙˆÙ† Ù…ÙƒÙŠÙ†Ø© Ø­Ù„Ø§Ù‚Ø© ÙˆØªØ´Ø°ÙŠØ¨ Ø§Ù„Ù„Ø­ÙŠØ© BT3221 - Ø¯Ù‚Ø© Ø§Ø­ØªØ±Ø§ÙÙŠØ©
description_en:
Master your look with the **Braun Electrical Beard Trimmer Machine** BT3221, the ultimate tool for precisely shaping your beard and facial hair. This trimmer offers a seamless grooming experience thanks to its precision dial with 20 length settings (in 0.5mm steps) and long-lasting sharp blades. Whether you want to maintain short to medium beards or create crisp edges on your neck and cheeks, the **Braun Electrical Beard Trimmer Machine** gives you complete control. Featuring German technology and an ergonomic design, you can enjoy up to 50 minutes of cordless trimming after a 10-hour full charge. The trimmer head and comb are washable for easy cleaning.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun Electrical Beard Trimmer Machine**:
â­ Always shave before washing your face for best results.
â­ Hold the trimmer at a right angle (90 degrees) to your skin at all times.
â­ Stretch your skin and shave against the direction of your beard growth.
â­ The trimmer head and comb are washable, but the entire device should not be submerged in water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun Electrical Beard Trimmer Machine**:
â­ Precision dial with 20 length settings (0.5 - 10mm).
â­ Lifetime sharp blades for efficient cutting without pulling.
â­ Short to medium beard comb (0.5-10mm).
â­ Main trimmer head for creating precise lines and edges.
â­ Rechargeable battery providing up to 50 minutes of cordless use.
â­ Ergonomic German design for intuitive handling.
â­ Rechargeable with a 10-hour full charge.

title_en: Braun Series 5 Easy Clean 50-B1000s: Superior Shaving with Effortless Cleaning
title_ar: Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÙˆÙ† Ø³Ù„Ø³Ù„Ø© 5 Ø³Ù‡Ù„Ø© Ø§Ù„ØªÙ†Ø¸ÙŠÙ 50-B1000s: Ø­Ù„Ø§Ù‚Ø© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø© Ù…Ø¹ ØªÙ†Ø¸ÙŠÙ Ø³Ù‡Ù„
description_en:
Experience an exceptionally smooth shave with the **Braun Series 5 Easy Clean 50-B1000s** electric shaver for men. This shaver features three flexible blades that adapt seamlessly to your facial contours for a close and comfortable shave. The EasyClean system allows for quick and effortless cleaning without removing the shaver head, saving you time and effort.

The Li-Ion battery provides power for up to 3 weeks of shaving, with a 5-minute quick charge feature for a full shave when you're in a hurry. Being 100% waterproof, you can use the **Braun Series 5 Easy Clean 50-B1000s** for both dry and wet shaving, offering greater flexibility in your grooming routine.

#Braun #Series5 #ElectricShaver #MensGrooming #EasyClean #QuickCharge #Waterproof #Shaving #OnlineShopping #SaudiArabia

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun Series 5 Easy Clean 50-B1000s**
â­ Use the shaver on dry or wet skin according to your preference.
â­ For optimal performance, clean the shaver after each use via the EasyClean system.
â­ Benefit from the 5-minute quick charge for a complete shave.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun Series 5 Easy Clean 50-B1000s**
â­ 3 flexible blades for perfect facial adaptation.
â­ AutoSense technology to adjust shaver power to beard density.
â­ Long-lasting Lithium-Ion battery.
â­ 100% waterproof design for wet and dry use.

title_en: Braun BT7350: The Professional Beard Trimmer for Your Perfect Look
title_ar: Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÙˆÙ† BT7350: Ù…Ø§ÙƒÙŠÙ†Ø© ØªÙ‡Ø°ÙŠØ¨ Ø§Ù„Ù„Ø­ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø­ØªØ±Ø§ÙÙŠØ© Ù„Ù„Ø­ØµÙˆÙ„ Ø¹Ù„Ù‰ Ø¥Ø·Ù„Ø§Ù„Ø© Ù…Ø«Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ©
description_en:
Achieve your perfect look effortlessly with the **Braun BT7350** beard trimmer & hair clipper for men. This trimmer is designed to be sharper, faster, and more efficient, with a wider cutting area that captures and cuts more hair in every stroke. Enjoy ultimate precision and control with AutoSense technology that adapts to your beard type and hair length, ensuring precise trimming at any length. With 39 length settings and a precision dial, you can easily shape and style your beard, mustache, or goatee with utmost accuracy. Lifetime sharp blades and advanced German engineering make this the perfect choice for even and consistent beard trimming every time. The trimmer is 100% waterproof and features a powerful Li-Ion battery for 100 minutes of continuous use, along with an additional safety comb for an extra-gentle trim.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun BT7350**
â­ Start by cleaning and thoroughly drying your beard.
â­ Select the desired comb and length using the precision dial.
â­ Glide the trimmer over your beard in smooth strokes, against the direction of hair growth for best results.
â­ Use the precision trimmer head for detailing and sharp lines.
â­ After use, wash the trimmer head and combs with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun BT7350**
â­ Main trimmer body.
â­ Precision trimmer head.
â­ Lifetime sharp stainless steel blades.
â­ 39 length settings (0.5 mm - 20 mm).
â­ Li-Ion battery (100 minutes runtime).
â­ Additional safety comb.
â­ Charger.
â­ Cleaning brush.

#Braun #BeardTrimmer #Grooming #MensCare #BeardStyle #HairTrimmer #GermanEngineering #SaudiStyle #PrecisionGrooming #FacialHair

title_en: Braun 6-in-1 Electric Trimmer for Face, Beard & Hair
title_ar: Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÙˆÙ† Ù…Ø§ÙƒÙŠÙ†Ø© ØªØ´Ø°ÙŠØ¨ ÙƒÙ‡Ø±Ø¨Ø§Ø¦ÙŠØ© 6 ÙÙŠ 1 Ù„Ù„ÙˆØ¬Ù‡ ÙˆØ§Ù„Ù„Ø­ÙŠØ© ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø±
description_en:
Experience ultimate men's grooming with the **Braun 6-in-1 Electric Trimmer for Face, Beard & Hair**. This all-in-one trimmer offers unparalleled performance with lifetime sharp blades and 13 length settings for precise trimming of your face, hair, and beard.

â­ **Unmatched Performance:** Enjoy cutting performance unparalleled compared to previous generations of Braun beard trimmers.
â­ **Ultimate Precision:** Lifetime sharp blades and 13 length settings provide ultimate precision for your styling needs.
â­ **Complete Control:** The **Braun 6-in-1 Electric Trimmer for Face, Beard & Hair** kit gives you absolute control to style your face, hair, and beard.
â­ **Versatile Functionality:** Includes 4 combs covering 13 length settings from 0.5 to 21 mm, plus an ear and nose trimmer attachment.
â­ **Long-Lasting Battery:** Get 50 minutes of cordless trimming after a 10-hour charge.
â­ **German Design:** Ergonomic grip ensures an effortless and enjoyable trimming experience.
â­ **Lifetime Sharp Blades:** Easily cut through long or thick hair without pulling and tugging.
â­ **Ultimate Styling Kit:** Achieve 6 different jobs with one device.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun 6-in-1 Electric Trimmer for Face, Beard & Hair**:
â­ Always shave before washing your face.
â­ Hold the shaver at a right angle (90 degrees) to your skin at all times.
â­ Stretch your skin and shave against the direction of your beard growth.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun 6-in-1 Electric Trimmer for Face, Beard & Hair**:
â­ 1 x Braun Trimmer
â­ 4 x Combs
â­ 1 x Nose trimmer head
â­ 1 x Ear trimmer head
â­ 1 x Cleaning brush

#Braun #Trimmer #BeardTrim #MensGrooming #FacialHair #ElectricShaver #StylingTools #SaudiStyle #UAEBeauty #GCCFashion

title_ar: Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÙˆÙ† Ù…Ø§ÙƒÙŠÙ†Ø© Ø­Ù„Ø§Ù‚Ø© Ø±Ø¬Ø§Ù„ÙŠ Ø§Ù„ÙØ¦Ø© 7 (7840S) â€“ Ø­Ù„Ø§Ù‚Ø© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù†Ø¹ÙˆÙ…Ø©
description_en:
Experience a superior, gentle shave with the **Braun Series 7 Electric Shaver (7840S)**. This shaver combines intelligent technology with skin comfort for an unparalleled shaving experience. Its AutoSensing technology reads and adapts to your beard density, optimizing power to capture more hair in every stroke, ensuring a quick, efficient, and irritation-free shave. The 360Â° flexible head follows your facial contours with precision, reaching even difficult areas for complete coverage. Made in Germany, it's built for durability and high performance.

â­ AutoSensing Technology: Reads and automatically adapts to your beard density.
â­ Li-Ion Battery: Provides 50 minutes of shaving on a full charge, with a 5-minute quick charge for one shave.
â­ 100% Waterproof: For dry, wet, or shower use.
â­ 5 Shaving Modes: To personalize your shave according to your skin type.
â­ 8-D Flexible Head: Captures hair as short as 0.05mm.
â­ Precision Trimmer: For precise and easy shaping of mustaches and sideburns.
â­ Advanced Display: Shows charge, battery, and hygiene status.
â­ Global Use: With automatic 100-240V voltage adjustment.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun Series 7 Electric Shaver (7840S)**
â­ Always shave before washing your face.
â­ Hold the shaver at a 90-degree angle to your skin at all times.
â­ Stretch your skin and shave against the direction of your beard growth.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun Series 7 Electric Shaver (7840S)**
â­ Braun Series 7 Shaver (7840S).
â­ Travel pouch.
â­ Smart charger.
â­ Cleaning brush.

title_ar: Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÙˆÙ† Ø¬Ù‡Ø§Ø² ÙØ±Ø¯ Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø³Ø§ØªÙŠÙ† (7) Ø¨ØªÙ‚Ù†ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ø£ÙŠÙˆÙ†Ø§Øª ST710
description_en:
Achieve shiny, healthy hair with the **Braun Satin Hair (7) Straightener with IONTEC Technology**. This innovative device is specially designed to protect your hair from heat damage while preserving its natural shine. Discover the power of IONTEC technology that tames frizz and combats static electricity, leaving your hair smooth and sleek. With 15 precise temperature settings, you can choose the perfect level for your hair, ensuring healthy and safe styling.

âœ¨ Product Features:
â­ **IONTEC Technology**: Millions of active ions infuse your hair with superior shine and reduce frizz by combating static.
â­ **Accurate Heat Control**: 15 temperature settings (130-200Â°C) to protect hair health and ensure precise styling.
â­ **100% Ceramic Plates**: Floating plates distribute pressure evenly and provide a super-smooth glide for ultimate protection against damage.
â­ **Cool Tip Design**: For safe handling, perfect for creating waves and curls.
â­ **Temperature Boost Button**: For easy styling of difficult hair.
â­ **NanoGlide Ceramic Plates**: Glide 3x smoother than conventional ceramic plates to maintain hair cuticle health.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun Satin Hair (7) Straightener with IONTEC Technology**:
â­ Start with clean, dry hair. Apply your preferred heat protectant.
â­ Section your hair. Choose the appropriate temperature for your hair type.
â­ Glide the straightener down each strand from root to tip in one pass. Avoid gliding too fast or too slow.
â­ Once finished, comb through your hair and add a finishing serum or taming spray.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun Satin Hair (7) Straightener with IONTEC Technology**:
â­ Plates are made of 100% Ceramic with NanoGlide technology for maximum smoothness and protection.
â­ The device features an active ion generating system (IONTEC).

description_en:
Achieve stunning hairstyles quickly and easily with the **Braun Satin Hair (5)** Hair Dryer, boasting a powerful 2500 Watt output. This dryer combines immense power with a lightweight design for professional results right at home. Experience advanced Ionic Technology that nourishes your hair, boosts shine, tames frizz, and effectively combats static electricity.

â­ Advanced Ionic Technology: Nourishes hair, boosts shine, and eliminates frizz.
â­ 3 Heat & 2 Airflow Settings: Offers complete flexibility for drying and styling.
â­ 2500 Watt Power: Delivers super-fast and efficient drying for your hair.
â­ Lightweight & Ergonomic Design: Ensures comfortable, extended use.
â­ Even-Heat Distribution: Prevents hair dryness and maintains health.
â­ Infrared Heating System: For faster, more efficient drying.
â­ Cold Shot Function: Sets your style for long-lasting results.
â­ Styling Nozzle & Diffuser: For sleek styles and added root volume.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun Satin Hair (5)**:
â­ If hair is wet, start drying with cold air or a towel.
â­ Always use a heat protectant.
â­ Dry hair from front to back, paying attention to roots.
â­ Finish with a blast of cold air to set your style.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun Satin Hair (5)**:
â­ 2500 Watt Hair Dryer
â­ Ionic Technology
â­ 3 Heat Settings
â­ 2 Airflow Settings
â­ Styling Nozzle
â­ Diffuser Attachment

title_en: Braun Silk-Ã©pil 851 Facial Epilator & Cleansing Brush with 4 Attachments
title_ar: Braun Silk-Ã©pil 851: Ø¬Ù‡Ø§Ø² Ø¥Ø²Ø§Ù„Ø© Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ¬Ù‡ ÙˆÙØ±Ø´Ø§Ø© Ø§Ù„ØªÙ†Ø¸ÙŠÙ Ù…Ø¹ 4 Ù…Ù„Ø­Ù‚Ø§Øª
description_en:
The **Braun Silk-Ã©pil** 851 is the world's first facial epilator and cleansing brush system, offering two treatments in one device by simply switching attachments. It precisely removes facial hair from the root for up to 4 weeks of hair-free skin and cleanses skin pore-deep with hundreds of micro-oscillations, making it 6x better than manual cleansing.

â­ Features a slim epilator head with 10 micro-openings that capture even the finest hairs down to 0.02 mm.
â­ The sonic cleansing brush deeply cleanses skin, removing makeup and impurities for enhanced skin radiance.
â­ It's Wet & Dry use compatible, perfect for your shower routine.
â­ Powered by a replaceable AA battery for convenient cordless use.
â­ Comes with 4 attachments to meet all your skincare needs, including Normal, Extra Sensitive, Exfoliation brushes, and a Beauty Sponge.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun Silk-Ã©pil**:
â­ For epilation, use the device against the direction of hair growth.
â­ For daily cleansing, use the brush suitable for your skin type.
â­ Use the beauty sponge to apply creams, serums, or foundation.
â­ Use the exfoliation brush weekly to remove dead skin cells.
â­ Always rinse brushes after use and replace them every 3 months for optimal performance.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun Silk-Ã©pil**:
â­ Slim epilator head with 10 micro-openings.
â­ Sonic facial cleansing brush.
â­ Exfoliation brush.
â­ Beauty sponge.
â­ Extra Sensitive brush.
â­ AA Battery.

#Braun #SilkEpil #HairRemoval #Skincare #FacialCleansing #BeautyTech #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #GlowingSkin

description_en:
Dry and style your hair with the **Braun Satin Hair 3 Air Styler AS330**, designed for superior care and professional styling in one go. Enjoy smooth, shiny hair thanks to its 100% ceramic coating, ensuring even heat distribution and protecting your hair from dryness and breakage.

â­ Integrated design for drying, styling, and protecting your hair in one step.
â­ 100% ceramic coating for gentle styling surfaces.
â­ Even heat distribution prevents hair damage and maintains natural moisture.
â­ Comes with multiple attachments: 18mm round brush for curls and flicks, 36mm round brush for waves, and a finger attachment to boost volume at the roots.
â­ 400 Watts of power for fast and effective drying and styling results.
â­ 2 temperature and airflow settings for customized styling according to your hair needs.
â­ 2-meter long power cord for flexibility and freedom of movement during styling.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun Satin Hair 3 Air Styler AS330**:
â­ Select the appropriate attachment for your desired hairstyle.
â­ Use the suitable temperature and airflow settings.
â­ Glide the brush through sections of hair while drying to shape your style.
â­ For root lift, use the finger attachment.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun Satin Hair 3 Air Styler AS330**:
â­ Plates Material: 100% Ceramic
â­ Wattage: 400 Watts
â­ Temperature/Airflow Settings: 2
â­ Cable Length: 2m
â­ Voltage: 220-240 V
â­ Frequency: 50-60 Hz

The **Braun FaceSpa Sensitive Beauty + Cleansing Brush 832S** precisely removes facial hair from the root and cleanses your skin pore-deep, leaving it looking revitalized and healthy. This special edition includes an extra brush for sensitive skin, a rose cap, and a luxurious beauty pouch, making it the ideal gift for your loved one.

description_en:
Reveal your most radiant skin with the **Braun** Replacement Brushes for Face Kit. This 4-piece set is expertly designed to cater to all your skin's unique needs, offering a superior cleansing experience.

â­ Achieve clearer, brighter skin with the specially designed replacement brushes for the **Braun** Face Kit. This set provides a deeper, more effective cleanse, removing impurities and makeup up to 6x better than manual cleansing.

â­ Normal Brush: For deep daily cleansing, removes makeup and impurities up to 6x better than manual cleansing.
â­ Extra Sensitive Brush: Ideal for sensitive, dry, and delicate skin, providing an extra-gentle cleansing experience.
â­ Exfoliation Brush: Gently sweeps away dead skin cells to visibly refine and revitalize your complexion.
â­ Beauty Sponge: Perfect for massaging in creams or serums, and for precise makeup application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun** Replacement Brushes For Face Kit (4 pieces) #80-m:
â­ Replace brushes every 3 months to maintain optimal performance and hygiene.
â­ Use each brush or sponge according to your skin type and needs for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun** Replacement Brushes For Face Kit (4 pieces) #80-m:
â­ Normal Brush.
â­ Extra Sensitive Brush.
â­ Exfoliation Brush.
â­ Beauty Sponge.

title_ar: Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÙˆÙ† ÙÙŠØ³ Ø³Ø¨Ø§ ÙŠØ§Ù†Øº Ø¨ÙŠÙˆØªÙŠ + ÙØ±Ø´Ø§Ø© ØªÙ†Ø¸ÙŠÙ 832E | Ù‡Ø¯ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ù†Ø³Ø®Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø­Ø¯ÙˆØ¯Ø©
description_en:
Treat your face to flawless radiance with the **Braun FaceSpa Young Beauty + Cleansing Brush 832E**. Discover a complete skincare experience with Braun's revolutionary facial epilator and cleansing brush system. This innovative device combines two treatments in one, delivering smoother, clearer skin.

The **Braun FaceSpa Young Beauty + Cleansing Brush 832E** is the perfect gift for your loved ones, featuring a sleek design, a luxurious presentation case, and extra attachments to enhance your beauty routine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun FaceSpa Young Beauty + Cleansing Brush 832E**
â­ Before first use, ensure the device is fully charged.
â­ For epilation, attach the epilator head and gently glide it over clean, dry skin against the direction of hair growth.
â­ For cleansing, use the cleansing brush with your favorite facial cleanser. Move the brush in gentle circular motions on damp skin.
â­ Use daily or as needed for optimal results.
â­ After use, rinse attachments thoroughly and dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun FaceSpa Young Beauty + Cleansing Brush 832E**
â­ The core **Braun FaceSpa Young Beauty + Cleansing Brush 832E** device.
â­ Facial epilator attachment with 10 micro-openings.
â­ Facial cleansing brush attachment with micro-oscillations.
â­ Additional exfoliating facial brush.
â­ Turquoise cap.
â­ Stylish beauty pouch.

#Braun #Skincare #FacialCleansing #HairRemoval #SaudiDeals #WomensGifts #Beauty #RadiantSkin #HomeSpa #DailyCare

description_en:
Indulge your skin with superior care with the **Braun FaceSpa Pure Beauty + Cleansing Brush 832N**, a limited edition gift set combining effective facial hair removal and deep skin cleansing. Enjoy a fresh radiance and amazing results with this innovative device that offers two treatments in one. The **Braun FaceSpa Pure Beauty + Cleansing Brush 832N** precisely removes facial hair from the root with its integrated epilator and deeply cleanses your skin's pores with its gentle cleansing brush. This luxurious package includes additional accessories to enhance your skincare experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Braun FaceSpa Pure Beauty + Cleansing Brush 832N**:
â­ Facial Epilator: With its sleek and compact design, it ensures precise removal of unwanted facial hair with 10 micro-openings that catch even the finest hairs (0.02mm).
â­ Facial Cleansing Brush: Thanks to its micro-oscillations, this brush deeply cleanses skin pores, is gentle on sensitive skin, and suitable for daily use.
â­ Dermatologist-tested to provide cleansing 6 times more effectively than manual cleansing.
â­ Comes with two essential attachments: a lilac cap to protect the brush, an extra brush for optimal performance, and a stylish beauty pouch for storage.
â­ The perfect solution for smoother, clearer, and more radiant skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Braun FaceSpa Pure Beauty + Cleansing Brush 832N**:
â­ High-precision facial epilator with 10 micro-openings.
â­ Micro-oscillation facial cleansing brush.
â­ Lilac protective cap attachment.
â­ Extra cleansing brush head.
â­ Elegant beauty pouch.
â­ Rechargeable batteries.

#Braun #Skincare #FacialCleansingBrush #HairRemoval #Beauty #SkinRadiance #Makeup #Deals #Gifts #SaudiArabia
