description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort with **Private Maxi Super Wings**.

Say goodbye to worries and hello to confidence with **Private Maxi Super Wings** sanitary pads. Designed for maximum protection and comfort, they ensure you can move freely throughout your day. Enjoy long-lasting dryness and a feeling of freshness thanks to the natural cotton-feel top sheet, which keeps your skin soft and revitalized.

The pads feature wings for a flexible fit and unparalleled security, preventing leaks and keeping the pad in place during movement. Super-absorbent channels instantly draw fluid away and lock it in, providing up to 100% dryness and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Private Maxi Super Wings**:
â­ The sanitary pads have adhesive strips to attach securely to your panties.
â­ Remove the paper backing and press the sticky side of the pad to your underwear.
â­ If your pad also has wings, these are extra flaps that fold over the sides of your underwear.
â­ For more protection, remove the paper backing, wrap the wings around the crotch, and press firmly to the underside of your panties.
â­ Change your pad regularly every 3-4 hours or as needed to ensure cleanliness and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Private Maxi Super Wings**:
â­ Natural cotton-feel top cover for unique softness and comfort.
â­ Flexible absorption channels that absorb fluid instantly and lock it inside.
â­ Wings for a flexible fit and better leak control.
â­ High-absorbency materials ensuring up to 100% dryness and comfort.

#Private #SanitaryPads #FeminineCare #AllDayProtection #UltimateComfort #DryAndFresh #FeminineProducts #SaudiArabia #HealthAndHygiene #SaudiDeals

description_en:
Discover ultimate protection with **Private Extra Thin Night**, your perfect solution for a peaceful sleep and worry-free nights. These feminine pads feature exceptional liquid absorption, even during heavy flow, thanks to super absorbent channels that instantly trap fluid and keep it locked away.

**Private Extra Thin Night** is specifically designed to provide you with maximum comfort, featuring a natural cotton-feel top cover that offers superior softness to your skin, keeping it dry and fresh. Innovative wings ensure a flexible fit and excellent leak control, giving you complete confidence and freedom of movement to go about your day with ease.

Enjoy up to 100% dryness and comfort throughout the night, even when you move, so you can wake up refreshed and ready for a new day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Private Extra Thin Night**:
â­ Sanitary pads have adhesive strips to attach securely to your underwear.
â­ Remove the paper backing and press the sticky side of the pad to your underwear.
â­ If the pad has wings, wrap them around the sides of your underwear and press firmly to the underside for extra security.
â­ It is recommended to change the pad every 3-4 hours or as needed to ensure cleanliness and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Private Extra Thin Night**:
â­ Super Absorbent Materials.
â­ Natural Cotton-Feel Top Cover.
â­ Adhesive Strips.
â­ Securing Wings.

title_en: Private Wings Night 48 Pads - Superior Comfort & Softness
title_ar: Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÙŠÙØª Ù…Ø§ÙƒØ³ÙŠ Ø³ÙˆØ¨Ø±Ù„ÙŠÙ„ÙŠ 48 Ø­Ø¨Ø© - Ø±Ø§Ø­Ø© ÙˆÙ†Ø¹ÙˆÙ…Ø© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø©
description_en:
Experience ultimate protection and comfort with **Private Wings Night 48 Pads**. **Private** pads feature unparalleled fluid absorption power, with wings for a better fit, flexibility, and optimal leak control. Enjoy the natural cotton feel that provides unmatched softness and all-day comfort, with a top layer that always stays dry to maintain your skin's health. Flexible absorption channels move with you, preventing friction and giving you endless freshness and confidence. **Private Wings Night 48 Pads** instantly absorb and lock away fluid, ensuring up to 100% dryness and comfort even during movement.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Private Wings Night 48 Pads**:
â­ The sanitary pads have adhesive strips to securely attach to your underwear.
â­ Remove the paper backing and press the sticky side of the pad to your underwear.
â­ If your pad also has wings, there are extra flaps that fold over the sides of your underwear for enhanced protection.
â­ For extra security, remove the paper backing, wrap the wings around the crotch, and press firmly to the underside of your panties.
â­ It's recommended to change the pad every 3-4 hours or as needed to ensure cleanliness and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Private Wings Night 48 Pads**:
â­ Soft top layer with a natural cotton feel.
â­ Super absorbent channels that absorb and lock away fluid.
â­ Wings for better adhesion, flexibility, and leak protection.
â­ Bottom cover that provides dryness and comfort.
â­ Strong adhesive strips.

#PrivatePads #SanitaryNapkins #WomensHealth #PersonalCare #FeminineHygiene #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #DailyComfort #PeriodCare

title_en: Private Maxi Pads with Wings - 30 Pcs for Superior Comfort
title_ar: Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÙŠÙØª Ø­ÙØ§ÙŠØ¸ Ù…Ø§ÙƒØ³ÙŠ Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø¬Ù†Ø­Ø© â€“ 30 Ù‚Ø·Ø¹Ø© Ù„Ø±Ø§Ø­Ø© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø©
description_en:
Experience unparalleled comfort and lasting dryness with **Private Maxi Normal 30 pcs** pads. Designed for ultimate protection and a confident, fresh feeling throughout your day. These pads feature a soft, cotton-like feel against your skin and innovative absorption channels that quickly draw fluid away, keeping you dry even with movement.

â­ Provides superior all-day protection.
â­ Natural cotton-feel top cover for exceptional softness.
â­ Fast absorption channels that keep moisture away from your skin.
â­ Wings offer flexible fit and excellent leak control.
â­ Friction-free design keeps you refreshed.
â­ Up to 100% dryness and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Private Maxi Normal 30 pcs**:
â­ Pads have adhesive strips to attach securely to your underwear.
â­ Remove the paper backing and press the sticky side of the pad to your underwear.
â­ If your pad has wings, wrap them around the sides of your underwear for extra security.
â­ Change the pad regularly every 3-4 hours or as needed to ensure cleanliness and comfort.
â­ Do not flush used products in the toilet.
â­ Keep the plastic packaging away from children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Private Maxi Normal 30 pcs**:
â­ Natural cotton-feel top layer.
â­ Super absorbent layer.
â­ Innovative liquid absorption channels.
â­ Adhesive wings for securement.
â­ Safe and skin-friendly materials.

description_en:
Experience ultimate protection and comfort with **Private** Regular With Wings. Designed with unique absorption power, these pads keep you dry and fresh all day long. Featuring a natural cotton-feel top cover, **Private** offers superior softness against your skin, while flexible absorption channels move with you to minimize friction. The wings ensure a better fit and optimal leak control, empowering you with confidence in every move. Say goodbye to worries and enjoy your day with complete comfort and security with **Private**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Private**:
â­ Sanitary pads have adhesive strips to attach securely to your underwear.
â­ Remove the paper backing and press the sticky side of the pad to your underwear.
â­ If your pad also has wings, these are extra flaps that fold over the sides of your underwear.
â­ For added protection, remove the paper backing, wrap the wings around the crotch, and press firmly to the underside of your panties.
â­ Change your pad regularly, typically every 3-4 hours, or more often if needed, to maintain cleanliness and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Private**:
â­ Natural cotton-feel top layer.
â­ Super absorbent channels for instant fluid absorption.
â­ Wings for flexible fit and better leak control.
â­ High absorbency materials for dryness.

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort and exceptional protection with **Private Maxi With Wings 16 pcs**. These compressed and folded sanitary pads feature wings for a better fit, improved flexibility, and superior leak control. The natural cotton-feel top cover provides unparalleled softness and comfort, while the innovative absorption channels quickly draw fluid away and lock it in, ensuring you feel dry and confident even during movement.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Private Maxi With Wings 16 pcs**:
â­ Sanitary pads have adhesive strips to attach securely to your panties. Remove the paper backing and press the sticky side of the pad to your underwear. If your pad has wings, remove the paper backing, wrap the wings around the crotch, and press firmly to the underside of your panties for enhanced protection.
â­ It is recommended to change your pad regularly every 3-4 hours or as needed to ensure optimal hygiene and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Private Maxi With Wings 16 pcs**:
â­ Natural cotton-feel top layer for superior comfort and softness.
â­ Advanced absorption channels for instant fluid wicking.
â­ Wing design for better fit and leak control.
â­ High-absorbency materials for lasting dryness.
â­ Skin-friendly materials to prevent irritation.

description_en:
Discover ultimate comfort with the **Private Miss Teen** special offer of 20 pieces. These ultra-thin **Private** pads provide maximum protection and absorption for fluids and discharge, thanks to their innovative design and superior absorption channels that lock away liquid instantly, giving you a feeling of up to 100% dryness and comfort, even while on the move. The pads feature a natural cotton feel that imparts exceptional softness to your skin, maintaining its health and freshness. The wings offer a better fit, flexibility, and perfect leak control. Enjoy unwavering confidence as you go about your daily activities with **Private Miss Teen**, designed to provide you with round-the-clock security and protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Private Miss Teen**:
â­ The sanitary pads have adhesive strips to attach securely to your underwear.
â­ Remove the paper backing and press the sticky side of the pad to your underwear.
â­ If your pad also has wings, these are extra flaps that fold over the sides of your underwear for added protection.
â­ For enhanced security, remove the paper backing, wrap the wings around the crotch, and press firmly to the underside of your panties.
â­ It is recommended to change your pad regularly every 3-4 hours or as needed to ensure maximum cleanliness and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Private Miss Teen**:
â­ Natural cotton-feel top layer for superior comfort and softness.
â­ Advanced absorption channels for instant fluid absorption.
â­ Side wings for a better fit, flexibility, and leak control.
â­ Highly absorbent materials to ensure absolute dryness.
â­ A top cover that keeps skin dry.

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort and all-day confidence with **Private Maxi Super Absorption with Wings**. These sanitary pads are designed to offer you superior protection and unmatched comfort. They feature rapid fluid absorption, leaving you feeling dry and fresh. The natural cotton-feel top cover provides exceptional softness to your skin, protecting it from irritation and friction. Innovative absorption channels are designed to move with you and provide reliable leak protection, giving you freedom of movement and comfort throughout the day. **Private Maxi Super Absorption with Wings** is your perfect choice for maintaining hygiene and dryness at all times.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Private Maxi Super Absorption with Wings**:
â­ The sanitary pads have adhesive strips for secure attachment to underwear.
â­ Remove the paper backing and press the sticky side of the pad to your underwear.
â­ If your pad also has wings, extra flaps fold over the sides of your underwear for added protection.
â­ Remove the paper backing, wrap the wings around the crotch, and press firmly to the underside of your panties.
â­ It is recommended to change the pad every 3-4 hours or as needed to ensure cleanliness and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Private Maxi Super Absorption with Wings**:
â­ Soft natural cotton-feel top cover for superior comfort.
â­ Dry top layer to keep skin fresh.
â­ Super absorption channels for instant fluid absorption.
â­ Flexible wings for better fit and leak prevention.
â­ Compressed and individually wrapped design for easy portability.

#Private #FemininePads #SanitaryPads #LadyCare #SaudiArabia #Comfort #Dryness #Protection #Softness #WomensHealth

description_en:
Discover superior comfort and protection with **Private** Female Night Napkins. **Private** is specifically designed to provide maximum absorption and security throughout the night, thanks to its innovative wings that ensure perfect stability and ultimate leak control. Enjoy the soft, natural cotton feel that gives your skin a sensation of freshness and up to 100% dryness, making you feel confident all night long. Flexible absorption channels move with your body to prevent friction, and **Private** offers round-the-clock protection for unparalleled peace of mind and confidence in your activities. Don't let worry prevent you from enjoying your morning.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Private**:
â­ The sanitary pads have adhesive strips to attach securely to your underwear.
â­ Remove the paper backing and press the sticky side of the pad to your underwear.
â­ If your pad also has wings, they have extra flaps that fold over the sides of your underwear for more protection. Remove the paper backing, wrap the wings around the crotch, and press firmly to the underside of your underwear.
â­ Change the pad every 3-4 hours or as needed to ensure cleanliness and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Private**:
â­ Soft top layer with a natural cotton feel for ultimate comfort.
â­ Super absorption channels that instantly absorb and lock away fluid.
â­ Side wings for perfect stability and leak control.
â­ Leak-proof bottom layer for complete protection.
â­ Free from allergens for maximum skin care.

#SanitaryNapkins #PersonalHygiene #Private #LadyCare #QuietNight #AllNightComfort #FullProtection #WomensHealth #SaudiArabia #SkinMoisture

Experience ultimate comfort and protection with **Private Organic Tampons Super Plus**. Designed for very heavy flow days, these non-applicator tampons offer superior absorbency and confidence. Made from 100% organic cotton, they are completely free from bleach, synthetic materials, harmful chemicals, and plastic, ensuring a healthy and safe experience.

â­ Made with 100% pure organic cotton
â­ Free from chlorine bleach, fragrances, synthetics, and plastic
â­ Ideal for very heavy flow days
â­ Super Plus absorption (12-15 grams)

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Private Organic Tampons Super Plus**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before use.
â­ Unwrap the tampon.
â­ Gently insert the tampon into the vagina using your finger.
â­ Change the tampon every 4-8 hours as needed.
â­ Dispose of used tampons properly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Private Organic Tampons Super Plus**:
â­ 100% Organic Cotton
â­ Organic Cotton Removal Thread

description_en:
Primalac Premium Ultima AR2 is the next generation of infant formula from Primalac, specially designed for infants aged 6 to 12 months suffering from frequent regurgitation. It reduces constant crying and discomfort caused by heartburn and vomiting thanks to its easy-to-digest formulation with thickening agents. **Primalac Premium Ultima AR2** ensures your baby's physical and mental growth by providing all the essential nutrients and micronutrients. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Primalac Premium Ultima AR2**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly.
â­ Boil the bottle, nipple, and ring for 5 minutes and keep them covered.
â­ Boil water and let it cool to a suitable temperature.
â­ Follow the feeding chart precisely: pour water first, then add the powder using the enclosed scoop.
â­ Level off the excess powder from the scoop.
â­ Store the dry scoop in the container and close it tightly.
â­ Shake the bottle well until the milk is completely dissolved and check the temperature before feeding.
â­ Consume any remaining formula within 1 hour.
â­ As **Primalac Premium Ultima AR2** contains thickening agents, it's recommended to use a nipple with a wider hole.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Primalac Premium Ultima AR2**:
â­ Protein (Skimmed cow's milk)
â­ Nucleotides
â­ Omega 3 & Omega 6
â­ Thickening agent (Carob bean gum)
â­ Minerals and Vitamins

description_en:
Discover the next generation of infant nutrition with **Primalac Premium Ultima** for children aged 1 to 3 years. Our innovative Nutractive blend features HMO for enhanced immunity and reduced digestive issues, plus natural milk fat without palm oil for optimal digestion and healthy bowel function. It's enriched with double the amount of Omega 3 and Omega 6 to support robust brain and cognitive development. **Primalac Premium Ultima** ensures your child receives all essential micronutrients for complete physical and mental growth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Primalac Premium Ultima**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water.
â­ Wash the feeding bottle, nipple, and cap, then boil them for 5 minutes to sterilize.
â­ Boil drinking water for 5 minutes and allow it to cool to approximately 40Â°C.
â­ Follow the feeding table precisely: Pour the correct amount of water into the bottle, then add the exact number of leveled scoops of the product using the enclosed scoop. Remove any excess powder.
â­ Close the bottle and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved. Check the temperature before feeding your baby.
â­ Consume any remaining milk within one hour of preparation.
â­ Store the dry scoop in the can and close the can tightly after each use. Keep in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Primalac Premium Ultima**:
â­ Protein (Skimmed Cow's Milk).
â­ Natural Milk Fat from Cow's Milk.
â­ Nucleotides.
â­ Omega 3 & Omega 6.
â­ Thickeners (Locust Bean Gum).
â­ Minerals and Vitamins.
â­ Palm Oil Free.

description_en:
Discover the next generation of your baby's nutrition with **Primalac Premium Ultima 1**, an advanced formula specifically designed to support your baby's healthy growth from birth to 6 months.

âœ… **Primalac Premium Ultima 1 Features & Benefits:**
â­ Enriched with HMO to boost immunity and support digestive health, reducing the incidence of intestinal infections.
â­ Contains natural milk fat and is palm oil-free, promoting better digestive efficiency and proper bowel movements.
â­ Fortified with double the amount of Omega 3 & Omega 6 for healthy and rapid brain and cognitive development.
â­ Provides all essential micronutrients for your baby's comprehensive physical and mental development.
â­ An innovative formula inspired by breast milk to support the breastfeeding journey.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Primalac Premium Ultima 1**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water and dry with a clean towel.
â­ Wash the feeding bottle, nipple, and cap, then boil them for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil drinking water and let it cool to 40Â°C.
â­ Follow the feeding table: Pour the required amount of boiled water into the bottle, then add the specified amount of **Primalac Premium Ultima 1** powder using the enclosed scoop.
â­ Close the bottle and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved. Check the temperature before feeding.
â­ Discard any remaining milk in the bottle within one hour of preparation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Primalac Premium Ultima 1**:
â­ Skimmed Cow's Milk Protein
â­ Natural Cow's Milk Fat
â­ Nucleotides
â­ Omega 3 & Omega 6
â­ Thickener (Carob Bean Gum)
â­ Various Minerals and Vitamins
â­ Palm Oil-Free
â­ Contains HMO for enhanced immunity and gut health

description_en:
Primalac Premium Ultima (2) is the new generation of baby milk, specially designed to support your baby's growth from 6 to 12 months. It contains HMOs to boost immunity and the digestive system, and reduce the incidence of intestinal disorders. Thanks to its natural milk fat and absence of palm oil, **Primalac Premium Ultima** ensures proper digestion and smooth bowel movements. The doubled quantity of Omega 3 and Omega 6 supports your baby's healthy and rapid mental and cognitive development. **Primalac Premium Ultima** provides all the essential nutrients and micronutrients for your baby's physical and mental growth. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Primalac Premium Ultima**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparation.
â­ Wash the feeding bottle, nipple, and cap well and sterilize by boiling for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil drinking water and let it cool to a suitable temperature.
â­ Follow the feeding table precisely: pour water into the bottle and add the powder using the provided scoop.
â­ Close the bottle and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Check the temperature before feeding your baby.
â­ Discard any remaining milk within an hour of preparation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Primalac Premium Ultima**:
â­ Protein (Skimmed Cow's Milk)
â­ Natural Milk Fat from Cow's Milk
â­ Nucleotides
â­ Omega 3 & Omega 6
â­ Thickener (Carob Bean Gum)
â­ Minerals and Vitamins
â­ Palm Oil Free

#BabyMilk #Primalac #InfantNutrition #BabyGrowth #BabyHealth #Breastfeeding #SaudiBabies #BabyCare #SaudiArabia #MomTips

description_en:
Introducing the next generation of infant nutrition with **Primalac Premium Ultima Pro**. Specially formulated for babies experiencing frequent colic, flatulence, and gas, this advanced milk formula offers soothing relief and promotes better sleep for your little one.

**Primalac Premium Ultima Pro** features a unique composition with 50% less lactose, complemented by essential proteins, nucleotides, and Omega 3 & 6 fatty acids to support your baby's holistic physical and cognitive development.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Primalac Premium Ultima Pro**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing.
â­ Wash the bottle, teat, and cap. Boil for 5 minutes and leave covered.
â­ Boil drinking water and allow it to cool as per the feeding table.
â­ Pour the water into the bottle, then add the powder using the provided scoop, leveling off any excess.
â­ Store the dry scoop in the can, close tightly, and keep in a cool, dry place.
â­ Cap the bottle and shake well until fully dissolved. Check the temperature before feeding. Consume within 1 hour.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Primalac Premium Ultima Pro**:
â­ 50% Less Lactose
â­ Protein
â­ Nucleotides
â­ Omega 3 & Omega 6
â­ Essential Vitamins and Minerals for infant growth

description_en:
**Primalac Premium Ultima AR1** is the advanced formula specifically designed for infants who suffer from frequent regurgitation and vomiting, causing them continuous crying and discomfort. Its easily digestible formula with a thickening agent works to reduce reflux and vomiting rates, giving your baby greater comfort and supporting their physical and mental growth.

â­ Reduces reflux and vomiting thanks to thickening agents.
â­ Provides complete and balanced nutrition to support healthy growth.
â­ Easily digestible to reduce discomfort for your baby.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Primalac Premium Ultima AR1**
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparation.
â­ Wash the bottle, nipple, and ring with hot water.
â­ Boil water for 5 minutes and let it cool to a suitable temperature (not exceeding 70Â°C).
â­ Pour the specified amount of boiled and cooled water into the bottle.
â­ Use only the enclosed scoop and add the correct number of scoops.
â­ Shake the bottle well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Test the milk's temperature on your wrist before feeding your baby.
â­ Discard any remaining milk within one hour of preparation.
â­ Due to its thickened nature, you may need to use a nipple with a wider hole.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Primalac Premium Ultima AR1**
â­ Protein (from skimmed cow's milk)
â­ Thickening agent (Carob bean gum)
â­ Nucleotides
â­ Omega 3 & Omega 6
â­ Essential minerals and vitamins

description_en:
Primalac Premium Ultima LF is the new, advanced generation of baby milk from Primalac, specifically formulated for infants from 0 to 12 months who suffer from lactose intolerance and diarrhea. It is recommended for use under medical supervision. This lactose-free formula contains Maltodextrin instead of lactose to help manage diarrhea and minimize intolerance symptoms like colic, crying, and to support increased child immunity.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Primalac Premium Ultima LF**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly.
â­ Wash the bottle, nipple, and ring thoroughly and then boil them for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil drinking water and let it cool to a suitable temperature.
â­ Follow the feeding guide accurately. Pour water into the bottle, then add the powder using the provided scoop.
â­ Level off the excess powder by removing the line.
â­ Shake the bottle well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Check the temperature before feeding the baby.
â­ Use any remaining feed within 1 hour.
â­ Store the dry scoop in the container and close it tightly after each use.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Primalac Premium Ultima LF**:
â­ Protein (Skimmed cow's milk)
â­ Nucleotides
â­ Omega 3 & Omega 6
â­ Lactose-Free
â­ Minerals and Vitamins

#Primalac #LactoseFree #BabyMilk #InfantFormula #DiarrheaRelief #BabyNutrition #Pediatrics #BabyCare #SaudiMoms #HealthyBaby

description_en:
Primalac Premium Ultima Baby Milk (1) 900 gm is the new generation of infant formula from Primalac, featuring the unique Nutractive blend.

â­ Contains HMOs to boost immunity and the digestive system, reducing the incidence of intestinal infections.
â­ Includes natural milk fat and is palm oil-free, promoting healthy digestion and bowel movements.
â­ Double the amount of Omega 3 & Omega 6 for optimal brain and cognitive development.
â­ Provides all essential micronutrients for your baby's physical and mental growth.
â­ Suitable for infants from birth to 6 months.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Primalac Premium Ultima Baby Milk (1) 900 gm**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water.
â­ Wash the feeding bottle, nipple, and ring, then boil them for 5 minutes and keep them covered.
â­ Boil drinking water and allow it to cool to 40Â°C.
â­ Pour the correct amount of water into the feeding bottle, then add the powder using the enclosed scoop.
â­ Close the bottle and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Check the temperature before feeding and discard any remaining milk within one hour.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Primalac Premium Ultima Baby Milk (1) 900 gm**:
â­ Skimmed Milk Powder (Cow's Milk).
â­ Natural Milk Fat from Cow's Milk.
â­ Nucleotides.
â­ Omega 3 & Omega 6.
â­ Thickener (Carob Bean Gum).
â­ Minerals and Vitamins.
â­ Palm Oil Free.

description_en:
Discover the new generation of baby milk with **Primalac Premium Ultima** Stage 3. Its unique formula is enhanced with HMOs to support your baby's digestive immunity and reduce the incidence of intestinal infections. Thanks to its natural milk fat and palm oil-free formulation, **Primalac Premium Ultima** ensures efficient digestion and smooth bowel movements.

Fortified with a double concentration of Omega 3 and Omega 6, **Primalac Premium Ultima** supports your baby's mental and cognitive development, preparing them for their school years. It contains all the essential nutrients for your child's healthy and comprehensive growth from 1 to 3 years old.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Primalac Premium Ultima**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing the feed.
â­ Wash the bottle, nipple, and cap thoroughly and then boil them for 5 minutes. Keep them covered until use.
â­ Boil drinking water and let it cool down (around 40Â°C).
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the bottle.
â­ Use only the scoop provided to add the exact amount of powder, leveling off the excess.
â­ Close the bottle and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Check the temperature before feeding your baby.
â­ Consume the feed within one hour after preparation, and discard any remaining milk.
â­ Store the dry scoop in the can and close the can tightly after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Primalac Premium Ultima**:
â­ Skimmed Milk Powder (Cow's Milk).
â­ Natural Milk Fat from Cow's Milk.
â­ Nucleotides.
â­ Omega 3 & Omega 6.
â­ Thickener (Locust Bean Gum).
â­ Minerals & Vitamins.
â­ Palm Oil Free.

description_en:
Primalac Ultima 2 with Nutractive blend, the new generation of infant formula from Primalac.

Contains HMOs to enhance digestive system immunity, reduce gastrointestinal infections, and improve immune system efficiency, lowering the risk of illnesses.
Features natural milk fat, free from palm oil, promoting better digestive function and healthy bowel movements.
Enriched with double the amount of Omega 3 & Omega 6 for optimal brain and cognitive development.
Provides all essential micronutrients and elements for your baby's physical and mental growth.
Suitable for infants from 6 to 12 months.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Primalac Premium Ultima**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water, and dry them with a clean towel.
â­ Wash the feeding bottle, nipple, and cap, then boil them for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil drinking water and let it cool to approximately 40Â°C.
â­ Follow the feeding table precisely. Pour the correct amount of water into the feeding bottle.
â­ Add the powder using only the enclosed scoop, leveling off any excess.
â­ Close the bottle and shake well until the milk is completely dissolved.
â­ Check the temperature before feeding your baby.
â­ Consume any remaining milk within one hour of preparation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Primalac Premium Ultima**:
â­ Protein (Skimmed Cow's Milk)
â­ Natural Milk Fat from Cow's Milk
â­ Nucleotides
â­ Omega 3 & Omega 6
â­ Thickener (Carob Bean Gum)
â­ Minerals and Vitamins
â­ Palm Oil Free

description_en:
Discover the new generation of infant nutrition with **Primalac Premium Ultima 3**. This carefully formulated milk is designed to support your child's healthy growth, featuring nucleotides to boost the immune system and reduce the incidence of gastrointestinal infections, thereby enhancing immune system efficiency and decreasing the likelihood of illnesses.

**Primalac Premium Ultima 3** is characterized by its natural milk fat and absence of palm oil, which promotes digestive efficiency and ensures smooth bowel movements. It also contains double the amount of Omega 3 and Omega 6 to support healthy brain and cognitive development, while providing your child with all the essential micronutrients and nutrients for holistic physical and mental growth. This product is ideal for children aged 1 to 3 years.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Primalac Premium Ultima 3**
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water, and dry with a clean towel.
â­ Wash the feeding bottle, nipple, and cap, then boil them for 5 minutes to sterilize.
â­ Boil drinking water for 5 minutes and allow it to cool to 40Â°C.
â­ Follow the feeding table precisely. Pour the cooled boiled water into the feeding bottle.
â­ Add the exact number of leveled scoops of the product using the enclosed scoop only.
â­ Remove any excess powder using the internal leveling edge of the scoop.
â­ Close the bottle and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Ensure the scoop is dry when storing it in the container.
â­ Close the container tightly after each use and store it in a cool, dry place.
â­ Check the temperature before feeding the baby.
â­ Consume any remaining milk in the bottle within 1 hour after preparation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Primalac Premium Ultima 3**
â­ Protein (Skimmed Cow's Milk).
â­ Natural Milk Fat from Cow's Milk (Palm Oil Free).
â­ Nucleotides.
â­ Omega 3 and Omega 6 in an ideal ratio.

description_en:
**Primalac Premium Ultima Baby Milk (2)** is the advanced generation of infant formula, designed to support your baby's digestive health and immune system. This formula, suitable for babies aged 6 to 12 months, mimics the composition of breast milk to provide optimal nutrition. Choose **Primalac Premium Ultima Baby Milk (2)** for a healthy start to your baby's growth and development.

â­ Contains HMOs to enhance the gut's immune system and reduce intestinal infections.
â­ Enriched with natural milk fat and free from palm oil for better digestion and smooth bowel movements.
â­ Features double the amount of Omega 3 & Omega 6 for healthy brain and mental development.
â­ Provides all essential micronutrients for your baby's physical and cognitive growth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Primalac Premium Ultima Baby Milk (2)**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water.
â­ Wash the feeding bottle, nipple, and cap, then boil them for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil drinking water and allow it to cool down to 40Â°C.
â­ Pour the correct amount of water into the feeding bottle, then add the specified amount of powder using the enclosed scoop.
â­ Close the bottle and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Check the temperature before feeding your baby.
â­ Discard any leftover milk within one hour of preparation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Primalac Premium Ultima Baby Milk (2)**:
â­ Skimmed Cow's Milk Protein.
â­ Natural Milk Fat from Cow's Milk.
â­ Nucleotides.
â­ Omega 3 & Omega 6 in a 1:1 ratio.
â­ Thickener (Carob Bean Gum).
â­ Minerals and Vitamins.
â­ Palm Oil-Free.

description_en:
Primalac Premium Baby Milk AR1 400 gm is a specialized formula for infants aged 0-6 months experiencing reflux. Enriched with Carob Bean Gum, Prebiotics, Omega-6, and Nucleotides, this formula is designed to reduce reflux episodes and support your baby's optimal growth and development.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Primalac Premium Baby Milk AR1 400 gm**:
â­ Follow the preparation instructions on the packaging carefully.
â­ Typically, one scoop is mixed with 30 ml of water.
â­ Use room temperature water.
â­ Never use a microwave to warm feeds.
â­ Consume the prepared feed within 1 hour, discard any remaining feed after 1 hour.
â­ Ensure to use the contents within 4 weeks of opening the can.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Primalac Premium Baby Milk AR1 400 gm**:
â­ Carob Bean Gum
â­ Protein
â­ 5 types of nucleotides
â­ Prebiotic
â­ Omega 3
â­ Omega 6

title_ar: Ø¨Ø±ÙŠÙ…Ø§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ Ø¨Ø±ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙˆÙ… Ø¥ÙŠÙ‡ Ø¢Ø± 2 Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ù…Ø¶Ø§Ø¯ Ù„Ù„Ø§Ø±ØªØ¬Ø§Ø¹ 400 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Discover the optimal solution for reflux issues with **Primalac Premium AR2**. This specialized infant formula, suitable for babies aged 6 to 12 months, is designed with a unique formulation to help reduce regurgitation, ensuring your baby's comfort and healthy development. Each can contains 400 gm of high-quality milk powder.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Primalac Premium AR2**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing the feed.
â­ Boil clean water and let it cool to approximately 40Â°C.
â­ Pour the correct amount of water into a clean feeding bottle.
â­ Add the specified number of level measures of **Primalac Premium AR2** powder using the scoop provided.
â­ Close the bottle tightly and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Check the temperature of the milk before giving it to your baby.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Primalac Premium AR2**:
â­ Skimmed Milk Powder.
â­ Vegetable Oils (Palm Olein, Soy, Coconut).
â­ Lactose.
â­ Demineralised Whey.
â­ Starch.
â­ Calcium Caseinate.
â­ Vitamins (A, D3, E, K1, B1, B2, B6, B12, C, Niacin, Biotin, Folic Acid, Pantothenic Acid).
â­ Minerals (Calcium, Phosphorus, Potassium, Sodium, Chloride, Magnesium, Iron, Zinc, Copper, Manganese, Iodine, Selenium).
â­ Essential Fatty Acids (DHA, ARA).
â­ Fructo-oligosaccharides (FOS).
â­ Nucleotides.
â­ Additives (e.g., Maltodextrin, Soy Lecithin).

#BabyFormula #Primalac #AntiReflux #InfantNutrition #BabyHealth #Riyadh #Jeddah #SaudiArabia #BabyCare #FollowOnMilk

title_ar: Ø¨Ù„Ø§Ù†ÙƒØ³ ÙˆØ§ÙŠØª Ø´ÙˆÙƒ Ù…Ø¹Ø¬ÙˆÙ† Ø£Ø³Ù†Ø§Ù† Ù„Ù„ØªØ¨ÙŠØ¶ 75 Ù…Ù„ - Ø§Ø¨ØªØ³Ø§Ù…Ø© Ù…Ø´Ø±Ù‚Ø© ÙˆØ¢Ù…Ù†Ø©
description_en:
Achieve a confident, radiant smile with the innovative **Blanx White Shock** Whitening Toothpaste, uniquely designed with ActiluX technology for teeth whitening. This light-activated paste continuously works to give your teeth a brilliant, shiny white appearance. ActiluX in the toothpaste reacts to light reflected from your smile, providing a dazzling and attractive look. **Blanx White Shock** offers a safe daily whitening experience thanks to its peroxide-free and non-abrasive formula, while also protecting tooth enamel and helping to manage gum bleeding.

â­ Advanced formula with ActiluX for a photo-catalytic whitening effect.
â­ Effectively removes stains, dirt, and bacteria to restore your teeth's natural shine.
â­ Whitens teeth, fillings, and dental restorations.
â­ Safe for daily use, free from peroxides and harsh optical brighteners.
â­ Leaves a protective layer on teeth that lasts all day for a lasting bright smile.
â­ Helps remove plaque to prevent tooth decay.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blanx White Shock**
â­ Use a pea-sized amount on a soft or medium-bristled toothbrush.
â­ Brush your teeth in circular motions for one minute.
â­ Gently clean the outer and inner surfaces.
â­ Spit out the foam and rinse your mouth with water.
â­ Repeat twice daily or preferably after each meal.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blanx White Shock**
â­ Aqua, Silica, Aroma, Sorbitol, Hydrated Silica, Cellulose Gum, Isopropyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Hydroxyapatite, Sodium Monofluorophosphate, PVM/MA Copolymer, Cetraria Islandica Extracts, Sodium Benzoate, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Saccharin, Phenoxyethanol, CI 42090, CI 77891, ActiluX.

#Blanx #TeethWhitening #Toothpaste #WhiteSmile #OralCare #DentalHealth #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #Dammam

title_ar: Ø¨Ù„Ø§Ù†ÙƒØ³ ÙˆØ§ÙŠØª Ø´ÙˆÙƒ Ø¬Ù‡Ø§Ø² ØªØ¨ÙŠÙŠØ¶ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø³Ù†Ø§Ù† Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø²Ø±Ù‚ 50 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Achieve a dazzling white smile with **Blanx White Shock Blue Formula Teeth Whitening Device**.

From the Blanx laboratories, comes the enhanced treatment formula to whiten and brighten your teeth with 50ml toothpaste and Blanx LED bite. A two-week treatment, **Blanx White Shock Blue Formula Teeth Whitening Device** fights bacteria and plaque to restore proper gum health and whiten your teeth for a natural smile. The use of Blanx LED bite alongside the Blanx formula helps in intensifying its antibacterial properties, thus helping in preventing cavities and other common oral diseases, including toothaches and halitosis. Proper two-week usage for 10 minutes is known to turn up your smile to whiter shades and reduce yellowish plaque on your teeth and gums.

â­ Easy to use with immediate results and effectiveness on the teeth.
â­ Helps in preventing oral diseases and brightening up the teeth with freshness.
â­ Protects the enamel with antibacterial properties and prevents building up of plaque and tooth decay.
â­ The **Blanx White Shock Blue Formula Teeth Whitening Device** toothpaste is non-abrasive and free from harmful ingredients such as Parabens, Sodium Lauryl Sulphate (SLS), and PEG.
â­ Easily portable and dissolves teeth yellowing stains inside the mouth.
â­ Can be used alongside other Blanx White Shock products.
â­ Based on microcrystal technology, which covers the teeth and reacts to the Blanx LED Bite for enhanced whitening of the teeth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blanx White Shock Blue Formula Teeth Whitening Device**:
â­ Use the product at least once a week with Blanx LED white. Firstly, use the Blanx White Shock treatment formula on the teeth with your regular toothbrush and move it in a zigzag manner for intense reach and better penetration between the teeth. Once you are done, rinse off the formula and feel the freshness.
â­ In case of usage with an LED bite, you can apply a screen of formula on the transparent support of the bite and activate it for a period of 10 minutes for an intense whitening effect. Rinse off immediately after the treatment cycle is done.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blanx White Shock Blue Formula Teeth Whitening Device**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Sorbitol
â­ Hydrated Silica
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Sodium Fluoride
â­ Isopropyl alcohol
â­ PVMIMA Copolymer
â­ Cetrana Islandica Extract
â­ Benzyl alcohol
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Synthetic Fluorphlogopite
â­ Tin oxide
â­ Aroma
â­ Cellulose Gum and Glycerin

#Blanx #TeethWhitening #HollywoodSmile #OralCare #DentalHealth #WhiteTeeth #WhiteShock #Beauty #DentalCare #SaudiArabia

title_en: Blanx Black Charcoal Whitening Toothpaste 75ml - For Brilliant White Teeth
title_ar: Ø¨Ù„Ø§Ù†ÙƒØ³ Ù…Ø¹Ø¬ÙˆÙ† Ø£Ø³Ù†Ø§Ù† Ø§Ù„ÙØ­Ù… Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯ Ù„Ù„ØªØ¨ÙŠÙŠØ¶ 75Ù…Ù„ - Ù„Ø¨ÙŠØ§Ø¶ Ù†Ø§ØµØ¹
description_en:
Discover the whitening power of natural charcoal with **Blanx Black Charcoal Whitening Toothpaste 75ml**. This 100% effective toothpaste is formulated with micro-carbon particles that absorb impurities and remove plaque, the cause of tooth discoloration, restoring your teeth's natural whiteness and brilliance. **Blanx** also combines arctic lichen with ultra-fine silica and fluoride salts for a unique and complete formula for intense cleaning and whitening. It's a natural whitening paste that doesn't cause tooth erosion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blanx Black Charcoal Whitening Toothpaste 75ml**:
â­ Suitable for everyday use for an effective care routine.
â­ Use as a regular toothpaste and rinse your mouth thoroughly after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blanx Black Charcoal Whitening Toothpaste 75ml**:
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Hydrated silica, Sorbitol, Silica, Cellulose gum, Sodium lauryl sulfate.
â­ Sodium monofluorophosphate, Aroma, Xylitol, Sodium saccharin, Sodium benzoate.
â­ Charcoal powder, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl alcohol, Limonene, Papain, Cetraria islandica extract, Usnea barbata extract, Maltodextrin.

description_en:
Discover the incredible power of **Blanx O3X** toothpaste, your ultimate solution for a radiant and healthy smile. This toothpaste is specially developed to effectively whiten your teeth while preserving enamel integrity. Perfect for daily use, **Blanx O3X** is your ideal companion before and after whitening treatments using trays or strips, helping to maintain the whiteness and shine of your tooth enamel. Its innovative, non-abrasive formula is gentle on your teeth, enamel, and gums, ensuring a comfortable and effective cleaning experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blanx O3X**
â­ Suitable for everyday use.
â­ Brush your teeth with the toothpaste as usual after every meal for optimal results.
â­ Can be used regularly to maintain a sparkling smile.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blanx O3X**
â­ Active Molecular Oxygen.
â­ Natural Arctic Lichens extract.

description_en:
Discover the power of a radiant smile with **Blanx Black Charcoal Activated Mouthwash**, an innovative 100% natural mouthwash powered by activated charcoal. This unique formula combines the antibacterial properties of arctic lichen and zinc with the superior absorption capacity of activated charcoal to target superficial pigmentation and combat bad breath, leaving you with a brilliantly white, lasting smile and refreshed breath. Enjoy the benefits of advanced whitening without alcohol, chlorhexidine, or artificial colorants.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blanx Black Charcoal Activated Mouthwash**
â­ Shake well before each use to activate the charcoal and turn the mouthwash completely black.
â­ Rinse for at least 30 seconds, twice a day, using the cap as a dispenser.
â­ Repeat the process after meals and after brushing your teeth for optimal results.
â­ Do not swallow.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blanx Black Charcoal Activated Mouthwash**
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Sorbitol, Zinc PCA, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Aroma, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Xylitol.
â­ Disodium Phosphate, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Fluoride, Disodium EDTA, Charcoal Powder, Menthol, Limonene, Sodium Saccharin, Cetraria Islandica Extract, Usnea Barbata Extract.

#Blanx #Mouthwash #TeethWhitening #ActivatedCharcoal #OralHealth #WhiteSmile #DentalCare #HealthyTeeth #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover the dual power of a radiant smile with **Blanx Men's Instant & Natural Whitening Toothpaste**. This toothpaste features a unique formula with Arctic Lichen extract to effectively clean and whiten teeth without irritation, restoring your teeth's natural brilliance. Enjoy instant teeth whitening thanks to the innovative blue formula that provides a refreshing sensation and enhances your beautiful smile. **Blanx Men's Instant & Natural Whitening Toothpaste** is the natural solution for healthy teeth, free from materials that can cause tooth erosion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blanx Men's Instant & Natural Whitening Toothpaste**:
â­ Use the toothpaste as part of your daily dental care routine.
â­ Recommended for use twice daily for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blanx Men's Instant & Natural Whitening Toothpaste**:
â­ Sorbitol, Aqua, Hydrated Silica, Tetrapotassium Pyrophosphate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Glycerin, Aroma, Cellulose Gum, PVM/MA Copolymer, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Saccharin.
â­ Citric Acid, Sodium Fluoride, Benzyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, CI 42090, Limonene, CI 74160, Usnea Barbata Extract, Cetraria Islandica Extract, Citral.

description_en:
Introducing **Blemil Plus 3 Optimum Protect**, the ideal follow-up milk for your child aged 1 to 3 years, supporting their physical and intellectual development with a complete formula.

â­ Provides optimal nutrition to support physical and intellectual development.
â­ Contains prebiotics, probiotics, and nucleotides to enhance immunity.
â­ Supports nervous system maturation, visual functions, and the acquisition of motor and intellectual skills.
â­ Contributes to strengthening the body's natural defenses.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus 3 Optimum Protect**
â­ Prepare **Blemil Plus 3 Optimum Protect** by adding one level scoop (approx. 4.5g) to 30ml of lukewarm water.
â­ Consult your pediatrician for recommended quantities based on your child's needs.
â­ Ensure all utensils used for preparation are clean.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Plus 3 Optimum Protect**
â­ Skimmed milk (from cows), vegetable oils, lactose, hydrolyzed rice flour, maltodextrin, galactooligosaccharides, banana, honey, sucrose.
â­ Essential minerals and vitamins for healthy growth.
â­ Animal fats (fish oil, egg phospholipids) to support brain and eye development.
â­ Dehydrated fruits (apple pieces).
â­ Prebiotics (FOS) and probiotics (B. Infantis, L. Rhamnosus) to promote digestive and immune health.
â­ Carnitine to support nervous system maturation.
â­ Lutein to enhance visual functions.
â­ Nucleotides to support the development of the digestive and immune systems.

#Blemil #BabyMilk #FollowUpMilk #HealthyGrowth #ChildHealth #KidsNutrition #SaudiArabia #BabyFood #SaudiKids #ChildCare

description_en:
Introducing **Blemil Plus 2 Optimum Protect**, the ideal follow-on milk for infants aged 6 to 12 months. Specially formulated to meet the growing nutritional needs of your baby during this crucial developmental stage. With its advanced formula, **Blemil Plus 2 Optimum Protect** supports optimal growth and the healthy maturation of your infant's immune and digestive systems, as well as promoting correct brain and visual functions.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus 2 Optimum Protect**

â­ Prepare by mixing 1 scoop (4.5g) with 30ml of lukewarm water.
â­ Follow the feeding schedule recommended by your pediatrician.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place after opening.
â­ Use within one month of opening.
â­ Warning: Improper preparation, storage, or use may harm your baby's health.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Plus 2 Optimum Protect**

â­ Demineralized whey (from cow's milk)
â­ Lactose (from cow's milk)
â­ Vegetable oils (palm oil, rapeseed oil, coconut oil, sunflower oil)
â­ Skimmed milk (from cow's milk)
â­ Galactooligosaccharides (Prebiotics)
â­ Whey proteins
â­ Essential minerals and vitamins
â­ 2'-Fucosyllactose (2'-FL)
â­ Animal fats (fish oil, egg phospholipids)
â­ Emulsifier (sunflower lecithin)
â­ Choline chloride, Mortierella alpina oil
â­ Nucleotides, Antioxidants, L-carnitine, Lutein

title_ar: Ø¨Ù„ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø¨Ù„Ø³ 1 Ø£ÙˆØ¨ØªÙŠÙ…Ù… Ø¨Ø±ÙˆØªÙƒ: ØªØºØ°ÙŠØ© Ù…ØªÙƒØ§Ù…Ù„Ø© Ù„Ù†Ù…Ùˆ ØµØ­ÙŠ
description_en:
**Blemil Plus 1 Optimum Protec** is a complete infant formula designed to meet the nutritional requirements of infants from birth up to 6 months of age. Its enhanced formula incorporates prebiotics to support the development of the immune and digestive systems, and lutein to help ensure adequate visual acuity.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus 1 Optimum Protec**:
â­ Prepare by mixing 4.5g (one scoop) with 30ml of water.
â­ Recommended amounts should be followed unless advised otherwise by a doctor.
â­ Store the container tightly closed and properly stored in a cool, dry place.
â­ Once opened, use within one month.
â­ Improper preparation, storage, or use can lead to health damage to the infant.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Plus 1 Optimum Protec**:
â­ Contains a balanced ratio of serum/casein proteins (60/40) similar to breast milk.
â­ Rich in Î±-lactalbumin, which aids in the maturation of the digestive system, brain, and visual functions.
â­ Includes nucleotides to support the development of the digestive and immune systems.
â­ Supplemented with Taurine and L-Carnitine for fatty acid metabolism and energy production.
â­ Contains lactose as a primary carbohydrate.
â­ Enriched with prebiotics (FOS) to improve gut flora balance and enhance natural defenses.
â­ Features a fat profile similar to breast milk with essential fatty acids and LC-PUFAs (DHA and AA) crucial for brain and visual development.
â­ Includes Lutein, a natural antioxidant that supports visual functions.
â­ Provides essential vitamins and minerals for the infant's daily needs, including Zinc, Selenium, and Vitamin E.

title_ar: Ø¨Ù„ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø¨Ù„Ø³ Ø¥ÙƒØ³ØªØ±Ø§ 2 - Ø¹Ø¨ÙˆØ© ØªÙˆÙÙŠØ± Ù…Ø²Ø¯ÙˆØ¬Ø© 600Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Discover optimal nutrition for your little one with **Blemil Plus Extra 2**, the follow-on formula specially designed to support your baby's growth from 6 to 12 months. Carefully developed from cow's milk, this formula provides the essential nutrients your baby needs during this crucial developmental stage.

â­ Supports healthy growth and cognitive development.
â­ Balanced formula enriched with essential vitamins and minerals.
â­ Easily digestible and formulated to meet the nutritional needs of young children.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus Extra 2**:
â­ Prepare by mixing one scoop (4.7g) with 30ml of lukewarm water.
â­ Ensure the milk is at the correct temperature before feeding your baby.
â­ Do not heat milk in a microwave to avoid hot spots and potential scalding.
â­ Consume prepared milk within one hour of preparation.
â­ Discard any leftover milk after feeding.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Plus Extra 2**:
â­ Contains milk whey without minerals, vegetable oils, skimmed milk, maltodextrin, and inulin.
â­ Enriched with essential mineral salts and vitamins for growth.
â­ Includes animal fat (fish oil as a source of Docosahexaenoic Acid), lactose, and milk whey protein.
â­ Emulsifier (soy lecithin) for formula consistency.
â­ Fortified with nucleotides to support digestive and immune health.

title_en: Blemil Baby Milk Plus Optimum (3) 1200 Gm - Complete Nutrition for Your Child
title_ar: Ø¨Ù„ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ø¨Ù„Ø³ Ø§ÙˆØ¨ØªÙŠÙ…Ù… Ø¨Ø±ÙˆØªÙƒ (3) 1200Ø¬Ù… - ØªØºØ°ÙŠØ© Ù…ØªÙƒØ§Ù…Ù„Ø© Ù„Ø·ÙÙ„Ùƒ
description_en:
Discover the power of growth with **Blemil Baby Milk Plus Optimum (3)**, the ideal follow-up milk specifically designed for children aged 1 to 3 years. This milk ensures optimal physical and intellectual development for your child by providing essential nutrients that adapt to their kidney and digestive capacities. **Blemil Baby Milk Plus Optimum (3)** aids in the continued maturation of the immune system, supports nervous system and visual function development, and enhances motor and cognitive skills. The Blemil brand is trusted by mothers worldwide for delivering the best nutrition.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Baby Milk Plus Optimum (3)**:
â­ Prepare the feed by adding one scoop (approx. 4.5 g) to 30 ml of lukewarm water.
â­ Ensure to use previously boiled and cooled water.
â­ Consume the prepared milk within one hour.
â­ Keep the can tightly sealed in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.
â­ After opening the can, the product should be consumed within one month.
â­ Avoid reheating the milk.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Baby Milk Plus Optimum (3)**:
â­ Skimmed milk (from cows)
â­ Vegetable oils (palm oil, rapeseed oil, coconut oil, sunflower oil)
â­ Lactose (from cows)
â­ Hydrolyzed rice flour
â­ Maltodextrin
â­ Galactooligosaccharides
â­ Banana flakes
â­ Honey
â­ Sucrose
â­ Mineral salts (monocalcium phosphate, sodium citrate, calcium hydroxide, calcium citrate, calcium carbonate, potassium chloride, calcium chloride, potassium citrate, iron electrophile, zinc sulfate, magnesium sulfate, potassium hydroxide, copper sulfate, potassium iodide, manganese sulfate, sodium selenite)
â­ Apple flakes
â­ Animal fat (fish oil [source of docosahexaenoic acid], egg phospholipids)
â­ Emulsifier (sunflower lecithin)
â­ 2'-Fucosyllactose (2â€™-FL)
â­ Vitamins (Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Nicotinamide, Calcium Pantothenate, Vitamin A, Vitamin B6, Vitamin B1, Vitamin B2, Folic Acid, Vitamin K, Biotin, Vitamin D)
â­ Choline chloride
â­ Inositol
â­ Taurine
â­ Nature-identical flavor (cereals with fruits)
â­ Nucleotides (Cytidine 5'-monophosphate, Uridine 5'-disodium monophosphate, Adenosine 5'-monophosphate, Inosine 5'-disodium monophosphate, Guanosine 5'-disodium monophosphate)
â­ L-Carnitine
â­ Antioxidants (Ascorbyl Palmitate, Tocopherol Mix)
â­ Lutein

description_en:
Discover **Blemil Plus AR**, the innovative anti-reflux formula designed specifically for infants experiencing vomiting and reflux. **Blemil Plus AR** provides complete and safe nutrition from birth up to 6 months, and during the introduction of supplementary feeding. Its natural thickeners, carob flour and corn starch, help increase the formula's consistency, reducing vomiting and significantly improving the infant's condition.

Product Features:
â­ Reduces reflux and improves infant comfort.
â­ Ideal blend of carob flour and corn starch to increase milk consistency.
â­ Provides essential fatty acids for brain development and visual function.
â­ Enriched with vitamins and minerals essential for optimal growth.
â­ Contains powerful antioxidants like zinc, selenium, and vitamin E.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus AR**:
â­ **Blemil Plus AR** is prepared by mixing 4.5g with 30ml of water.
â­ Follow the recommended dosage chart based on the infant's age for optimal nutrition.
â­ Recommended dosage for 6-12 months: 8 scoops with 240ml water, 4 feeds daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Plus AR**:
â­ Proteins: A balanced whey protein/casein ratio (60/40) ideal for controlling stomach emptying and reducing reflux.
â­ Carbohydrates: A blend of carob flour and corn starch to increase the formula's consistency and reduce reflux.
â­ Fats: Provides essential fatty acids important for the maturation of the central nervous system and visual function.
â­ Vitamins and Minerals: Covers the nutritional requirements of infants, including zinc, selenium, and vitamin E.

#BabyMilk #BlemilPlusAR #AntiReflux #InfantFormula #BabyCare #BabyHealth #InfantNutrition #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah

title_ar: Ø¨Ù„ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø¨Ù„Ø³ Ù…Ø§ÙƒØ³ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ù„Ù„Ø±Ø¶Ø¹ 400 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Discover **Blemil Plus Max**, a specialized formula designed for infants suffering from colic and other mild digestive issues. It perfectly meets the nutritional needs of babies from birth to 6 months, serving as a unique option and a supportive part of their gradual introduction to solid foods.

â­ Enriched with high-quality Alpha-Lactalbumin protein, which helps adapt protein levels to the maturity of the digestive system and kidneys.
â­ Rich in Sialic Acid for immune enhancement and brain development, and Tryptophan for improved sleep quality.
â­ A blend of pregelatinized corn starch and maltodextrin, with low lactose content to facilitate digestion and reduce gastrointestinal bloating.
â­ Provides essential fatty acids and LC-PUFAs (DHA and ARA), crucial for the maturation of the central nervous system and immune function.
â­ Contains Probiotics (B. infantis and L. rhamnosus) to promote gut bacteria balance, supporting natural defenses and preventing pathogen growth.
â­ Supports fatty acid metabolism, energy production, CNS function, visual maturation, and brain structure development through Taurine and L-carnitine.
â­ Delivers essential vitamins and minerals for optimal infant growth, with Zinc for immune support and Selenium and Vitamin E as potent antioxidants.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus Max**:
**Blemil Plus Max** is prepared by mixing 4.6g with 30ml of water.
â­ 1-2 weeks: 3 scoops (4.5g) with 90ml water, 6 feeds daily.
â­ 3-4 weeks: 4 scoops (4.5g) with 120ml water, 6 feeds daily.
â­ 2 months: 5 scoops (4.5g) with 150ml water, 6 feeds daily.
â­ 3 months: 6 scoops (4.5g) with 180ml water, 5 feeds daily.
â­ 4-6 months: 7 scoops (4.5g) with 210ml water, 5 feeds daily.
â­ 6-12 months: 8 scoops (4.5g) with 240ml water, 4 feeds daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Plus Max**:
â­ Whey protein (Alpha-Lactalbumin), vegetable oils, maltodextrin, pregelatinized corn starch, minerals, vitamins, fats (DHA and ARA), probiotics (B. infantis and L. rhamnosus), nucleotides, taurine, L-carnitine, antioxidants (Selenium, Vitamin E).

#BlemilPlusMax #BabyFormula #InfantNutrition #BabyHealth #ColicRelief #DigestiveCare #BabyGrowth #BabyCare #Infant #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Introducing **Blemil Plus Optimum Protech Kids (4)**, a superior nutritional formula designed for children over 3 years old, facilitating their transition to cow's milk and ensuring optimal nutrient intake for healthy growth and development. This formula is enriched with honey, vitamins, and minerals.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus Optimum Protech Kids (4)**:
â­ Prepare by adding one scoop (4.8 g) for every 30 ml of clean water. The product should be prepared immediately before use and consumed within one hour.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Plus Optimum Protech Kids (4)**:
â­ Contains a balanced protein content adapted for young children, with a 35% reduction compared to cow's milk.
â­ Enriched with nucleotides that aid in the digestive and immune system development.
â­ Combines lactose and maltodextrin with a touch of honey for energy and great taste.
â­ Features LC-PUFAs Ï‰-3 and Ï‰-6 (DHA and AA) crucial for cognitive and visual development.
â­ Includes probiotics (FOS) to promote healthy gut flora and enhance the immune system.
â­ Supplemented with carnitine, essential for fatty acid metabolism and energy production.
â­ Fortified with calcium, iron, and 13 essential vitamins.

#Blemil #BabyMilk #KidsNutrition #GrowthSupport #SaudiArabia #ChildHealth #BabyCare #HealthyKids #FormulaMilk #PediatricNutrition

description_en:
Discover the perfect nutrition for your child with **Blemil Plus Extra Stage 3**. This follow-on formula, derived from cow's milk, is specially designed to support your child's growth and development in their third stage.

â­ Balanced formula for comprehensive nutrition.
â­ Contains essential nutrients for healthy growth.
â­ Pleasant taste preferred by children.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus Extra Stage 3**:
â­ Boil drinking water in a clean container and allow it to cool to a temperature of 40-45Â°C.
â­ Pour the appropriate amount of water into a sterilised bottle or cup.
â­ Close the bottle and shake well, or mix the powder in the cup until completely dissolved.
â­ Ensure the milk temperature is suitable before feeding.
â­ Important Warnings: Prepare the bottle/cup immediately before use. Once prepared, it should be consumed within one hour. Discard any leftovers after feeding and do not reuse. Do not heat milk in the microwave.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Plus Extra Stage 3**:
â­ Demineralised whey (from cow).
â­ Vegetable oils rich in beta-palmitate.
â­ Skimmed milk (from cow).
â­ Maltodextrin, inulin, various mineral salts.
â­ Animal fat (fish oil - source of DHA).
â­ Whey proteins (from cow).
â­ Emulsifier (soy lecithin).
â­ Multiple vitamins (Vitamin C, E, A, D, and B-complex).
â­ Choline chloride, taurine, natural identical flavour (vanillin).
â­ Inositol, nucleotides, antioxidants, L-carnitine.
â­ Allergy Information: Contains milk, fish, and soy.

#BabyMilk #Blemil #Stage3 #KidsNutrition #Infants #FollowOnMilk #ChildHealth #BabyCare #SaudiArabia #SaudiKids

description_en:
Discover optimal infant nutrition with **Blemil Plus Baby Milk Hydrolyzed Rice (2)**, a follow-on formula expertly crafted for infants aged 6 months and above who suffer from cow's milk protein allergy or intolerance. **Blemil Plus Baby Milk Hydrolyzed Rice (2)** provides an optimal supply of essential nutrients, utilizing partially hydrolyzed rice proteins to enhance digestibility and minimize allergenicity. Its nucleotide content supports the maturation of your infant's digestive and immune systems, ensuring ideal growth and development.

â­ Made from partially hydrolyzed rice proteins, highly digestible and with low allergenicity.
â­ Supplemented with essential amino acids L-lysine and L-tryptophan for an amino acid profile similar to breast milk.
â­ Enriched with nucleotides to support the development and maturation of the digestive and immune response systems.
â­ Carbohydrates from maltodextrin and corn starch for improved digestibility and tolerance, with no lactose or sucrose.
â­ 100% plant-based fat fraction, featuring medium-chain triglycerides (MCTs) and palmitic acid for easier digestion and absorption.
â­ Fortified with L-carnitine and taurine, crucial for fat metabolism and the maturation of brain structures and visual function.
â­ Contains a comprehensive range of vitamins and minerals, including iron and zinc to support immunity and reduce diarrhea, along with selenium and vitamin E as potent antioxidants.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus Baby Milk Hydrolyzed Rice (2)**:
â­ **Blemil Plus Baby Milk Hydrolyzed Rice (2)** is prepared in a mixture of 4.7 g per 30 ml of water.
â­ Age: 6 months and above
â­ Level (4.7g): 8
â­ Water (ml): 240
â­ Feedings per day: 4

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Plus Baby Milk Hydrolyzed Rice (2)**:
â­ Partially hydrolyzed rice proteins.
â­ Essential amino acids (L-lysine, L-tryptophan).
â­ Nucleotides.
â­ Maltodextrin and corn starch.
â­ 100% vegetable fats (MCTs, palmitic acid).
â­ L-carnitine and taurine.
â­ Vitamins and minerals (Iron, Zinc, Selenium, Vitamin E).

#BlemilPlus #HydrolyzedRiceMilk #BabyFormula #AllergyFriendly #InfantNutrition #BabyHealth #BabyCare #HealthyBaby #CowMilkAllergy #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover optimal nutrition for your child with **Blemil Plus 3 Optimum Protect**, a comprehensive follow-on milk specially formulated for toddlers aged 1 to 3 years. This milk provides essential nutrients to support your child's physical and intellectual development, with a focus on enhancing the immune system and promoting neurological and digestive maturation. Its unique composition supports the continued maturation of the immune system and boosts the body's natural defenses, ensuring your child gets the best start in life.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus 3 Optimum Protect**:
â­ Dissolve one level scoop (4.5g) in 30 ml of lukewarm water.
â­ Ensure the water used has been boiled and cooled to a suitable temperature before preparation.
â­ Shake the bottle well to ensure complete dissolution of the powder.
â­ It is recommended to prepare the milk immediately before feeding.
â­ Follow your doctor's or health professional's instructions if they differ.

**Caution & Warnings:**
â­ Store in a cool, dry place after opening.
â­ The product must be used within one month of opening the package.
â­ Packaged in a protective atmosphere with inert gas for quality assurance.
â­ Incorrect preparation, storage, or use may lead to health damage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Plus 3 Optimum Protect**:
â­ Skimmed milk (from cows), Vegetable oils (palm oil, rapeseed oil, coconut oil, sunflower oil), Lactose (from cows), Hydrolysed rice flour, Maltodextrin, Galactooligosaccharides, Banana flakes, Honey, Sucrose, Mineral salts (Monobasic calcium phosphate, Sodium citrate, Calcium hydroxide, Calcium citrate, Calcium carbonate, Potassium chloride, Calcium chloride, Potassium citrate, Iron electrolyte, Zinc sulfate, Magnesium sulfate, Potassium hydroxide, Copper sulfate, Potassium iodide, Manganese sulfate, Sodium selenite), Apple flakes, Animal fat (Fish oil [source of docosahexaenoic], Egg phospholipids), Emulsifier (Sunflower lecithin), 2'-Fucosyllactose (2'-FL), Vitamins (Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Nicotinamide, Calcium pantothenate, Vitamin A, Vitamin B6, Vitamin B1, Vitamin B2, Folic acid, Vitamin K, Biotin, Vitamin D), Choline chloride, Inositol, Taurine, Nature-identical flavour (cereals with fruits), Nucleotides (Cytidine 5'-monophosphate, Disodium uridine 5'-monophosphate, Adenosine 5'-monophosphate, Disodium inosine 5'-monophosphate, Disodium guanosine 5'-monophosphate), L-Carnitine, Antioxidants (Ascorbyl palmitate, Tocopherol mixture), Lutein.

#Blemil #BabyMilk #ToddlerNutrition #Stage3 #ChildHealth #SaudiKids #HealthyGrowth #Kids #BabyCare #Infants

description_en:
Discover complete nourishment for your baby with **Blemil Plus Extra 1**, an advanced formula derived from cow's milk to meet the needs of infants from 0 to 6 months. This milk is designed to be a rich source of essential vitamins and minerals to support healthy and balanced growth.

â­ Balanced and nutritious formula.
â­ Supports baby's growth and development.
â­ Easy to digest and suitable for infants.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus Extra 1**:
â­ Prepare the feed by adding one scoop (4.5g) per 30ml of water.
â­ Prepare the feed immediately before use.
â­ Consume the milk within one hour of preparation.
â­ Do not reuse any leftover milk.
â­ Avoid heating the bottle in the microwave to prevent scalding.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Plus Extra 1**:
â­ Demineralised whey (from cows).
â­ Various vegetable oils (palm oil, rapeseed oil, coconut oil, sunflower oil).
â­ Skimmed milk (from cows).
â­ Inulin and lactose.
â­ Mineral salts and multiple vitamins.
â­ Animal fat (fish oil as a source of DHA).
â­ Soy lecithin as an emulsifier.
â­ Mortierella alpina oil (source of AA).
â­ Choline chloride, maltodextrin, taurine, inositol.
â­ Nucleotides and antioxidants.
â­ L-carnitine.

title_en: Blemil Plus Max Junior Low Lactose Formula 400g - Specialized Nutrition for Your Little Ones
title_ar: Ø¨Ù„ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø¨Ù„Ø³ Ù…Ø§ÙƒØ³ Ø¬ÙˆÙ†ÙŠÙˆØ± ØªØ±ÙƒÙŠØ¨Ø© Ù…Ù†Ø®ÙØ¶Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù„Ø§ÙƒØªÙˆØ² 400Ø¬Ù… - ØªØºØ°ÙŠØ© Ø®Ø§ØµØ© Ù„ØµØºØ§Ø±Ùƒ
description_en:
Introducing **Blemil Plus Max Junior Low Lactose Formula**, the perfect solution for your little ones suffering from lactose intolerance. This advanced formula, derived from cow's milk, is specifically designed to meet the nutritional needs of young children requiring a low-lactose diet.

â­ A balanced formula with essential vitamins and minerals for healthy growth.
â­ Easily digestible thanks to its low lactose content.
â­ High-quality ingredients ensure optimal nutrition.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus Max Junior Low Lactose Formula**:
â­ Boil drinking water and allow it to cool to 40-45Â°C.
â­ Pour the appropriate amount of water into a sterilized bottle or glass.
â­ Add the recommended amount of **Blemil Plus Max Junior Low Lactose Formula** powder (4.8g per 30ml of water).
â­ Close the bottle and shake well, or mix the powder in the glass until completely dissolved.
â­ Test the temperature of the milk before feeding.

Caution & Warnings:
â­ Prepare the feed immediately before use.
â­ Consume within one hour of preparation and discard any leftovers.
â­ Do not heat milk in the microwave to avoid hot spots.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Plus Max Junior Low Lactose Formula**:
â­ Maltodextrin, vegetable oils (palm, rapeseed, coconut, sunflower), corn starch, whey proteins (from cows), calcium caseinate, mineral salts, inulin, animal fat (fish oil (source of DHA)), emulsifier (sunflower lecithin), choline chloride, various vitamins, Mortierella alpina oil (source of AA), inositol, taurine, vanillin, nucleotides, antioxidants, L-carnitine, lactic ferments (L. rhamnosus, B. infantis).
â­ Allergy information: Contains milk and fish.

description_en:
Discover optimal nutrition for your baby with **Blemil Baby Milk Plus Optimum (1) 400 Gm**. This complete formula is specially designed to support your baby's growth and development from birth up to 6 months. **Blemil Baby Milk Plus Optimum (1) 400 Gm** provides essential nutrients for your infant's needs, enhanced with prebiotics to promote a healthy digestive and immune system, and lutein for optimal visual development. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Baby Milk Plus Optimum (1) 400 Gm**:
â­ Prepare by adding one level scoop (4.5g) for every 30ml of water.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place.
â­ Use within one month of opening.
â­ Incorrect preparation or storage can harm your baby's health.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Baby Milk Plus Optimum (1) 400 Gm**:
â­ Demineralized whey (from cow's milk), lactose, vegetable oils, skimmed milk (from cow's milk).
â­ Galactooligosaccharides, whey proteins, mineral salts, 2'-Fucosyllactose (2'-FL).
â­ Animal fats (fish oil, egg phospholipids), emulsifier (sunflower lecithin).
â­ Vitamins (C, E, A, D, B complex), choline chloride.
â­ Mortierella alpina oil, maltodextrin, inositol, taurine, nucleotides.
â­ Antioxidants (ascorbyl palmitate, tocopherol mixture), L-carnitine, Lutein.
â­ Contains milk, fish oil, and egg.

#Blemil #BabyFormula #InfantNutrition #HealthyBaby #BabyGrowth #OptimumProtech #CompleteNutrition #SaudiArabia #Breastfeeding #BabyCare

title_ar: Ø¨Ù„ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø¨Ù„Ø³ Ø¥Ù„ÙŠÙ…Ù†ØªØ§Ù„ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ - ØªØ±ÙƒÙŠØ¨Ø© Ù…ØªØ®ØµØµØ© Ù„Ù„Ø­Ø³Ø§Ø³ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¯ÙŠØ¯Ø© 400 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Blemil Plus Elemental is an advanced, hypoallergenic formula specifically designed for infants suffering from severe cow's milk protein allergy or multiple food allergies.

â­ Specialized formula for infants with severe cow's milk protein allergy or multiple food allergies.
â­ Contains free amino acids for complete and balanced nutrition.
â­ Enriched with DHA to support brain development and visual maturation.
â­ Balanced calcium/phosphorus ratio for strong bone health.
â­ Fortified with essential vitamins and minerals to support infant growth and development.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus Elemental**:
â­ Preparation: Mix one scoop (4.5 g) with 30 ml of water.
â­ The quantity and frequency of feeding should be determined based on the infant's weight and nutritional requirements.
â­ Prepare the feed immediately before use and administer it to the baby promptly.
â­ The feed must be consumed within one hour of preparation.
â­ Discard any leftover milk after feeding.
â­ Do not reheat the milk, and avoid microwave heating.
â­ Caution: Failure to follow these instructions may cause serious harm.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Plus Elemental**:
â­ Maltodextrin, various vegetable oils (palm oil, rapeseed oil, coconut oil, sunflower oil).
â­ Modified corn starch, medium-chain triglycerides.
â­ Minerals and vitamins (Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Nicotinamide, etc.).
â­ Essential and non-essential amino acids (L-Lysine, L-Leucine, L-Glutamine, etc.).
â­ Emulsifiers (mono- and diglycerides of citric acid esters, sunflower lecithin).
â­ Animal fat (fish oil [source of docosahexaenoic acid]).
â­ Taurine, nucleotides, antioxidants (tocopherols, ascorbyl palmitate), L-carnitine.
â­ Allergy information: Contains fish.

title_ar: Ø¨Ù„ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø¨Ù„Ø³ 2 Ø£ÙˆØ¨ØªÙŠÙ…Ù… Ø¨Ø±ÙˆØªÙŠÙƒ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ù…ØªØ§Ø¨Ø¹Ø© Ù„Ù„Ø±Ø¶Ø¹ 400Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Discover complete nutrition for your baby with **Blemil Plus 2 Optimum Protect**, a follow-on milk specifically designed to meet the needs of infants aged 6 to 12 months. Its enhanced formula provides a unique symbiotic effect through a perfect combination of prebiotics and probiotics, supporting healthy growth and optimal immune and digestive systems. Lutein ensures ideal brain and visual functions. **Blemil Plus 2 Optimum Protect** offers the perfect balance of essential nutrients to support your baby's growth and development during this crucial stage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus 2 Optimum Protect**:
â­ To prepare one serving, add one level scoop (4.5g) to 30 ml of lukewarm water.
â­ Follow your doctor's recommended dosage.
â­ Store the container tightly closed in a cool, dry place.
â­ After opening, consume the product within one month.
â­ Improper preparation, storage, or use can harm your baby's health.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Plus 2 Optimum Protect**:
â­ Demineralized whey, lactose, vegetable oils (palm, rapeseed, coconut, sunflower).
â­ Skimmed milk, galactooligosaccharides, whey proteins.
â­ Essential minerals and vitamins to support growth and development.
â­ 2'-Fucosyllactose (2'-FL), animal fats (fish oil, egg phospholipids).
â­ Emulsifier sunflower lecithin, choline chloride, Mortierella alpina oil.
â­ Taurine, nucleotides, antioxidants, L-carnitine, Lutein.

#Blemil #BabyMilk #InfantNutrition #Stage2 #BabyCare #HealthyBaby #SaudiMoms #BabyFormula #KidsHealth #SaudiArabia

title_en: Blemil Plus Baby Milk Extra (2) 600 gm - For Constipation Relief
title_ar: Ø¨Ù„ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø¨Ù„Ø³ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ø§ÙƒØ³ØªØ±Ø§ (2) 600 Ø¬Ù… - Ù„Ø¹Ù„Ø§Ø¬ Ø§Ù„Ø¥Ù…Ø³Ø§Ùƒ
description_en:
Say goodbye to constipation with **Blemil Plus Baby Milk Extra (2) 600 gm**! This comprehensive follow-up formula is specially designed for infants prone to constipation, providing complete nutritional support during the introduction of complementary foods.

**Thanks to its innovative formula enriched with Beta-palmitate, prebiotics, essential fatty acids LC-PUFAs (Ï‰-3 & Ï‰-6), nucleotides, and magnesium, Blemil Plus 2 Extra effectively improves bowel movements and reduces troublesome constipation symptoms.** It's the ideal solution for your baby's comfort and healthy growth.

â­ **Key Features:**
â­ **Beta-palmitate (45%):** Facilitates the absorption of fats, calcium, and magnesium, and reduces stool hardness.
â­ **Fructo-oligosaccharides (Prebiotics):** Promotes the maturation of the digestive system and regulates intestinal transit.
â­ **LC-PUFAs Ï‰-3 & Ï‰-6 (DHA & AA):** Contribute to facilitating intestinal transit and support brain and retinal development.
â­ **Nucleotides:** Support the development of the digestive and immune systems and regulate intestinal transit.
â­ **Magnesium:** Aids in hydrating the stool and increasing intestinal motility.
â­ **Protein Ratio (60/40) Whey/Casein:** Close to breast milk composition.
â­ **100% Lactose:** Enhances calcium and iron absorption.
â­ **Taurine & L-Carnitine:** Essential for fat metabolism and energy production.
â­ **Comprehensive Vitamins & Minerals:** Including Zinc, Selenium, and Vitamin E to support immunity and growth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus Baby Milk Extra (2) 600 gm**:
â­ Mix 4.8 grams of powder with 30 ml of water.
â­ Age: 6 months and above.
â­ Recommended quantity (unless advised otherwise by a doctor): 8 scoops (4.8g) with 240 ml water, 4 feeds daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Plus Baby Milk Extra (2) 600 gm**:
â­ Contains Beta-palmitate, Fructo-oligosaccharides, LC-PUFAs Ï‰-3 & Ï‰-6 (DHA & AA), Nucleotides, Magnesium, Proteins, Lactose, Taurine, L-Carnitine, along with a complete range of essential vitamins and minerals.

#babyformula #Blemil #constipationrelief #infants #babynutrition #babies #babyhealth #SaudiArabia #babyessentials #babycare

description_en:
Blemil Plus LF Baby Milk is a specialized infant formula designed to meet the needs of infants with lactose intolerance, making it an ideal choice for maintaining their digestive health. This formula has been meticulously developed to provide complete and balanced nutrition from birth up to 6 months of age, serving as either primary nutrition or as part of a varied diet during the introduction of solid foods. Thanks to its high-quality ingredients, Blemil Plus LF Baby Milk contributes to the healthy growth of infants.

â­ Whey protein/casein ratio (60/40) similar to breast milk.
â­ Rich in nucleotides to support the maturation of the digestive and immune system.
â­ Contains 100% dextrino maltose for easy digestion and is free from lactose and sucrose.
â­ Enriched with LC-PUFAs Omega-3 and Omega-6 (DHA and AA) to support brain development, vision, and the immune system.
â­ Includes prebiotics (FOS) that promote the growth of beneficial bacteria in the gut and aid in mineral absorption.
â­ Fortified with Taurine and L-carnitine to support fat metabolism, energy production, and nervous system functions.
â­ Covers the essential nutritional requirements of infants with vital vitamins and minerals, with a special focus on calcium, vitamin D, and zinc to support immunity and tissue health.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus LF Baby Milk**:
The formula is prepared by mixing 4.7g of powder with 30ml of water. The recommended dosage may vary depending on the infant's age; please follow the provided table for accurate preparation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Plus LF Baby Milk**:
â­ Proteins (Whey, Casein), Nucleotides.
â­ Carbohydrates (100% Dextrinomaltose).
â­ Fats (LC-PUFAs Omega-3 & Omega-6, DHA, AA).
â­ Prebiotics (FOS).
â­ Taurine, L-carnitine.
â­ Vitamins (A, D, E, K, C, B1, B2, B6, B12, Folic Acid, Pantothenic Acid, Biotin, Niacin).
â­ Minerals (Calcium, Phosphorus, Magnesium, Iron, Zinc, Iodine, Copper, Manganese, Selenium, Sodium, Potassium, Chloride).

#BabyMilk #LactoseFree #InfantNutrition #BabyHealth #Blemil #SpecialtyMilk #BabyProducts #BabyCare #SaudiArabia #Riyadh
