shortdescription_en: Specialized lactose-free infant formula. Provides balanced nutrition to support healthy growth and digestion. Ideal for infants from birth to 6 months.

title_en: Blemil Plus Baby Milk Preterm 400 gm - For Complete Growth
title_ar: Ø¨Ù„ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø¨Ù„Ø³ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ø¨Ø±ÙŠØªÙŠØ±Ù… 400 Ø¬Ù… - Ù„Ù†Ù…Ùˆ Ù…ØªÙƒØ§Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Introducing **Blemil Plus Baby Milk Preterm 400 gm**, the advanced nutritional formula specially designed to meet the unique needs of preterm and underweight babies at birth. This formula is characterized by its high nutritional value and ease of digestion, ensuring maximum tolerance and nutritional benefit for your baby during their early and sensitive growth stages. Thanks to its higher calorie density (81 kcal/100 ml) compared to standard infant and follow-up milk, **Blemil Plus Baby Milk Preterm 400 gm** provides the essential energy for optimal growth and development.

**Blemil Plus Baby Milk Preterm 400 gm** contains a high concentration of proteins and a balanced ratio of whey/casein proteins (65/35) compatible with the maturity level of preterm infants. It is also rich in Taurine and L-Carnitine, which are crucial for fatty acid metabolism and energy production, playing a pivotal role in the development of the central nervous system and retina. Its benefits extend to an ideal combination of lactose and maltodextrin to ensure efficient carbohydrate digestion and absorption, providing energy for growth, bone development, and brain function. The fats are rich, with 17% as medium-chain triglycerides (MCT) that are easily digested and absorbed. Additionally, its vitamin and mineral content covers the infant's daily needs, with a special emphasis on Selenium and Vitamin E as powerful antioxidants to protect long-chain polyunsaturated fatty acids, and Zinc to support a robust immune system.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus Baby Milk Preterm 400 gm**
â­ Available by prescription only.
â­ The quantity and number of daily feedings are determined by the doctor based on the infant's weight and energy requirements.
â­ To prepare: Mix 5.3g of powder with 30ml of water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Plus Baby Milk Preterm 400 gm**
â­ High protein concentration with a whey/casein ratio of 65/35.
â­ Taurine and L-Carnitine to support the nervous system and retina.
â­ Carbohydrates from lactose and maltodextrin for improved digestion and energy supply.
â­ Fats containing 17% medium-chain triglycerides (MCT) for easy absorption.
â­ Essential vitamins and minerals for infant growth, with increased Selenium and Vitamin E.
â­ Zinc to support immune system functions.

#BabyMilk #BlemilPlus #PretermBabies #Newborns #InfantNutrition #SpecialtyMilk #BabyHealth #SaudiArabia #BabyCare #BabyEssentials

description_en:
Introducing **Blemil Plus** Baby Milk, an innovative formula specifically designed for infants allergic or intolerant to cow's milk protein. This unique formula fully meets the nutritional needs of your baby from birth up to six months of age, utilizing partially hydrolyzed rice proteins to ensure easy digestion and minimize allergenicity. The protein content's richness contributes to the maturation of the infant's immune system, supporting optimal growth and development.

â­ **Product Features:**
â­ Specialized formula for infants with cow's milk protein allergy or intolerance.
â­ Based on partially hydrolyzed rice proteins for easy digestion and reduced allergenicity.
â­ Fortified with essential amino acids L-lysine and L-tryptophan.
â­ Enriched with nucleotides to support digestive and immune system development.
â­ Carbohydrate blend of maltodextrin and corn starch for enhanced digestibility.
â­ 100% vegetable fats with medium-chain triglycerides (MCTs) for better absorption.
â­ Rich in essential vitamins and minerals, especially iron and zinc for immune support.
â­ Contains powerful antioxidants like selenium and vitamin E.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus** Baby Milk Hydrolyzed Rice:
Prepare the formula by mixing 4.5g of powder with 30ml of water. Follow the recommended dosages according to the infant's age for optimal nutrition.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Plus** Baby Milk Hydrolyzed Rice:
The formula consists of partially hydrolyzed rice proteins, essential amino acids, nucleotides, carbohydrates (maltodextrin and corn starch), vegetable fats, complete vitamins and minerals, L-carnitine, and Taurine.

#BlemilPlus #BabyMilk #HydrolyzedRice #LactoseFree #MilkAllergy #InfantNutrition #SaudiBabies #BabyHealth #BabyCare #InfantFormula

title_ar: Ø¨Ù„ÙŠÙ…ÙŠÙ„ Ø¨Ù„Ø³ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ø§ÙƒØ³ØªØ±Ø§ (1) 600 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Discover optimal infant nutrition with **Blemil Plus Baby Milk Extra (1)**, specially formulated to support infants prone to constipation during the transition to complementary feeding. Its advanced formula, enriched with Beta-Palmitate, Prebiotics, LC-PUFAs Ï‰-3 & Ï‰-6, Nucleotides, and Magnesium, makes it the ideal solution for easing digestion and reducing constipation symptoms.

**Blemil Plus Baby Milk Extra (1)** features:
â­ 45% Beta-Palmitate: For better absorption of fats, calcium, and magnesium, and to reduce stool hardness.
â­ Fructo-oligosaccharides: Supports digestive system maturation, regulates intestinal transit, and enhances immunity.
â­ LC-PUFAs Ï‰-3 & Ï‰-6: Contribute to bowel movement regulation and brain and retinal development.
â­ Nucleotides: Support the development of the digestive and immune systems and regulate intestinal transit.
â­ Magnesium: Moisturizes and softens stools, thereby increasing bowel movement.

In addition to its anti-constipation benefits, **Blemil Plus Baby Milk Extra (1)** provides essential nutrients for healthy growth:
â­ Proteins: Whey/Casein ratio (60/40) close to breast milk.
â­ Carbohydrates: 100% lactose for calcium and iron absorption and beneficial bacteria growth.
â­ Fats: Support for brain and retinal development.
â­ Taurine & L-Carnitine: Essential for fatty acid metabolism and energy production, supporting the central nervous system and vision.
â­ Vitamins & Minerals: Cover the daily needs of infants, including Zinc, Selenium, and Vitamin E for strong immunity and growth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus Baby Milk Extra (1)**
â­ Preparation: Add 1 scoop (4.8g) to every 30ml of water.
â­ Recommended daily intake (unless advised otherwise by a pediatrician):
   - 6 months and above: 8 scoops in 240ml water, 4 feedings per day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Plus Baby Milk Extra (1)**
â­ Beta-Palmitate
â­ Fructo-oligosaccharides (long and short chain)
â­ LC-PUFAs Ï‰-3 and Ï‰-6 (DHA and AA)
â­ Nucleotides
â­ Magnesium
â­ Protein (Whey/Casein 60/40)
â­ 100% Lactose
â­ Taurine and L-Carnitine
â­ Vitamins and Minerals

#BabyMilk #BlemilPlus #InfantNutrition #BabyConstipation #FormulaMilk #BabyHealth #SleepTraining #BabyCare #SaudiMoms #InfantFormula

description_en:
Discover **Blemil Plus 2 Fully Hydrolyzed Protein 400 Gm**, the optimal solution for infants suffering from cow's milk protein allergy or digestive issues. This specialized nutritional formula is carefully designed to provide complete and safe nutrition for your baby from 6 months onwards, focusing on improving digestion and absorption. **Blemil Plus 2 Fully Hydrolyzed Protein 400 Gm** is an effective and safe alternative for babies who require a diet free from intact cow's milk protein.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus 2 Fully Hydrolyzed Protein 400 Gm**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparation.
â­ Sterilize all feeding utensils (bottle, teat, ring) by boiling them in water for 10 minutes.
â­ Boil drinking water and let it cool to a temperature between 40-45Â°C.
â­ Pour the appropriate amount of water into the sterilized feeding bottle.
â­ Add the number of level measures indicated in the dosage table.
â­ Close the bottle and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Test the temperature of the feed on your hand before giving it.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Plus 2 Fully Hydrolyzed Protein 400 Gm**:
â­ Maltodextrin, Vegetable oils (Sunflower, Coconut, Rapeseed, Borage).
â­ Hydrolyzed casein (from cow's milk), Medium Chain Triglycerides (MCT).
â­ Various mineral salts and vitamins to support healthy growth.
â­ Inulin, Emulsifiers, Animal fat (Fish oil for DHA).
â­ Mortierella alpina oil (for AA), Choline chloride.
â­ L-Cystine, L-Tryptophan, Taurine, Inositol.
â­ Nucleotides, Lactic ferments (L. rhamnosus, B. infantis).
â­ Antioxidants (Mix of tocopherols, Ascorbyl palmitate), L-Carnitine.

#Blemil #BabyMilk #CowMilkAllergy #InfantNutrition #SaudiBabies #HydrolyzedProtein #BabyHealth #SpecialFormula #BabyCare #RiyadhMoms

description_en:
Discover soothing nutrition for your baby with **Blemil Plus 1 Fully Hydrolyzed Protein 400 Gm**. This advanced formula is specifically designed for infants suffering from cow's milk protein allergy, as well as digestive and absorption issues, and pancreatic insufficiency. **Blemil Plus 1 Fully Hydrolyzed Protein 400 Gm** provides complete and safe nutrition for your baby from birth up to 6 months.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus 1 Fully Hydrolyzed Protein 400 Gm**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparation.
â­ Boil drinking water and cool it to 40-45ÂºC.
â­ Pour the appropriate amount of water into a sterilized bottle.
â­ Add the required measures of powder and shake well until completely dissolved.
â­ Test the temperature of the feed on your hand before giving it to the baby.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Plus 1 Fully Hydrolyzed Protein 400 Gm**:
â­ Maltodextrin and various vegetable oils.
â­ Fully hydrolyzed cow's milk protein (Hydrolysed casein).
â­ Medium Chain Triglycerides (MCT).
â­ A complete blend of essential mineral salts and vitamins.
â­ Inulin and natural emulsifiers.
â­ Animal fat (Fish oil as a source of DHA) and Mortierella alpina oil (source of AA).
â­ Choline, Taurine, Inositol, and Nucleotides.
â­ Natural antioxidants.
â­ L-Carnitine to support healthy development.

description_en:
Introducing **Blemil Plus Fla**, a specialized lactose-free baby milk formula designed for infants aged 1-12 months, specifically formulated to aid during periods of diarrhea. This product comes in a convenient 250 gm package.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Plus Fla**

â­ Prepare **Blemil Plus Fla** by mixing 4.7 gm of powder with 30 ml of water. Unless otherwise recommended, use the following suggested quantities.

â­ Recommended for use from birth up to 6 months as the sole food, and during the introduction of complementary feeding as part of a varied and gradual diet during acute diarrhea episodes.

â­ **Blemil Plus Fla** is a food for special medical purposes and must be used under medical supervision.

â­ Breast milk is the best food for infants. When breastfeeding is not possible, health professionals should recommend the most appropriate alternative.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Plus Fla**

â­ Specially formulated lactose-free composition

â­ Fortified with essential vitamins and minerals for infant growth

description_en:
Ensure your child receives optimal nutrition with **Blemil Baby Milk Plus Optimum (3) Fruits 400 Gm**. Specially formulated to support the physical and intellectual development of children aged 1-3 years, it combines the benefits of cereals and various fruits for a palatable taste and high nutritional value.

â­ Promotes cognitive and visual development with essential fatty acids.
â­ Supports immune system and digestive maturation with prebiotics and nucleotides.
â­ Provides adequate protein content adapted to the needs of children in this age group.
â­ Enriched with essential vitamins and minerals for healthy growth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blemil Baby Milk Plus Optimum (3) Fruits 400 Gm**:
â­ Prepare the formula by adding one scoop (4.7 g) to 30 ml of lukewarm water.
â­ It is recommended to follow the specified quantities as per your pediatrician's advice.
â­ Keep the can tightly closed in a cool, dry place.
â­ Use the product within one month after opening.
â­ Cautions & Warnings: The product is filled in a protective atmosphere. Avoid improper preparation or storage to ensure your child's health.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blemil Baby Milk Plus Optimum (3) Fruits 400 Gm**:
â­ Skimmed milk, vegetable oils, lactose, hydrolyzed rice flour, maltodextrin, galactooligosaccharides, banana flakes, honey, sucrose.
â­ Various minerals and vitamins (Vitamin C, D, A, B complex, etc.).
â­ Animal fat (fish oil, egg phospholipids).
â­ Emulsifier (sunflower lecithin), 2'-Fucosyllactose.
â­ Nature-identical flavor (cereals with fruits), nucleotides.
â­ L-carnitine, antioxidants (ascorbyl palmitate, mixed tocopherols), lutein.
â­ Allergy Information: Contains milk, fish oil, and egg.

#BabyMilk #Blemil #BabyNutrition #ChildGrowth #Stage3 #ChildHealth #InfantFormula #BabyVitamins #BabyEssentials #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience unparalleled freshness with **Bod Man Black** Fragrance Body Spray, 236 ml. This powerful men's fragrance is specially designed for men's skin, giving you a distinct, long-lasting scent. Thanks to its balanced formula and diverse ingredients, **Bod Man Black** ensures you stay refreshed all day, making it a perfect addition to your fragrance collection. Daily use provides a touch of spicy freshness with warm base notes, and it is a completely safe product for skin application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bod Man Black**:
â­ Spray onto pulse points such as the neck and wrists.
â­ Can be sprayed on clothing for a longer-lasting scent.
â­ Best used after showering.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bod Man Black**:
â­ A balanced blend of spicy and refreshing scents.
â­ Warm aromatic notes in the base.
â­ Safe and gentle formula for the skin.

Experience invigorating freshness and lasting confidence with Bod Man Really Ripped Abs Body Spray. This 236 ml spray provides a powerful, full-body fragrance that stays with you, ensuring you feel confident all day long. It's a strong, clean watery fragrance designed to create an aura of vitality and freshness around you.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bod Man Really Ripped Abs Body Spray**
â­ Shake the can well before use.

â­ Avoid contact with eyes and clothing.

â­ Skin-safe ingredients that cause no harm.

description_en:
Discover ultimate comfort for your baby with **BabyJoy** Size 5, Mega Box containing 104 diapers. Designed to keep up with your baby's growth and active movement, **BabyJoy** offers maximum comfort with superior absorbency that prevents leaks for hours. Enjoy a stretchy waistband to prevent back leaks, a compressed diamond pad that absorbs up to 6 cups, and a unique breathable feature that keeps your baby's skin healthy and dry. Comfortable fitting around the legs, and a soft cotton touch ensures maximum gentleness for your baby. Plus, an innovative navel cut for newborns to aid in umbilical cord healing. Experience unparalleled comfort for your baby with every diaper.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy**:
â­ Adjust the stretchy waistband to be snug, allowing you to fit two fingers between the diaper and your baby's tummy for a perfect fit.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy**:
â­ Leakage-preventing elastic waistband.
â­ Highly absorbent compressed diamond pad.
â­ Breathable materials to maintain baby's skin.
â­ Ultra-soft cotton touch.
â­ Comfortable leg fit design.
â­ Newborn navel cut.

description_en:
Ensure your baby's utmost comfort and freedom of movement with **BabyJoy** Size 6 Mega Box. **BabyJoy** diapers are designed with superior absorbency and leak protection, keeping your baby's skin dry and healthy for long hours.

â­ Elastic Waist: Prevents back leakage of liquid and soft discharge.
â­ Compressed Diamond Pad: Absorbs up to 6 cups and prevents leaks for many hours without clumping.
â­ Unique Breathable Property: Releases moist air and lets in fresh air to keep your baby's skin healthy.
â­ Comfortable Fit Design: Provides comfort and leakage protection around the legs.
â­ Umbilical Cord Opening: Aids in the faster healing of the newborn's umbilical cord.
â­ Soft Cottony Touch: Gentle on baby's skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy**
â­ Adjust the elastic waistband so it's not too tight or too loose; you should be able to fit two fingers snugly between the diaper and the tummy.
â­ To avoid the risk of suffocation, keep all packaging materials out of reach of children and infants.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy**
â­ Super absorbent material for liquid absorption.
â­ Soft, breathable outer layer.
â­ Refastenable adhesive tabs.
â­ Skin-friendly materials.

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort for your baby with **BabyJoy** Size 5, the Giant Pack containing 66 diapers designed to keep up with their growing movements. **BabyJoy** diapers feature a stretchy waist that prevents back leakage and a Compressed Diamond Pad that absorbs up to 6 cups, providing superior leak protection for long hours without clumping. Enjoy the unique breathable material that releases moist air and brings in fresh air, keeping your baby's skin soft and healthy. The comfortable fitting shape around the legs ensures maximum comfort and leak protection. The navel cut aids in faster healing of the newborn's navel, and the soft cotton touch is gentle on your baby's delicate skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy**:
â­ Adjust the elastic tape to ensure a comfortable fit, allowing two fingers to fit snugly between the diaper and the waist.
â­ Keep all packaging materials away from children to prevent the risk of suffocation.
â­ Choose the right size for your baby for maximum comfort and protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy**:
â­ Highly absorbent Compressed Diamond Pad.
â­ Elastic waist for leak prevention.
â­ Breathable material.
â­ Soft cotton touch.
â­ Comfortable fitting shape.
â­ Special navel cut.

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort and care with **BabyJoy Olive** diapers, specially formulated to moisturize and protect your baby's delicate skin. Infused with natural olive oil, **BabyJoy Olive** gently moisturizes, leaving skin soft, healthy, and soothed. The advanced compressed air channels absorb up to 6 cups of liquid, ensuring your baby's skin stays dry and protected from leaks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Olive**:
â­ Ensure you select the correct size for your baby.
â­ Secure the diaper comfortably around your baby's waist.
â­ Change diapers regularly to maintain dry and clean skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Olive**:
â­ Olive Oil: For superior moisturization and healthy skin.
â­ Stretchy Waistband: Helps prevent back leakage and provides maximum comfort.
â­ Breathable Materials: Allows moist air to pass through, keeping skin dry.
â­ Compressed Air Channels: Absorbs up to 6 cups of liquid.

description_en:
Keep up with your active little one with **BabyJoy Pants** Size 6! This Mega Pack of 40 pants is designed for maximum comfort and protection for your crawling and active baby. Say goodbye to diaper changing struggles; **BabyJoy Pants** are as easy to put on and take off as regular underwear, making changing time a quick and enjoyable experience for both mom and baby.

â­ **Superior Comfort & Leakage Protection:** Features a wide, stretchy waistband that fits your baby's body perfectly without leaving marks, along with leg gathers to prevent side leaks.
â­ **Exceptional Absorbency:** Thanks to innovative wetness channels, **BabyJoy Pants** absorb large amounts of liquid (up to 6 cups) without clumping, keeping your baby's skin dry for hours.
â­ **Healthy, Fresh Skin:** The soft cottony feel and unique breathable properties allow for ventilation of your baby's delicate skin, preventing irritation and maintaining its health.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Pants**:
â­ Adjust the stretchy waistband to fit your baby comfortably, ensuring you can fit two fingers snugly between the diaper and the tummy.
â­ To change, simply pull the pants down like underwear.
â­ Tear the sides for easy removal when needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Pants**:
â­ Soft, cottony topsheet.
â­ Advanced absorbent layers.
â­ Leakage prevention side barriers.
â­ Stretchy, elastic waistband.
â­ Breathable materials.

description_en:
Discover ultimate comfort for your little one with **BabyJoy** Size 7 Mega Box Diapers. Designed to provide maximum protection and dryness as your baby grows and develops. With exceptional absorbency, **BabyJoy** ensures your baby's skin stays dry and healthy for up to 12 hours, offering your baby peaceful sleep and you peace of mind. Featuring advanced Japanese technology and leakage protection with a flexible waistband.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy** Size 7 Mega Box Diapers:
â­ Use one diaper for your baby overnight for up to 12 hours of dryness.
â­ For the best care, pair with BabyJoy Healthy Skin Wipes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy** Size 7 Mega Box Diapers:
â­ Advanced Japanese Technology manufacturing.
â­ Compressed Diamond Pad capable of absorbing up to 6 cups of wetness.
â­ Air Net for promoting complete dryness.
â­ Waist Stretch design to prevent back leakage.
â­ Breathable materials to keep skin dry.
â­ Soft Cotton Touch for gentle care of sensitive skin.

description_en:
Experience a smooth and comfortable diaper change for your little one with **BabyJoy Culotte**, specially designed for active babies who love to play and move. **BabyJoy Culotte** is easy to wear like regular underwear, making it ideal for babies who have started crawling and are becoming more mobile.

âœ¨ **Key Product Features:**
â­ Easy to put on and take off, just like regular underwear.
â­ Does not get bulky, remaining dry even after absorbing large amounts of liquid.
â­ Wetness channels ensure even distribution of liquid throughout the diaper.
â­ Wide leg gathers effectively prevent leaks.
â­ Unique breathability feature keeps baby's skin healthy and dry.
â­ Ultra-soft cottony touch, gentle on sensitive baby skin.
â­ Comfortable elastic waistband that adapts to the baby's body without leaving marks.
â­ Super absorbency equivalent to 6 cups of liquid for long-lasting protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Culotte**:
â­ After checking which side is the front, put **BabyJoy Culotte** on your baby as you would ordinary underwear.
â­ Stretch the pants to make enough room for baby's legs to go through both openings one at a time.
â­ Pull up the pants to around your child's waist to ensure that there are no gaps at the top of the legs.
â­ Check that the waistband gathers and leg gathers are not folded in.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Culotte**:
â­ Highly absorbent materials to keep baby's skin dry.
â­ Soft outer layer with a cotton-like feel for ultimate comfort.
â­ Gentle and flexible elastic waistband.
â­ Leakage barrier cuffs.

#BabyJoy #Diapers #Culotte #Size6 #BabyHygiene #BabyCare #BabyEssentials #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh

description_en:
Keep your baby comfortable and active with **BabyJoy** Size 3 Mega Box, specially designed to provide maximum comfort and freedom of movement. These diapers feature advanced Japanese technology for superior absorption and leakage protection, ensuring your baby's skin stays soft and dry all the time.

â­ Soft cotton touch gentle on baby's delicate skin.
â­ Compressed diamond pad absorbs up to 6 cups, protecting against leaks for long hours without clumping.
â­ Unique breathable layer allows moist air out and fresh air in for healthy skin.
â­ Elastic waistband prevents back leakage of liquids and secretions.
â­ Comfortably shaped leg cuffs provide extra leakage protection.
â­ Umbilical cord cut-out helps speed up healing for newborns.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy**:
â­ Adjust the diaper's elastic waistband so that two fingers can fit snugly between the diaper and your baby's tummy.
â­ Keep all packaging materials away from children to avoid the risk of suffocation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy**:
â­ High-quality absorbent materials for superior absorption.
â­ Silky-soft outer layer.
â­ Refastenable adhesive tapes.
â­ Flexible elastic waistband.

description_en:
Ensure ultimate comfort for your little one with **BabyJoy Size 4+ Mega Box**. These diapers are specially designed to support your baby's growth and freedom of movement, while guaranteeing maximum absorbency and leakage protection. Enjoy peace of mind knowing your baby's delicate skin is protected.

â­ **Waist Stretch:** Prevents back leakage of liquid and soft excretions, providing extra protection.
â­ **Compressed Diamond Pad:** Absorbs up to 6 cups and locks away moisture for hours without clumping, ensuring continuous dryness.
â­ **Unique Breathable Feature:** Allows moist air to escape and fresh air to enter, keeping your baby's skin healthy and dry and reducing the chance of irritation.
â­ **Comfortable Fitting Shape:** Provides exceptional comfort and effective leakage protection around your baby's legs.
â­ **Navel Cut:** Designed to aid in the rapid healing of a newborn's navel and prevent unwanted friction.
â­ **Soft Cotton Touch:** Offers superior softness and ultimate gentleness to your baby's skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Size 4+ Mega Box**:
â­ Adjust the diaper's elastic waistband to be snug but not too tight. You should be able to fit two fingers comfortably between the diaper and your baby's tummy.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Size 4+ Mega Box**:
â­ Super absorbent materials for dryness.
â­ Soft, breathable outer layer.
â­ Elastic waistband for added comfort and protection.
â­ Secure tapes for a firm fit.
â­ Safe navel design for newborns.

Discover superior care with **BabyJoy Olive**, the diaper specially designed to gently moisturize your baby's skin. Thanks to its unique olive oil formula, **BabyJoy Olive** acts as a natural moisturizer to ensure healthy and supple skin.

â­  **Olive Oil:** Provides deep and continuous hydration for your baby's skin.
â­  **Waist Stretch:** Offers a perfect fit and helps prevent leakage from the back, allowing your baby freedom of movement.
â­  **Breathable Materials:** Allows air to pass through, keeping the skin dry and preventing irritation.
â­  **Compressed Air Channels:** Capable of absorbing up to 6 cups of liquid, providing superior protection against wetness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Olive**:
â­ Ensure you choose the correct size for your baby.
â­ Apply the diaper correctly, ensuring the tabs are securely fastened.
â­ Change the diaper regularly to keep your baby's skin clean and dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Olive**:
â­ Soft top layer with olive oil.
â­ Super absorbent materials.

description_en:
Experience superior comfort and unparalleled protection with **BabyJoy Size 3**, specially designed to meet your growing baby's needs.

As your baby's movement skills rapidly develop, **BabyJoy** diapers are engineered to provide maximum comfort and freedom of movement, along with exceptional absorbency and leak prevention. This ensures your little one stays dry and happy all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy**:
â­ Adjust the stretchy waistband so it's not too tight or too loose; you should be able to fit two fingers snugly between the diaper and the tummy.
â­ To avoid the risk of suffocation, keep all packaging materials away from children and infants.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy**:
â­ Elastic Waistband: Prevents back leakage of fluids.
â­ Diamond Compressed Pad: Absorbs up to 6 cups and prevents leaks for long hours without clumping.
â­ Unique Breathability: Releases moist air and allows fresh air in, keeping your baby's skin healthy.
â­ Comfortable Fit Design: Provides comfort and leak protection around the legs.
â­ Umbilical Cord Cut-out: Aids in the speedy healing of a newborn's navel.
â­ Soft Cotton Touch: Gentle on your baby's delicate skin.

description_en:
Discover ultimate comfort for your little one with **BabyJoy Culotte** Size 5 Mega Box, designed to keep up with your active baby. 

With **BabyJoy Culotte**, diaper changes become an easy and enjoyable experience, whether your baby is starting to crawl or becoming more active. Its underwear-like design ensures easy wear and removal, providing unparalleled comfort for you and your baby.

â­ Compressed pad that absorbs a large amount of urine, up to 6 cups, ensuring dryness and comfort.
â­ Absorbency channels to distribute wetness evenly over the entire pad, preventing any feeling of bulkiness or discomfort.
â­ Wide leg gathers effectively prevent leaks, keeping your baby's clothes dry and clean.
â­ Unique breathable material ensures ventilation for your baby's skin, keeping it healthy and soft.
â­ Soft cotton touch is gentle on your baby's delicate and sensitive skin, providing a feeling of superior softness.
â­ Stretchy waistband fits your baby's body perfectly without leaving any marks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Culotte**:
â­ Adjust the waistband so it's not too tight or too loose; you should be able to comfortably fit two fingers between the diaper and the baby's tummy for a perfect fit and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Culotte**:
â­ Ultra-soft materials with a cotton-like touch to keep your baby comfortable.
â­ High absorbency layers to absorb up to 6 cups of liquid.
â­ Wetness distribution channels to prevent bulkiness.
â­ Leak-proof leg gathers.
â­ Breathable materials for healthy skin.

description_en:
Discover ultimate comfort for your little one with **BabyJoy Size 6 Giant Pack 46 Diapers**. Engineered for your baby's fast-growing movements, these diapers offer unparalleled freedom and superior absorbency with leakage protection.

â­ Elastic Waistband: Prevents back leakage of liquid and soft discharge.
â­ Diamond Compressed Pad: Absorbs up to 6 cups and prevents leaks for long hours without clumping.
â­ Unique Breathable Feature: Releases moist air and allows fresh air in to keep your baby's skin healthy.
â­ Comfortable Fit Design: Provides comfort and leakage protection around the legs.
â­ Umbilical Cord Opening: Aids in the speedy healing of a newborn's navel.
â­ Soft Cotton Touch: Gentle on your baby's skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Size 6 Giant Pack 46 Diapers**:
â­ Adjust the elastic waistband so it's not too tight or too loose; you should be able to fit two fingers snugly between the diaper and the tummy.

Warnings and Precautions:
â­ To avoid the risk of suffocation, keep all packaging materials away from children and infants.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Size 6 Giant Pack 46 Diapers**:
â­ Super Absorbent Polymers.
â­ Soft Cottony Topsheet.
â­ Elastic Waistband.
â­ Refastenable Tapes.
â­ Leakage Barrier.

description_en:
Experience healthy, dry skin for your baby with **BabyJoy Olive Oil Size (6) Xxlarge +16 Kg**. These premium diapers are infused with olive oil to deeply moisturize your baby's delicate skin, ensuring softness and protection. Innovative compressed air channels absorb up to 6 cups of liquid, keeping your baby's skin dry and preventing leaks, even with active movement. Featuring a stretch waist designed to prevent back leaks and breathable materials that allow air circulation, **BabyJoy Olive Oil Size (6) Xxlarge +16 Kg** provides superior comfort and unmatched protection for your baby all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Olive Oil Size (6) Xxlarge +16 Kg**:
â­ Open a clean diaper.
â­ Place your baby on the center of the diaper.
â­ Pull the front part of the diaper up between your baby's legs.
â­ Secure the adhesive tabs from the back onto the front.
â­ Ensure the diaper is snug and not too tight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Olive Oil Size (6) Xxlarge +16 Kg**:
â­ Natural Olive Oil Extract for moisturization.
â­ Super Absorbent Materials for compressed air channels.
â­ Elastic and flexible waistband.
â­ Re-sealable adhesive tabs.
â­ Soft and breathable outer layer.

description_en:
Discover ultimate comfort and guaranteed absorbency with **BabyJoy** Size 4, the Giant Pack designed for your baby to enjoy unparalleled freedom of movement. **BabyJoy** diapers are developed to keep pace with your baby's rapid growth, providing maximum comfort and superior leak protection.

Product Features:
â­ Elastic Waistband: Prevents back leakage of liquid and soft excretions, offering extra protection.
â­ Compressed Diamond Pad: Absorbs up to 6 cups of liquid and prevents leaks for hours without clumping, keeping your baby's skin dry.
â­ Unique Breathable Technology: Allows wet air out and fresh air in, maintaining your baby's skin healthy and dry.
â­ Comfortable Fit Design: Provides superior comfort and leak protection around the legs, giving your baby freedom to move.
â­ Umbilical Cord Opening: Aids in the quick healing of a newborn's umbilical cord, offering gentle care.
â­ Soft Cotton Touch: Exceptionally gentle on delicate baby skin, providing a soft and comfortable feel.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy**:
â­ Adjust the elastic waistband so it is neither too tight nor too loose. You should be able to fit two fingers snugly between the diaper and the baby's tummy for a perfect fit.

Warnings and Precautions:
â­ To avoid the risk of suffocation, keep all packaging materials away from children and infants.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy**:
â­ Advanced Absorbent Materials (for superior absorbency).
â­ Soft Cotton Top Layer (for skin comfort).
â­ Flexible Waistband (for leak control).
â­ Resealable Adhesive Tapes (for secure fit).
â­ Natural Skin-Care Extracts (optional, depending on exact formulation).

Experience ultimate care for your baby's skin with the **BabyJoy Healthy Skin Wet Wipes** Family Pack.

**BabyJoy Healthy Skin Wet Wipes** are specially formulated to suit your baby's delicate skin. They are moistened with a gentle, alcohol-free formula, featuring 97% pure water for the purest clean. Use them at every diaper change to keep your baby's skin clean and healthy.

Product Features:
â­ Dermatologically tested, gentle on baby's skin.
â­ **BabyJoy Healthy Skin Wet Wipes** are scented and alcohol-free, perfect for your baby's delicate skin.
â­ Enriched with Pro Vitamin B5, Chamomile, and Aloe Gel to moisturize and protect the skin.
â­ Gentle and keep the babyâ€™s skin moisturized with every use.
â­ Wet wipes ideal for everyday use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Healthy Skin Wet Wipes**
â­ Gently wipe your baby's skin and massage softly.
â­ Reseal the pack tightly after each use to maintain moisture.
â­ Suitable for use on the face and body during every diaper change.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Healthy Skin Wet Wipes**
â­ Pure Water (97%)
â­ Pro Vitamin B5
â­ Chamomile Extract
â­ Aloe Gel Extract
â­ Gentle skin-comforting ingredients

description_en:
Discover the ultimate comfort and skin protection with **BabyJoy Olive Pants**, a premium choice for your baby's delicate skin. Infused with nourishing olive oil, these diapers moisturize and safeguard, while advanced air channels ensure superior dryness. 

â­ Enriched with Olive Oil for moisturizing and soothing skin.
â­ Compressed air channels absorb up to 6 cups of liquid.
â­ Easy pull-up and tear-away design for quick changes.
â­ Clinically tested and awarded "5 Star Excellent" Derma Test.
â­ Specifically designed for babies weighing 16-23 kg.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Olive Pants**:
â­ Simply pull the diaper up like underwear for your baby.
â­ For removal, tear the side seams for easy disposal.
â­ Dispose of the used diaper properly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Olive Pants**:
â­ Olive Oil (for moisturizing and skin conditioning).
â­ Super Absorbent Polymers (for maximum dryness).
â­ Breathable outer cover (to prevent moisture buildup).
â­ Soft, stretchy waistband for a snug fit.

description_en:
As your baby develops new motor skills, **BabyJoy** diapers provide comfort and freedom of movement. A single **BabyJoy** diaper absorbs a large amount of wetness for up to 12 hours overnight, keeping your baby dry until morning. Designed for optimal fit and superior leak protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy**:
â­ Pair with Baby Joy Wipes Healthy Skin for the best and most gentle care.
â­ Our 12HR+ CARE ensures your baby will only need 1 diaper per night for uninterrupted sleep.
â­ The Compressed Diamond Pad + Air Net absorbs 6 cups of wetness, distributing it evenly for complete dryness.
â­ For maximum protection against leakage, **BabyJoy** Tape features a Waist Stretch to prevent back leakage.
â­ Provides breathable material and ultra-soft cotton touch for gentle care of your baby's delicate skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy**:
â­ Advanced Japanese Technology made in Saudi.
â­ Compressed Diamond Pad absorbs up to 6 cups of liquid and distributes it evenly.
â­ Air Net promotes complete dryness.
â­ Waist Stretch prevents back leakage.
â­ Breathable Material and Soft Cotton Touch for maximum comfort and gentle care.

description_en:
Experience superior comfort and freedom of movement for your baby with **BabyJoy** Size 4+, the Giant Pack containing 70 diapers. **BabyJoy** is specifically designed to meet the needs of your baby's sensitive and growing skin, featuring advanced technology for maximum absorbency and leak protection. These diapers offer unparalleled protection for long hours, giving your baby a dry and comfortable experience throughout the day and night.

â­ Elastic waistband to prevent back leakage.
â­ Compressed diamond pad absorbs up to 6 cups and stays intact.
â­ Unique breathable feature keeps your baby's skin dry and healthy.
â­ Comfortable and fitting leg cuffs provide extra leak protection.
â­ Soft cotton touch, gentle on baby's skin.
â­ Umbilical cord opening to aid the healing of a newborn's belly button.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy**:
â­ Adjust the elastic tabs so the diaper is not too tight or too loose. You should be able to fit two fingers snugly between the diaper and your baby's tummy.
â­ Keep all packaging materials away from children to avoid suffocation hazards.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy**:
â­ Super absorbent materials.
â­ Soft and breathable outer layer.
â­ Leak-proof side barriers.
â­ Secure fastening tapes.
â­ Natural extracts for skin moisturization (may vary by specific product).

description_en:
Experience ultimate softness with **BabyJoy Olive**, the diaper specially designed to moisturize your baby's sensitive skin. Natural olive oil provides continuous hydration for your baby's skin, while compressed air channels ensure superior absorption of up to 6 cups of liquid, keeping your baby dry and comfortable all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Olive**
â­ Change the diaper regularly to ensure maximum cleanliness and comfort for your baby.
â­ Ensure the diaper is properly secured around your baby's waist to prevent leaks.
â­ Use gentle wet wipes to clean your baby's skin before applying a new diaper.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Olive**
â­ Olive Oil: For superior moisturization for healthy, soft skin.
â­ Breathable Materials: Allows air circulation to keep skin dry.
â­ Compressed Air Channels: For effective absorption of up to 6 cups of liquid.
â­ Stretchy Waistband: Provides a comfortable fit and prevents leaks.

description_en:
Experience superior comfort and freedom of movement for your baby with **BabyJoy** Size (2) Mega Pack. Designed specifically for your baby's soft and delicate skin, its advanced absorption technology keeps your baby dry for long hours while maintaining healthy, irritation-free skin. **BabyJoy** is your ultimate choice for reliable protection and comfort.

Product Features:
â­ Elastic waistband prevents leakage from the back.
â­ Compressed diamond pad absorbs up to 6 cups and prevents leaks for long hours without clumping.
â­ Unique breathable material releases moist air and allows fresh air in, keeping skin healthy.
â­ Comfortably shaped pad provides leakage protection around the legs.
â­ Soft cotton touch is gentle on baby's delicate skin.
â­ Umbilical cord opening helps with the healing of the newborn's navel.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy**:
â­ Adjust the elastic waistband so it's neither too tight nor too loose; you should be able to fit two fingers snugly between the diaper and the tummy.
â­ Keep all packaging materials away from children to avoid the risk of suffocation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy**:
N/A. This product is made from hygienic and sterilized materials.

description_en:
Keep your baby comfortable and active with **BabyJoy Size 5 Mega Pack 52 Diapers**. These diapers are specially designed to meet the needs of active, fast-growing babies, providing them with ultimate comfort and freedom of movement thanks to their superior absorbency and leak prevention capabilities.

**Product Features:**
â­ **Waist Stretch:** Prevents back leakage of liquid and soft excretions.
â­ **Compressed Diamond Pad:** Absorbs up to 6 cups and prevents leakage for long hours without clumping.
â­ **Unique Breathable Feature:** Releases moist air and allows fresh air in to keep your baby's skin healthy.
â­ **Comfortable Fitting Shape:** Provides comfort and leak protection around the legs.
â­ **Navel Cut:** Aids in the speedy healing of the newborn's navel.
â­ **Soft Cotton Touch:** Gentle on baby's skin.

ğŸ”¹ **Usage Instructions for BabyJoy Size 5 Mega Pack 52 Diapers:**
â­ Adjust the stretchy tabs so they are not too tight or too loose; you should be able to comfortably fit two fingers between the diaper and the tummy.
â­ To avoid the risk of suffocation, keep all packaging materials away from children and infants.

ğŸ”¹ **Ingredients of BabyJoy Size 5 Mega Pack 52 Diapers:**
â­ Super absorbent materials to absorb up to 6 cups.
â­ Compressed diamond pad for leak prevention.
â­ Breathable outer layer for skin comfort.
â­ Soft, skin-friendly cotton touch.
â­ Stretchy waistband for back leak prevention.
â­ Specially designed navel cut.

#BabyJoy #Diapers #BabyCare #SaudiBabies #BabyProducts #AffordableDiapers #BabyComfort #BabyHealth #SaudiArabia #SaudiMoms

description_en:
Discover superior care for your baby's skin with **BabyJoy Olive**, specially designed diapers to moisturize and nourish your baby's sensitive skin. Enriched with nourishing olive oil, these diapers provide your baby's skin with exceptional softness and protect it from dryness, ensuring long-lasting comfort.

â­ **Olive Oil Moisturization:** Natural olive oil provides deep moisturization for your baby's skin, helping to keep it healthy and soft.
â­ **Stretchy Waist:** A flexible waistband ensures a perfect fit and helps prevent leaks from the back, offering extra protection.
â­ **Breathable Materials:** These diapers allow air to circulate, keeping your baby's skin dry and fresh, and reducing the risk of irritation.
â­ **Ultra-Absorbent Channels:** Compressed air channels quickly and efficiently absorb up to 6 cups of liquid, keeping your baby dry for hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Olive**:
â­ Carefully open the diaper and place your baby on it.
â­ Ensure the adhesive tapes are fastened snugly but gently around your baby's waist.
â­ Check regularly to ensure the diaper is dry and comfortable for your baby.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Olive**:
â­ Natural Olive Oil
â­ Super Absorbent, Fragrance-Free Materials
â­ Soft, Breathable Outer Layer
â­ Flexible Adhesive Tapes

description_en:
**BabyJoy Olive** diapers are a premium choice designed to gently moisturize your baby's delicate skin with natural olive oil. Our innovative compressed air channels offer superior absorbency, holding up to 6 cups of liquid to keep your baby's skin dry and healthy. Experience unparalleled comfort and ultimate leak protection with a soft, stretchy waistband designed to prevent back leakage. The breathable materials allow moist air to circulate, keeping your baby's skin fresh. **BabyJoy Olive** is your perfect partner for healthy, dry skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Olive**:
â­ Ensure the adhesive tabs are at the back.
â­ Place your baby on top of the diaper.
â­ Bring the front of the diaper up between your baby's legs.
â­ Secure the adhesive tabs firmly to ensure a snug fit.
â­ Check that the diaper is fitted securely but not too tight.
â­ Adjust leg cuffs to prevent leaks.
â­ Dispose of used diapers properly.
â­ Change diapers regularly for optimal comfort.
â­ Look for a snug fit around the legs and waist.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Olive**:
â­ Olive Oil for skin moisturization.
â­ Soft, breathable materials.
â­ Double leak barriers.
â­ Quick absorption channels.
â­ Resealable adhesive tabs.
â­ Stretchy waistband.
â­ Wetness indicator.
â­ Fragrance and lotion-free.
â­ Hypoallergenic.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

description_en:
Introducing the **BabyJoy Size (1) Mega Pack 84 Diapers**, specifically engineered to keep up with your baby's growing needs. As your baby's mobility increases, **BabyJoy** diapers offer ultimate comfort and freedom of movement, along with superior absorption and leakage protection.

**Product Features:**
â­ Elastic waistband to prevent back leakage.
â­ Compressed diamond pad absorbs up to 6 cups and prevents leakage for hours without clumping.
â­ Unique breathable material that releases wet air and allows fresh air in, keeping your baby's skin healthy.
â­ A comfortable and snug fit provides leakage protection around the legs.
â­ Navel-shaped cut for newborns to promote healing of the umbilical cord.
â­ Soft cotton touch, gentle on your baby's delicate skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Size (1) Mega Pack 84 Diapers**
â­ Adjust the elastic waistband so it's not too tight or too loose; you should be able to fit two fingers snugly between the diaper and the tummy.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Size (1) Mega Pack 84 Diapers**
â­ Super absorbent materials.
â­ Breathable outer layer.
â­ Refastenable adhesive tabs.
â­ Elastic waistband.
â­ Soft cotton touch.

description_en:
Say goodbye to diaper changing struggles with **BabyJoy Pants**, the perfect solution for your active little one! Designed like regular underwear for an easy and enjoyable changing experience, these pants are ideal for babies who are starting to crawl and becoming more mobile.

â­ **Superior Comfort and Ease of Use:** **BabyJoy Pants** feature a comfortable stretchy waistband that fits the baby's body without leaving marks, making them as easy to put on and take off as underwear.
â­ **Exceptional Absorbency and Leakage Protection:** With the ability to absorb up to 6 cups of liquid and wetness distribution channels, your baby stays dry and protected for longer, even when the diaper is full.
â­ **Gentle on Skin:** The soft cotton-like feel and unique breathable material ensure your baby's skin stays healthy and soft, even the most sensitive skin.
â­ **Extra Leakage Protection:** Wide leg gathers prevent leaks between the legs, providing maximum protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Pants**:
â­ Adjust the elastic waistband so it's not too tight or too loose; you should be able to fit two fingers snugly between the diaper and the tummy.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Pants**:
â­ Super absorbent materials with a soft, cotton-like feel.
â­ Stretchy waistband for optimal comfort.
â­ Breathable outer layer.

#BabyJoy #BabyDiapers #PantsDiapers #BabyCare #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #BabyEssentials #ActiveBaby #ComfortableBaby

description_en:
Keep your baby's delicate skin clean and refreshed with **BabyJoy** Sensitive Skin Wet Wipes. Our unique formula is enriched with moisturizers and is completely alcohol-free, providing the utmost gentleness and effectiveness with every use. Perfect for daily cleansing at every diaper change, ensuring your baby's comfort and skin's freshness.

â­ Gentle on sensitive skin
â­ Alcohol and paraben-free
â­ Enriched with moisturizers to maintain skin softness
â­ Ideal for daily cleansing

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy**:
â­ Use one or more wipes as needed to gently cleanse your baby's skin.
â­ Suitable for use at every diaper change, or for cleaning hands and face.
â­ Reseal the package tightly after each use to keep the wipes moist.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy**:
â­ Purified Water
â­ Glycerin (Moisturizer)
â­ Gentle botanical extracts
â­ Mild preservatives for safety

description_en:
Provide your baby with ultimate comfort and protection with **BabyJoy Olive**, diapers specifically designed to care for your baby's delicate skin.

**BabyJoy Olive** features natural olive oil that gently moisturizes your baby's skin, leaving it soft and healthy all day long. With its compressed air channels, these diapers can absorb up to 6 cups of liquid, ensuring your baby's skin stays dry and protected from any irritation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Olive**:
â­ Ensure you choose the right size for your baby.
â­ Change diapers regularly to maintain the baby's skin dryness and cleanliness.
â­ Use specialized baby skincare products when changing diapers.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Olive**:
â­ Olive Oil: For superior moisturizing for healthy skin.
â­ Breathable Materials: Allows air to pass through to keep skin dry.
â­ Stretchy Waistband: Provides a comfortable fit and prevents leaks.
â­ Powerful Absorbency Channels: Effectively locks away moisture.

description_en:
Experience the ultimate comfort and protection for your baby's delicate skin with **BabyJoy Olive** Pants. These easy-to-wear pull-up diapers are designed for effortless changes, ensuring your little one stays comfortable and happy. The premium top sheet infused with olive oil acts as a natural moisturizer, keeping your baby's skin soft, healthy, and protected. Featuring advanced compressed air channels, **BabyJoy Olive** Pants absorb up to 6 cups of liquid, distributing wetness evenly and locking it away to keep your baby's skin dry and irritation-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Olive** Pants
â­ Pull up to wear, tear to remove for quick changes.
â­ Ideal for active babies who need freedom of movement.
â­ Use with BabyJoy Wet Wipes for complete gentle care.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Olive** Pants
â­ Soft top sheet with moisturizing Olive Oil.
â­ Compressed Air Channels for superior absorbency.
â­ Soft Waist Stretch for a snug and comfortable fit.
â­ Breathable materials for healthy skin.

description_en:
BabyJoy diapers empower your little ones with ultimate comfort and freedom of movement, thanks to their advanced design and superior absorbency. Specially crafted for your baby's delicate skin, providing exceptional leak protection.

â­ Flexible elastic waistband ensures a perfect fit and prevents back leakage.
â­ Compressed diamond pad absorbs up to 6 cups of liquid, keeping your baby dry for hours without clumping.
â­ Unique breathable technology allows moist air out and fresh air in, maintaining healthy and dry skin.
â­ Comfortably shaped leg cuffs offer extra protection against leaks.
â­ Navel opening designed to promote the healing of the newborn's umbilical cord.
â­ Soft cotton touch is gentle on your baby's sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy**:
â­ Adjust the elastic tabs for a snug but not too tight fit; you should be able to place two fingers between the diaper and the belly.
â­ Keep all packaging materials away from children to prevent the risk of suffocation.
â­ Choose the right size for your baby to ensure maximum comfort and protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy**:
â­ Soft and breathable top layer.
â­ Super absorbent core.
â­ Refastenable adhesive tabs.
â­ Leak-guard elastic waistband.
â­ Leakage barriers.

#BabyJoy #Diapers #BabyCare #BabyEssentials #NewbornDiapers #SaudiShopping #Motherhood #Childhood #PeacefulSleep #HealthySkin

Experience ultimate comfort for your little one with **BabyJoy** Size 1. Designed with advanced technology, these diapers ensure maximum absorbency and leak protection, allowing your baby freedom of movement as they grow. **BabyJoy** is the perfect choice for your baby's delicate skin.

â­ Flexible elastic waistband prevents back leakage.
â­ Compressed diamond pad absorbs up to 6 cups and prevents clumping.
â­ Unique breathable material keeps your baby's skin healthy and dry.
â­ Comfortably shaped leg cuffs provide extra leak protection.
â­ Naval cut-out for newborn comfort and faster umbilical cord healing.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy**:
â­ Adjust the elastic waistband so it's not too tight or too loose; you should be able to fit two fingers snugly between the diaper and the tummy.
â­ To avoid the risk of suffocation, keep all packaging materials away from children and infants.
â­ Choose the right size for your baby's comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy**:
â­ Super Absorbent Polymers.
â­ Breathable Outer Layer.
â­ Soft Elastic Waistband.
â­ Gentle Cotton Touch.
â­ Secure Fastening Tapes.

Discover ultimate comfort for your baby in the water with **BabyJoy** Swim Pants, specially designed to give your child freedom of movement and enjoyment at the pool or beach. This saving pack includes 11 swim pants of unmatched quality, made in Saudi Arabia with Japanese technology for maximum protection and comfort.

â­ Unique materials that do not swell in water, allowing your baby to move freely.
â­ 360Â° stretch around the waist prevents leaks and provides a perfect, secure fit.
â­ Double standing leak guards for an extra layer of protection.
â­ Ultra-soft cotton touch for the gentlest care for your babyâ€™s delicate skin.
â­ Ideal for babies weighing 11-18 Kg (Large - XL).

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy** Swim Pants:
â­ Put the swim pants on your baby like regular underwear.
â­ Ensure the elastic leg cuffs are snug to prevent leaks.

â­ Dispose of the swim pants hygienically.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy** Swim Pants:
â­ High-quality materials that do not swell in water.

description_en:
As your baby's movement skills grow, **BabyJoy** diapers are designed to provide maximum comfort and freedom of movement, along with superior absorption and leakage prevention. **BabyJoy** features a compressed diamond pad that absorbs up to 6 cups and keeps your baby dry for long hours without clumping. The unique breathable feature allows moist air to escape and fresh air to enter, maintaining your baby's skin healthy and soft with its gentle cotton touch. The elastic waistband prevents back leakage, and the comfortable leg design provides extra leakage protection. The umbilical cord cutout is designed to help speed up the healing of a newborn's umbilical cord.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy**:
â­ Adjust the elastic waistband so it is not too tight or too loose. You should be able to fit two fingers snugly between the diaper and the belly.
â­ Keep all packaging materials away from children and infants to avoid the risk of suffocation.
â­ Choose the right size for your baby to ensure maximum comfort and protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy**:
â­ Super absorbent material to absorb up to 6 cups of liquid.
â­ Compressed diamond pad that does not clump.
â­ Soft cotton touch, gentle on baby's skin.
â­ Elastic waistband to prevent back leakage.
â­ Comfortable leg design for leakage protection.
â­ Umbilical cord cutout for newborns.

description_en:
Discover superior care for your baby's skin with **BabyJoy Healthy Skin Wet Wipes**. These wipes are carefully designed to suit your baby's delicate skin, featuring a gentle, moisturizing, alcohol-free formula with 97% pure water for maximum safety and softness. Use **BabyJoy Healthy Skin Wet Wipes** at every diaper change for effective and gentle cleansing.

Product Features:
â­ Dermatologically tested for ultimate gentleness.
â­ Scented and alcohol-free, perfect for sensitive skin.
â­ Enriched with Pro Vitamin B5, Chamomile, and Aloe Gel for moisturizing and protection.
â­ Gently moisturizes and protects your baby's skin with every use.
â­ Your ideal choice for everyday use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Healthy Skin Wet Wipes**
â­ Use one wipe or as needed for gentle cleansing of your baby's skin at every change.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Healthy Skin Wet Wipes**
â­ 97% Pure Water
â­ Pro Vitamin B5
â­ Chamomile
â­ Aloe Gel

description_en:
Discover the ultimate care for your baby's delicate skin with **BabyJoy Olive Pants**, the #1 diaper in Saudi Arabia from the leading brand.

**BabyJoy Olive Pants** are clinically tested and awarded the "5 Star Excellent" Derma Test. Enriched with Olive Oil, its formula helps keep your baby's skin moisturized, protected, and healthy.

With an absorbency of up to 6 cups and even wetness distribution thanks to its Compressed Air Channels, **BabyJoy Olive Pants** ensures your baby stays dry and comfortable for longer hours, giving you more playtime and less diaper changing time.

â­ Contains Olive Oil to gently moisturize the skin.
â­ 6 CUP ABSORBENCY.
â­ 5 STAR DERMA TEST awarded.
â­ SOFT WAIST STRETCH for ultimate comfort.
â­ BREATHABLE MATERIAL allows air circulation.
â­ ULTRA SOFT COTTON TOUCH for extra gentleness.
â­ EASY TO WEAR, EASY TO REMOVE.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Olive Pants**:
â­ Change the diaper regularly to ensure your baby's comfort.
â­ Ensure the diaper is fitted comfortably around the baby's waist and legs.
â­ Put on like regular pants, ensuring the adhesive tabs are at the back.
â­ When removing, tear along the sides.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Olive Pants**:
â­ Olive Oil: To moisturize and nourish the skin.
â­ Breathable Material: Allows air to pass through, preventing moisture buildup.
â­ Air Channels: For efficient absorption and distribution of liquids.
â­ Ultra-Soft Cotton Topsheet: For extra comfort against the skin.

#BabyJoy #BabyDiapers #OliveOil #BabyCare #SaudiArabia #Dryness #Comfort #SensitiveSkin #Newborn #BabyProducts

description_en:
Discover ultimate comfort and superior protection with **BabyJoy Size 6** diapers, specifically designed for your baby's delicate and growing skin. As your baby's movement skills rapidly advance, **BabyJoy** diapers are engineered to provide maximum freedom of movement with exceptional absorbency and leak prevention, keeping your little one dry and comfortable all day long.

Product Features:
â­ Elastic Waist: Prevents back leaks and ensures a snug, comfortable fit.
â­ Compressed Diamond Pad: Absorbs up to 6 cups of fluid and prevents leaks for hours without clumping.
â­ Unique Breathability: Allows moist air out and fresh air in to maintain healthy skin.
â­ Comfortable Fit Design: Provides perfect comfort and leakage protection around the legs.
â­ Umbilical Cord Opening: Aids in the quick and safe healing of the newborn's umbilical cord.
â­ Soft Cotton Touch: Exceptionally gentle on your baby's sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy**:
â­ Adjust the elastic waistband so it's neither too tight nor too loose; you should be able to fit two fingers snugly between the diaper and the tummy.
â­ To avoid the risk of suffocation, keep all packaging materials away from children and infants.
â­ Choose the right size for your baby for optimal comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy**:
â­ Super Absorbent Polymers.
â­ Soft, breathable outer layer.
â­ Adjustable adhesive tapes.
â­ Elastic materials at the waist and legs.

Discover ultimate comfort for your little one with **BabyJoy** Swim Pants. Specially designed to give your baby the freedom to move and fully enjoy playing in the water without any worries. Made in Saudi Arabia with Japanese technology to ensure the highest quality standards, these swim pants are the perfect choice for moms and dads in the Kingdom.

â­ Unique materials that do not swell in water, maintaining diaper shape and baby comfort.
â­ 360Â° stretch around the waist prevents leaks and ensures a perfect fit.
â­ Double standing leak guards for extra protection against leaks.
â­ Ultra-soft cotton touch for gentle care of your baby's delicate skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy**:
â­ Put the swim pant on your baby before entering the water.
â­ Ensure the diaper is securely fastened and comfortable.
â­ Change the diaper immediately after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy**:
â­ Breathable outer layers.
â­ High-absorbency absorbent core.
â­ Refastenable adhesive tabs.
â­ Non-swelling water materials.
â­ Waistband elastic.

description_en:
As your baby's movement skills grow rapidly, **BabyJoy** diapers have been developed to provide maximum comfort and freedom of movement, in addition to their superior absorption and leakage prevention capabilities.

Product Features:
â­ Elastic Waist: Prevents back leakage of liquid and soft discharges.
â­ Diamond Compressed Pad: Absorbs up to 6 cups and prevents leakage for long hours without clumping.
â­ Unique Breathability: Releases moist air and allows fresh air in to keep your baby's skin healthy.
â­ Comfortable & Snug Fit Design: Provides comfort and leakage protection around the legs.
â­ Umbilical Cord Opening: Helps speed up the healing of the newborn's umbilical cord.
â­ Soft Cotton Touch: Gentle on baby's skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy**:
â­ Adjust the elastic tabs so they are not too tight or too loose; you should be able to fit two fingers snugly between the diaper and the tummy.

Warnings & Precautions:
â­ To avoid the risk of suffocation, keep all packaging material away from children and infants.

Product Details:
â­ Brand: BabyJoy
â­ Quantity: 56 Pcs
â­ Product Form: Regular Diapers
â­ Product Type: Regular Diapers

description_en:
Give your baby unparalleled comfort with **BabyJoy Pants** Size 3. Specifically designed for active babies who have started crawling, **BabyJoy Pants** offer an easy and enjoyable diaper-changing experience. Featuring innovative wetness channels that prevent bulkiness even with significant liquid absorption, it keeps your baby dry for extended hours. Experience ultimate comfort and freedom of movement for your little one with **BabyJoy**, specially designed for their delicate skin. **BabyJoy** features advanced technology for exceptional absorbency and leak protection, ensuring long-lasting dryness and comfort. Enjoy peace of mind with every change.

â­ Flexible elastic waistband prevents back leakage.

â­ Ultra-soft cotton touch is gentle on your baby's skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy**:

â­ Keep all packaging materials away from children to prevent suffocation hazards.

title_ar: Ø¨ÙŠØ¨ÙŠ Ø¬ÙˆÙŠ ÙƒÙ„ÙˆØª ÙƒØ¨ÙŠØ± Ù…Ù‚Ø§Ø³ 4ØŒ ØµÙ†Ø¯ÙˆÙ‚ Ù…ÙŠØ¬Ø§ 112 Ø­ÙØ§Ø¶ - Ø±Ø§Ø­Ø© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø© ÙˆØ­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø£Ù…Ø¯
description_en:
Make diaper changes a breeze and keep your baby comfortable with **BabyJoy Culotte Size 4 Mega Box**. These innovative pants are designed for active babies, easily pulling on like regular underwear, making changes quick and easy, especially as your baby starts to crawl. 

**BabyJoy Culotte Size 4 Mega Box** offers superior absorbency, holding up to 6 cups of liquid, with special channels to distribute wetness evenly, ensuring your baby's skin stays dry and healthy. The compressed pad prevents bulkiness even after maximum absorption, and wide leg gathers provide effective leakage protection. Experience the soft cotton-like feel and unique breathable material that ensures optimal ventilation for your baby's delicate skin. The stretchable, comfortable waistband fits snugly without leaving marks. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Culotte Size 4 Mega Box**:
â­ Adjust the diaper for a snug but comfortable fit. You should be able to fit two fingers snugly between the diaper and your baby's waist.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Culotte Size 4 Mega Box**:
â­ Super absorbent core for high liquid retention.
â­ Soft, cotton-like top sheet for gentle skin contact.
â­ Breathable outer layer to maintain skin health.
â­ Elastic waistband and leg cuffs for a secure, leak-free fit.

#BabyJoyDiapers #KidsPants #Size4 #BabyCare #Skincare #BabyEssentials #PremiumDiapers #BabyComfort #SaudiArabia #OnlineShopping

description_en:
Discover **BabyJoy** Size 4 Large, engineered to keep up with your baby's growing movements, offering ultimate comfort and freedom. Its superior absorbency and leak protection ensure your baby stays dry and happy. Experience unparalleled peace of mind with every change.

â­ Elastic waistband prevents back leakage of liquid and soft waste.
â­ Diamond-shaped compressed pad absorbs up to 6 cups, preventing leaks for hours without clumping.
â­ Unique breathable feature allows wet air out and fresh air in, keeping your baby's skin healthy.
â­ Comfortably shaped pad between the legs provides comfort and leak protection.
â­ Umbilical cord opening helps speed up healing of the newborn's navel.
â­ Soft cotton touch is gentle on your baby's delicate skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy**:
â­ Adjust the elastic waistband so it's not too tight or too loose; you should be able to fit two fingers snugly between the diaper and the tummy.
â­ To avoid the risk of suffocation, keep all packaging materials away from children and infants.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy**:
â­ Super absorbent materials
â­ Soft, breathable outer layer
â­ Soft elastic waistband
â­ Re-sealable adhesive tapes

description_en:
Introducing **BabyJoy** Size 3, designed for maximum comfort and freedom of movement for your baby, with superior absorption and leakage protection.

â­ Developed to keep up with your baby's growing mobility skills, providing them with utmost comfort.
â­ Features a stretchy waistband that prevents back leakage.
â­ Compressed diamond pad absorbs up to 6 cups, keeping skin dry for hours without clumping.
â­ Unique breathable technology keeps your baby's skin healthy by exchanging wet air for fresh air.
â­ Comfort-fit design provides leakage protection around the legs.
â­ Umbilical cord opening aids in the rapid healing of a newborn's belly button.
â­ Soft cotton touch that is gentle on your baby's delicate skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy**:
â­ Adjust the stretchy waistband so it's not too tight or too loose. You should be able to fit two fingers snugly between the diaper and the tummy.
â­ Keep all packaging materials away from children and infants to avoid the risk of suffocation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy**:
â­ Super absorbent materials for leakage prevention and dryness.
â­ Soft and gentle cotton inner lining for the skin.
â­ Flexible elastic waistband.
â­ Refastenable adhesive tabs.

description_en:
Provide your baby's sensitive skin with the ultimate care with **BabyJoy Olive Pants Diapers**.

Your first choice from **BabyJoy Olive Pants Diapers**, the #1 clinically tested diaper in Saudi Arabia, awarded the "5 Star Excellent" Derma Test.

These diapers are specially designed to keep your baby's skin moisturized, protected, and healthy. Featuring a soft stretch waist and compressed air channels, **BabyJoy Olive Pants Diapers** ensure superior absorbency and even wetness distribution, offering your baby maximum leakage protection. Enjoy more playtime and greater comfort for your little one.

â­ Contains Olive Oil to gently moisturize the skin.
â­ Absorbs up to 6 cups of liquid with compressed air channels.
â­ Awarded "5 Star Excellent" in Derma Test.
â­ Soft stretch waist for optimal comfort.
â­ Breathable material that allows air circulation.
â­ Ultra-soft cotton touch for your baby's skin.
â­ Easy to wear and easy to remove.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Olive Pants Diapers**:
â­ Put the diaper on your baby like pants.
â­ Ensure the back tape is securely fastened.
â­ When changing, tear the side seams gently.
â­ Roll up the used diaper and use the tape to secure it.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Olive Pants Diapers**:
â­ Olive Oil: For superior moisturization and healthy skin.
â­ Breathable Material: Allows moist air to pass through the diaper.
â­ Compressed Air Channels: For effective liquid absorption and distribution.
â­ Ultra-Soft Cotton Touch: To provide maximum comfort.

description_en:
Experience superior softness and complete care with **BabyJoy Olive**, diapers specially designed to gently moisturize your baby's sensitive skin with natural olive oil. Its compressed air channels provide superior absorption of up to 6 cups of liquid, ensuring your baby's skin stays dry and healthy at all times. The stretchy waistband prevents leakage from the back, while the breathable materials allow moist air to pass through, reducing the chance of irritation.

â­ Deep moisturization with natural olive oil for healthy skin.
â­ Superior absorbency up to 6 cups to keep baby dry.
â­ Breathable design to prevent moisture and irritation.
â­ Stretchy waistband provides a perfect fit and prevents leaks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Olive**
â­ Ensure you choose the correct size for your baby.
â­ Carefully place the diaper, ensuring the adhesive tabs are at the back.
â­ Adjust the diaper for a comfortable fit around your baby's waist.
â­ Change the diaper regularly to maintain your baby's skin hygiene and dryness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Olive**
â­ Olive Oil: To moisturize and nourish baby's sensitive skin.
â­ Breathable Materials: Allow air circulation to keep skin dry.
â­ Compressed Absorbent Channels: For quick and effective liquid absorption.
â­ Soft Outer Layer: To provide maximum comfort for the baby.

description_en:
Discover superior care for your baby's delicate skin with **BabyJoy Olive**. These diapers are infused with the gentle touch of olive oil to moisturize your baby's sensitive skin, keeping it soft, healthy, and comfortable all day long. Featuring innovative compressed air channels, **BabyJoy Olive** absorbs up to 6 cups of liquid, ensuring your baby's skin stays dry, healthy, and protected from dampness. The breathable, stretchy waistband provides a snug yet comfortable fit and helps prevent leaks from the back, giving your baby the freedom to move and play without worry.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Olive**:
â­ Ensure the diaper is fitted correctly for maximum protection.
â­ Change diapers regularly to maintain your baby's clean and dry skin.
â­ Use baby-specific wet wipes to gently clean the area before applying a fresh diaper.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Olive**:
â­ Olive Oil: To moisturize and nourish baby's skin.
â­ Breathable Materials: To allow air circulation and keep skin dry.
â­ Compressed Absorption Channels: For superior liquid absorption.
â­ Stretchy Waistband: For added comfort and leak prevention.

description_en:
**BabyJoy** Compressed, the #1 choice in Saudi Arabia for your baby's delicate skin. Designed with superior Japanese technology for ultimate comfort and protection.

â­ Compressed pad absorbs a large amount of liquid, up to 6 cups.
â­ **BabyJoy** Compressed diapers remain non-bulky even after absorbing a large quantity of liquid, allowing your baby freedom of movement.
â­ Flexible elastic waistband prevents back leakage, keeping your baby's clothes dry.
â­ Comfortably shaped leg cuffs provide a snug fit to prevent leakage and offer maximum protection.
â­ Ultra-soft cotton touch protects your baby's soft and delicate skin.

Enjoy peaceful sleep with **BabyJoy** Compressed; one diaper is enough for the entire night, keeping your baby dry and comfortable.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy** Compressed:
â­ Open a **BabyJoy** Compressed diaper and place your baby on it.
â­ Secure the adhesive tabs comfortably around your baby's waist.
â­ Change the diaper regularly to keep your baby's skin clean and dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy** Compressed:
â­ Super absorbent materials (for up to 6 cups of liquid).
â­ Soft and breathable outer layer.
â­ Flexible leak guards.
â­ Comfortable elastic waistband.
â­ Refastenable tapes.

description_en:
Make diaper changes an easy and enjoyable experience with **BabyJoy Culotte** Medium, specially designed for your active baby. Ideal for when your baby starts crawling and becomes more mobile, **BabyJoy Culotte** is as easy to put on as regular underwear.

â­ Superior absorbency of up to 6 cups of liquid for extended leakage protection.
â­ The compressed pad remains non-bulky even after absorbing large quantities of liquid, ensuring your baby's comfort.
â­ Innovative wetness distribution channels ensure even spread across the entire diaper.
â­ Wide leg gathers to prevent uncomfortable leaks between the legs.
â­ Soft cotton touch that is exceptionally gentle on delicate baby skin.
â­ Unique breathable material for baby's skin ventilation and health.
â­ Stretchy waistband provides a comfortable, snug fit without leaving marks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Culotte**
â­ Adjust the elastic waistband so it's neither too tight nor too loose; you should be able to fit two fingers snugly between the diaper and the baby's tummy.
â­ Keep all packaging materials away from children and infants to avoid the risk of suffocation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Culotte**
â­ Ultra-soft materials with a cotton-like feel.
â­ Advanced absorption layers.
â­ Stretchy, flexible waistband.
â­ Secure fastening tapes.
â­ Breathable outer cover.

description_en:
Discover ultimate comfort and hydration for your baby's delicate skin with **BabyJoy Olive**. These innovative diapers are infused with olive oil to gently nourish and moisturize your baby's skin, leaving it soft and healthy. Featuring advanced compressed air channels, **BabyJoy Olive** offers superior absorbency, capable of holding up to 6 cups of liquid, ensuring your baby stays dry and comfortable for extended periods. The stretchy waistband helps prevent back leaks, while breathable materials allow moist air to pass through, minimizing irritation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Olive**:
â­ Ensure the diaper is fitted correctly for maximum protection.
â­ Change the diaper regularly to keep your baby's skin dry and comfortable.
â­ Use the side tapes for a secure fit.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Olive**:
â­ Olive Oil: For moisturizing and nourishing the skin.
â­ Super Absorbent Materials: To keep skin dry.
â­ Breathable Materials: For added comfort and reduced irritation.
â­ Stretchy Waistband Design: To prevent back leaks.
â­ Secure Side Tapes: For a snug fit.

description_en:
Introducing **BabyJoy Olive**, the ultimate diaper for your baby's delicate skin. Infused with natural olive oil, these diapers gently moisturize your baby's skin, keeping it soft and healthy. Featuring innovative compressed air channels, **BabyJoy Olive** absorbs up to 6 cups of liquid, ensuring your baby's skin stays dry and fresh all day and night.

â­ Olive Oil: Moisturizes and protects the skin.
â­ Stretch Waist: Provides a comfortable fit and prevents leaks.
â­ Breathable Materials: Allows air circulation and prevents moisture buildup.
â­ Compressed Air Channels: High liquid absorption for dryness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Olive**:
â­ Ensure the diaper is fitted securely around your baby's waist.
â­ Check the diaper regularly and change when wet to maintain dryness.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Olive**:
â­ Natural Olive Oil.
â­ Super Absorbent Polymer.
â­ Soft & Breathable Fibers.
â­ Refastenable Tapes.
â­ Leak Guards to prevent side leakage.

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort for your baby's skin with **BabyJoy Olive**, specially designed diapers to moisturize and protect your baby's delicate skin. Infused with olive oil, these diapers provide continuous moisturization, leaving your baby's skin soft and healthy. Unique compressed air channels absorb up to 6 cups of liquid, ensuring superior dryness and leak protection. The stretch waist design helps prevent leakage from the back, while breathable materials allow air circulation to keep your baby comfortable all day and night.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Olive**:
â­ Ensure the front fastening tapes are securely attached to the back of the diaper.
â­ Adjust the diaper around your baby's waist to ensure a snug and comfortable fit.
â­ Make sure the leakage barriers around your baby's thighs are pulled up to ensure maximum protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Olive**:
â­ Olive Oil: For deep moisturization and skin protection.
â­ Breathable Materials: Allow air flow to keep skin dry.
â­ Compressed Air Channels: For superior liquid absorption.
â­ Stretch Waist: Provides a snug fit and prevents leaks.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Thick Scented Wet Wipes**:

description_en:
Keep your baby's delicate skin soft and dry with **BabyJoy Olive** diapers, Size 5. Specially formulated with nourishing olive oil to gently moisturize your baby's sensitive skin. Its compressed air channels absorb up to 6 cups of liquid, ensuring your baby stays dry and comfortable for hours. The stretchy waistband and innovative leak guards prevent back leaks, while the breathable materials allow air to flow, keeping your baby's skin healthy.

â­ **Olive Oil:** Moisturizes and nourishes your baby's delicate skin.
â­ **Waist Stretch:** Provides a secure fit and helps prevent back leaks.
â­ **Breathable Materials:** Allows air circulation for dry and comfortable skin.
â­ **Compressed Air Channels:** Efficiently absorbs liquids.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Olive**:
â­ Ensure the diaper area is clean and dry before applying a new diaper.
â­ Position the diaper, ensuring the elastic waistband is snug and comfortable.
â­ Secure the adhesive tabs firmly to prevent leaks.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Olive**:
â­ Olive Oil
â­ Super Absorbent Polymers
â­ Breathable Outer Layer
â­ Secure Adhesive Tabs
â­ Elastic Leak Guards

description_en:
Discover ultimate comfort for your baby with **BabyJoy Pants**! Specifically designed to simplify the diaper changing experience, whether your baby is starting to crawl or becoming more active. **BabyJoy Pants** feature a comfortable, stretchable elastic waistband that fits your baby's body perfectly without leaving marks, along with a super-soft cotton touch that soothes their delicate skin. Thanks to innovative distribution channels and superior absorbency equivalent to 6 cups, your baby stays dry and protected from leaks for longer, even with large amounts of wetness. It remains non-bulky, maintaining its shape to give your baby complete freedom of movement. Wide leg gathers and unique breathable material ensure your baby's skin stays healthy and dry. **BabyJoy Pants** make changing time easier and more enjoyable.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **BabyJoy Pants**
â­ Adjust the elastic waistband so it's not too tight or too loose. You should be able to fit two fingers snugly between the diaper and the tummy.
â­ To avoid the risk of suffocation, keep all packaging materials away from children and infants.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **BabyJoy Pants**
â­ Soft, cotton-like materials for delicate skin care.
â­ Innovative distribution channels for effective wetness absorption.
â­ Comfortable and flexible stretch elastic waistband.
â­ Breathable protection to keep baby's skin dry and healthy.
â­ Superior absorbency capacity equivalent to 6 cups of liquid.
